<range>









































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































Sei to poia to Maaron izaza toni ve tini iza? Nene ŋgeu to izorzoor ndiran samsamiadi ŋgar todi. Ve yes to tiyel pa ataam to Maaron, ye itaghon ŋgar todi maau. Ve ndiran to tiveveleg Maaron paam, ye ilup toman di maau.
Saveeŋ to Maaron toman tutuuŋ toni, nene ighami lolo poia le poia kat. Ve ighamgham ŋgar pani irau mboŋ ve ndag.
Tamtoghon tovene, ye inimale ai to tivazogi igharau ya to ireer. Sawa to anoŋa ivot, nene pale ighur anoŋa popoiadi. Ve sawa to ndag tiina, raua irau imalai maau. Tamtoghon tovene, uraat toni isob ilaan poia moghon.
Eemoghon ndiran samsamiadi, nepooŋadi tovene maau. Yes tinimale buzbuz to ighaze yaghur imundig, ghoro iviviira ilale.
Tovenen sawa to Maaron iŋgabiiz tamtoghon ve ighur atia padi, ndiran samsamiadi pale ledi saveeŋ maau, ve titud moghon. Ndiran to ghamuuŋ sosor irau tineep toman tamtoghon deŋiadi ila lupuuŋ todi ne maau.
Tovenen tamtoghon deŋiadi, Maaron mata padi, ve iŋginŋgin di pa laghooŋ todi. Eemoghon ndiran to titaghon ataam samia, yes pale tilaledi.
Pughu vena to ndug ndug atedi yabyab ve tighaze tipamundigin malmal? Tamtoghon tikaal ataam pa tigham didiaaŋ pasa? Ŋgar todi irau ighur maau. Tighami sorok.
Yes kinik to taan tigham aghedi tighaze tigham malmal. Ve yes pooza tilup di, ve tikaal ataam pa tizoor Yoova ŋgar toni ve titatan ŋgeu to ye ighuri inim kinik.
Yes tighaze: “Yo! Takuup ravraav toman sen todi to tikau ghiit pani ne, ve tapiyaav di tila. Leso tiŋgin ghiit muul sob.”
Eemoghon Yoova ineep ila ina to ghamuuŋ pooz izi ndug sambam, ve iŋiŋ padi. Ye mata velegin ŋgar todi.
Ghoro isaav ariaŋa padi toman ate yabyab. Ate malmal, ve ipamatughezan di. Ighaze:
“You naghur tamtoghon tiou eez igham naghog ve inim kinik. Ye ineep izi lolooz tiou patabuaŋ Zion, ve ighamgham pooz.”
Kinik to iit Israela isaav tovene: “You pale navotia saveeŋ to Yoova imbua toman ghou. Ye isaav payou ighaze: ‘You natug yom. Yom tamam to you. Aazne, you naghur ghom pa uraat.
Ughason ghou, ghoro you nagham ndug ndug tinim lem. Tamtoghon to tineep irau taan dige to naol ne pale tinim lem, ve uŋgin di.
Pooz tiom pale ariaŋa kat, inimale titi to kinik to tigharaata pa ain. Yom pale urab matin kinik tisob tapiridi. Pale tisami tinimale uur to tirabi le berberia.’”
Tovenen, yam kinik asob agham ŋgar pooi. Ve yam pooza to taan, alooŋ saveeŋ ve apatum gham.
Amatughez pa Yoova, ve ambees pani. Atandag pani, ve apaiti toman tinimim iza.
Aput aghemim pa Natu, ve aneep ila samba. Pa vene, Maaron ate yabyab payam, ve imundig ireu gham asob alalemim. Pasa, ye ate tuku. Eemoghon yes to tiyooŋ ila toni, poia toni pale iza todi, ve tineep toman tinidi iza.

O Yoova, you koiagŋa katindi. Ival tiina kat timundig tighaze tiwaghamun ghou.
Yes tisavsaav payou tighaze: “Maaron ipul muri pani wa. Irau iuuli muul maau.”
Eemoghon Yoova, yom unum sigeu payou ve upoon ghou. You tinig iza pasa, yom ugham izag inim tiina, ve upalot ghou le nalib pa koiagŋa.
You nataŋ roran Yoova toman aliŋag tiina naghaze iuul ghou. Ve ye ineep izi lolooz toni patabuaŋ, ve ilooŋ ghou.
Tovenen you nazi nagheen le lolog imaagh. Pasa, Yoova tau to mata pa ghenooŋ tiou le namundig muul.
Ighaze koiagŋa ndiŋndiŋ ndiŋndiŋ saaŋgul (10,000) tiluvut ghou pa tigham malmal payou, you irau namatughez padi maau.
O Yoova, rikia moghon umundig ve uul ghou! Urab koiagŋa azedi le livodi ipolpol. Ve urab matin tapiridi le isob kat.
Yoova, yom moghon to irau ugham mulin ghou. Ughur poia tiom iza to tamtoghon tiom tisob, leso tinidi iza ve tineep pooi.

O Maaron, you nataŋ roran ghom. Lolom isamin ghou, ve ulooŋ suŋuuŋ tiou. Pasa, pataŋani igham ghou ve leg ataam maau. Upas ghou navot pa pataŋani tonene. Leso upaghazoŋan ghou ila tamtoghon matadi ughaze ŋgar tiou deŋia ila matam.
Oyai, yam to atatan ghou ve awaghamun izag, ŋeez o apul ŋgar tiam tonanan? Yam aghur lolomim pa ŋgar soroksorok to le anoŋa maau, ve ataghon ŋgar kaarom. Ŋeez o apuli?
Yam awatag: Yes to lolodi ineep tuŋia ila to Yoova ve titaghon ataam toni, ye isia di tinim le wa. Tovenen sawa to you nataŋ rorani, ye pale ighur taliŋa payou.
Amatughez pa Maaron, ve agham sosor muul malep. Sawa to yam aneep ila inamim to ghenooŋ, neneeŋamim, ve matamim iŋgal taumim ve agham ŋgar pooi pa saveeŋ tonene.
Anumeer Yoova ve agham watooŋrau pani toman lolomim. Leso watooŋrau tiam deŋia ila mata.
Tamtoghon naol tikausim tighaze: “Oyai, ŋeez o tagham nepooŋ poia!” Eemoghon you naghaze: “Yoova, lolom poia payei, ve upatooŋ taum payei.”
Yom ugham ghou tinig iza ve lolog poia kat, ilib pa yes to aniiŋ ve vaen anoŋa katindi tivotvot ila uum todi.
Tovenen you ateg izi, ve nazi nagheen le lolog imaagh. Irau namatughez maau. Pasa, Yoova, yom taum matam payou ve uŋgin ghou naneep pooi.

O Yoova, ughur taliŋam pa aliŋag, ve ulooŋ taŋiiz tiou tonene.
Yom kinik tiou ve Maaron tiou. Moghon moghon, suŋuuŋ tiou iŋaŋarua ghom. Tovenen ughur taliŋam pa taŋiiz tiou tonene ve uul ghou.
Yoova, mboŋmaagh to naol ne, yom uloŋlooŋ aliŋag. Ighaze ndugizau, you naghurghur ghasoniiŋ tiou ilat tiom, ve naghur matag payom pa uul ghou.
Maaron, yom lolom pa ŋgar samia maau kat. Ndiran samsamiadi irau tineep toman ghom maau.
Ve ndiran pakuruuŋa irau tiyoon ila matam maau. Pasa, yom ughur koi pa tamtoghon tisob to tighamgham ŋgar samia.
Yes to avodi kaarom, yom ureu di tilaledi. Ve ndiran tombanooŋa ve yes to tirabrab tamtoghon le naghodi siŋ, yom lolom padi rita maau kat.
Eemoghon lolom ineep tuŋia inim tiou ve uluul ghou itaghon saveeŋ mbuaaŋ tiom. Tauto you irau nalooŋ nalat rumai tiom. You naroron payom, ve naput agheg payom ila rumai tiom patabuaŋ.
O Yoova, ŋgar tiom, nene deŋia moghon. Ugham pooz payou, ve upatooŋ ghou pa ataam tiom, leso nataghoni kat. Pasa, koiagŋa tighaze tiwaghamun ghou.
Saveeŋ onoon eta ivot ila avodi maau. Ve lolodi igham pa ŋgar samia moghon tighaze tiwaghamun tamtoghon. Yamadi tortoraaŋ saveeŋ. Avodi inimale naal to avo ikakaak. Tisasavia saveeŋ ŋgoreeŋa naol pa titombaan tamtoghon ve tiwaghamun di.
O Maaron, uvotia sosor todi ivot ighazooŋ, ve ughur atia padi. Ŋgar samsamia to tighamgham di, upamuul di tila pa taudi ve iwaghamun di. Moghon moghon, yes timamalaaŋ pa tutuuŋ tiom. Tovenen undiir di tilaledi. Pasa, yes tizorzoor ghom, ve tighamgham didiaaŋ.
Eemoghon tamtoghon tisob to tiyooŋ ilat tiom, pale tinidi iza. Yes pale timbou toman lolodi poia irau sawa isob. Yes to lolodi ineep ilat tiom, yom uvool todi ve upoon di. Leso lolodi poia kat, ve tipait ghom.
O Yoova, poia tiom izaza to yes to titaghon katin saveeŋ tiom. Yom lolom padi ve poia tiom inim sigeu padi.

O Yoova, uyaan ghou toman atem yabyab malep. Ve ighaze ughur pataŋani iŋarua ghou pa upasaluŋgan ghou, ughami toman atem yabyab kat malep.
Yoova, you mbesooŋa tiom. Lolom isamin ghou ve uul ghou lak! Pasa, tapirig isob wa. O Maaron, ugham ghou tinig poia. Pasa, tuag tisob tiyabyab.
Yoova, lolog ipataŋan kat. Pale upul ghou tovene ila ila le ŋeez o isob?
Yoova, lolom ineep tuŋia ila to tamtoghon tiom ve uluul di. Tovenen matam iŋgal ghou muul, ve upas ghou navot pa pataŋani tonene. Ugham mulin ghou lak.
Pasa, mateeŋa irau matadi iŋgal ghom muul maau. Sei to pale ighengheen ila naal ve ipait ghom? Maau.
You nayakyak le tapirig isob. Mboŋ to naol ne, nataŋtaŋ le matag suru ipot ila moogh tiou.
Lolog ipataŋan kat ve nataŋ tiina le matag isarsar. Pasa, koiagŋa katindi.
Yam ndiran to aghamgham ŋgar samsamia, asob aghau payou! Pasa taŋiiz tiou, Yoova ilooŋa wa.
You nataŋ roran Yoova pa ulaaŋ, ve ilooŋ suŋuuŋ tiou. Ghasoniiŋ tiou, ye pale iyok pani.
Pale igham koiagŋa tisob timatughez tiina ve mayadi. Yes pale tiwaghamgham, ve titoor di rikia moghon, ve titud moghon ve tila.

Yoova, yom Maaron tiou. You nayooŋ ilat tiom. Ndiran samsamia tigham taghon ghou tighaze tiwaghamun ghou. Uul ghou ve ugham mulin ghou ila nimadi.
Pa vene, tirab ghou, ve tiwaghamun ghou inimale laion isaas motin tamtoghon, le ŋgiira ŋgiira. Pasa, leg itag ite eta pa igham mulin ghou maau.
O Yoova, Maaron tiou, ndiran to tighaze tigham samin ghou, you nagham sosor eta padi maau.
Tamtoghon to yeiŋa nimbua saveeŋ pa nilup ghei ninim ee moghon, you nagham ŋgar samia eta padi maau. Ve yes to tighur koi payou sorok, you nayub mbeb todi eta maau.
Ighaze you nagham sosor tovene, nene poia pa koiagŋa tigham taghon ghou ve tikis ghou, ve tivazag ghou ila taan, ve nagheen izala ghavuur.
Yoova, umundig toman atem yabyab, ve ureu koiagŋa. Pasa, atedi yabyab kat payou. Maaron tiou, umundig rikia moghon ve uul ghou. Ughur atia iŋarua koiagŋa pa ŋgar to tighami.
Uyou tamtoghon tisob tila tilup di ila naghom. Uneep ila inam to ghamuuŋ pooz izi ndug sambam, ve ugham pooz padi.
Yoova, yom uŋgabiiz tamtoghon to ndug ndug, ve ughur atia padi. Uŋgabiiz ghou ve upaghazoŋan ghou ila tamtoghon matadi, leso tiwatag tighaze you ŋgeu deŋiag, ve gabuag toman ŋgar tiou isob, nene poia moghon.
Maaron, ŋgar to yom ughamghami, nene deŋia moghon. Ve yom uwatag katin tamtoghon lolodi ve ŋgar todi. Ndiran to tighamgham ŋgar samsamia, upasob ŋgar todi tonowen. Ve upalot ndiran deŋiadi, leso tiyoon ariaŋa.
Maaron, yom moghon to unum sigeu payou. Yes to ŋgar deŋia ineep tuŋia ila lolodi, yom ugham mulin di pa pataŋani todi.
Maaron, gabizooŋ tiom, nene deŋia moghon. Ndag to naol ne, yom upatooŋ mbalmbali tiom pa ndiran samsamia.
Tamtoghon to ighaze itoor ŋgar toni maau, nene pale Maaron ipot buza ve iyool pane toni pa ighur atia pani.
Tamtoghon tovene, Maaron igharaat ndaab toni pataghaaŋ pa irabi. Ve igharaat pane natu toni ve itun mata pa yab, leso ivanegi.
Ndiran samsamia tinimale liva to apo ve ighaze ipoop. Pasa, lolodi ivon pa ŋgar samsamia naol to tighaze tigham pa tamtoghon. Ve muri, ghoro ŋgar to ineep ila lolodi ne anoŋa ivot. Nene kaarom naol to tiwaghamun tamtoghon.
Ŋgeu to ighaze itai saambu pa tamtoghon eta, nene pale tau itap izila saambu tonenen.
Ŋgar samia to ye ighaze igham pa tamtoghon, nene pale imuul pa tau. Ve malmal to ye ighaze igham padi, nene pale iwaghamun tau.
You lolog poia pa Yoova, ve napaiti pa ŋgar toni deŋia. You nambou mbouŋ ve napait iza. Pasa Yoova, ye Maaron tiina kat to ilib pa ndimaronŋa tisob.

O Yoova, Tiina tiei, yom upatooŋ izam tiina irau taan isob. Yom upambood taum pa ŋgurubam to tiina kat. Ilib pa mbeb tisob to sambam paroŋania.
Yom ughur yes ndipain ve yes to gegegeu kat pa tipait izam ve tipatooŋ tapirim. Leso ugham koiamŋa neneeŋadi, ve upoon yes ndiran to didiaaŋ avodi.
Matag izala pa sambam paroŋania, ve naghita nimam muri inepneep. You naghita kaiyo ve pitum to yom taum ughur di tila inadi,
ve naghaze: “Yei tamtoghon to taan, ninim sa mbeb poia, to yom matam iŋgalŋgal ghei? Pughu vena to matam payei?
Yom ughur ghei nizi ris moghon pa yes aŋela ve yom taum. Ve upakur ghei ve ugham izamai ivot inim tiina.
Yom ughur ghei pa niŋgin nimam muri, ve ughur mbeb tisob tineep ila sambamai:
Ŋgai naol to paanu, ve mbeb tisob to tineep ila su,
man tisob to tirovroov ila tata paroŋania, ve iigh tisob to tighaughau ila te lolo.
O Yoova, Tiina tiei, yom upatooŋ izam tiina irau taan isob.

O Yoova, you napait ghom pa poia tiom toman lolog. Ve naghaze navotia uraat gharatooŋadi to yom ughamgham di. Uraat tonanan, ite kat. Tamtoghon tighita di le ŋgar todi isob.
You lolog poia kat ve tinig iza payom. Yom Maaron tiina to ulib pa ndimaronŋa tisob. Tovenen you pale nambou, ve napait izam.
Sawa to koiagŋa tighita katin tapirim, yes titoor di, ve tighaze tighau. Eemoghon titaptap tizi le tisob timatmaat.
Yom uneep ila inam to ghamuuŋ pooz, ve uŋgagabiiz tamtoghon. Ve gabizooŋ tiom, nene deŋia moghon. Yom ughita ghou ughaze ŋgar tiou deŋia. Tauto uul ghou pa saveeŋ tiou.
Yom uyaan ndug ndug to tiwatag ghom maau, ve ureu tamtoghon samsamiadi tilaledi. Yom umus izadi tilaledi wa. Irau tamtoghon matadi iŋgal di muul maau.
Koiagŋa tisami wa. Pale tineep tovene itaghoni taghoni gha ila. Ve ndug todi paam, yom ureu mbirisan di le tisob tilaledi. Tovenen tamtoghon pale lolodi imaagh padi kat.
Yoova ineep ila ina to ghamuuŋ pooz, ve iŋgin mbeb irau sawa isob. Ye ighur ina tonowen, ve inamnaam pa iŋgabiiz tamtoghon.
Ye iŋgagabiiz tamtoghon tisob to taan, ve ighagharaat pataŋani todi itaghon ŋgar deŋia. Ve igham pooz pa ndug ndug itaghon ŋgar raraate moghon.
Yoova inim ruum ariaŋa pa yes to koiadi tighur pataŋani padi. Ighaze pataŋani ivot, ye inim ledi ndug to yoŋgaaŋ.
Yoova, yes to tiwatag katin ghom, tinumeer ghom. Pasa, ndiran to tizuaria di payom, yom irau upul murim padi maau.
Ambou ve apait Yoova. Ye ineep izi ndug Zion, ve ighamgham pooz. Uraat tintina to ye ighamgham di, avotia varudi le irau ndug ndug.
Yes to tirab tamtoghon le naghodi siŋ, Yoova ighurghur di maau. Pale iyat ŋgar todi tonowen. Ve tamtoghon to tinumeera ve timbadbaad pataŋani, ye irau lolo imaagh pa taŋiiz todi maau. Pale iuul di.
O Yoova, ughita pataŋani to koiagŋa tigham payou ne! Yes tiwaghamun ghou kat, ve rismoghon tone namaat. Lolom isamin ghou, ve upas ghou navot pa pataŋani tonene.
Leso nayoon ila ataam to ndug Zion, ve nasavia uraat tintina tisob to yom ughamgham di payou. Ve napait ghom toman tinig iza. Pasa, yom to ugham mulin ghou.
Ndug ndug to tiwatag ghom maau, titai saambu leso tikis tamtoghon. Eemoghon taudi titap tizila. Malum to tiraara pa tisavag tamtoghon, nene taudi tiŋgudi muul.
Yoova iŋgagabiiz tamtoghon, ve ighurghur atia padi itaghon ŋgar deŋia moghon. Leso ipatooŋ tau padi ve tiwatagi. Liis to ndiran samsamia tighuri, nene iliis taudi.
Ndiran samsamia ve ndug ndug to tipul muridi pa Maaron, yes pale tisob timaat tizila ndug to mateeŋa.
Eemoghon yes mbolaaŋa to tirau mbeb eta maau, Maaron irau lolo imaagh padi maau. Ve yes to timbadbaad pataŋani ve tighurghur matadi pa ulaaŋ to Maaron, ye irau ipul di tineep sami itaghoni taghoni ila ne maau. Pale iuul di.
Yoova, ughita. Tamtoghon sorok to taan tigham aghedi payom. Upul di tigham didiaaŋ malep. Utatan di tizi. Upayoon yes ndug ndug ila matam, uŋgabiiz di, ve ughur atia padi.
O Yoova, ugham ŋgar eta padi. Leso timatughez payom, ve tiwatag tighaze yes tamtoghon sorok to taan moghon. Tapiridi irau ghom maau.
O Yoova, pughu vena to uyoon saguan payou ve uul ghou maau? Vena to naneep ila pataŋani lolo, ve uyooŋ payou ne?
Ndiran samsamia tipapait taudi, ve tinanaan yes mbolaaŋa to tirau mbeb eta maau. Eemoghon ŋgar todi samia to matadi iŋgali, nene pale imuul pa taudi ve iwaghamun di.
Ndiran samsamia tipakur taudi pa ŋgar samia to tighamghami. Moghon moghon, tighamgham ŋgar pa tiyou ledi mbeb, ve tipipiyaav saveeŋ samsamia pa Yoova, ve tivevelegi.
Ndiran samsamia tonowen, tipakur taudi pa ŋgar todi. Tauto lolodi pa tiwatag Maaron maau. Ŋgar todi iyaryaaŋ tighaze: “Maaron irau ighur pataŋani payou maau. Pasa, Maaron eta ineep maau.”
Ve moghon moghon, uraat todi ilaan poia moghon. Tauto tinidi iza, ve tigham ŋgar pa sawa to pale Maaron iŋgabiiz di ve ighur atia padi ne maau. Ve matadi velegin koiadi kat.
Ve matadi iŋgal tighaze: “Mbeb eta irau igham ghei ruŋamai iza ne maau. Ve pataŋani eta irau ivot payei paam maau. Yei pale nineep poia moghon itaghoni taghoni gha ila.”
Saveeŋ samsamia naol, toman kaarom, ve matughezaaŋ ivotvot ila avodi irau sawa isob. Sawa to tisavia ŋgar samsamia ve pataŋani to tighaze tigham pa tamtoghon, nene igham lolodi poia kat inimale tighan aniiŋ poia.
Yes tiyoŋyooŋ ila ndug dige, ve tisasaŋan tamtoghon popoiadi. Tiyooŋ ve matadi inesnes pa yes to tirau malmal maau. Leso tisavag di, ve tirab di timaat.
Yes tiyoŋyooŋ ve tisasaŋan tinimale laion to ineep ila su lolo ve mata ivotvot. Tisasaŋan, leso tisavag yes to tirau malmal maau. Ighaze tisavag di ila malum todi, ghoro tikis di ve tiweu di tila.
Tovenen neneeŋadi ve tisasaŋan pa tisavag di. Sawa to ighaze eta peria, ghoro tisavagi.
Ve matadi iŋgal tighaze: “Maaron mata inim payei maau. Ŋgar to yei nighami, ye irau ighita maau, ve iwatagi maau.”
Oyai, Yoova, umundig upatooŋ tapirim padi lak! Maaron tiei, yes to tinumeer ghom ve timbadbaad pataŋani, lolom imaagh padi malep.
Maaron, pughu vena to yom upul ndiran samsamia tiveleg ghom? Yes tisavsaav ila lolodi tighaze: “Ŋgar to yei nighami, Maaron irau ipayoon ghei pa savsaveeŋ maau.”
Eemoghon Maaron, yom ughita ŋgar tisob to tigham di ne. Ŋgar samsamia ve pataŋani naol to yes tigham pa tamtoghon, yom uwatag di tisob, ve tineep ila nimam. Pasa, yes mbolaaŋa to tirau mbeb eta maau, tighur taudi tilat nimam ve tinumeer ghom. Yom taum to unum ulaaŋa pa yes parooŋa.
Eemoghon ndiran samsamia to tighamgham didiaaŋ, urab matin tapiridi. Uyat ŋgar todi samsamia. Leso ivot muul sob.
Yoova, ye kinik tiina to ighamgham pooz. To aazne, ve itaghoni taghoni gha ila. Ndug ndug to tiwatagi maau ve tineep ila taan toni, ye pale ipasob di le tisob kat.
O Yoova, yes to tinumeer ghom ve timbadbaad pataŋani, yom uwatag lolodi wa. Yom pale ughur taliŋam pa taŋiiz todi, ve upalot di.
Yes parooŋa ve yes to koiadi tighur pataŋani padi, yom taum pale uyoon padi ve uul di, ve ughur atia pa koiadi. Leso tamtoghon sorok to taan tipamatughezan ndug muul sob.
You nanumeer Yoova ve nayooŋ ila toni. Pughu vena to yam asavia saveeŋ to borouŋa payou aghaze: “Ughau uzala pa lolooz, inimale man imatughez ve iroov izala.
Ughita! Ndiran samsamia tiyoŋyooŋ ila ndoroom lolo. Yes tiyool pane todi, tighur pane natu ila ool, ve tisasaŋan tighaze tivaneg tamtoghon to ŋgar deŋia ineep tuŋia ila lolodi.”
Oyai, ŋgar ve tutuuŋ naol to tinim pughu pa nepooŋ poia, aazne tamtoghon tiwaghamun di le tisami wa. Tovenen ŋgeu deŋia pale igham vena?
Eemoghon Yoova, ye ineep ila rumai toni patabuaŋ lolo. Ye kinik to sambam to ineep ila ina to ghamuuŋ pooz. Ve mata ighita tamtoghon tisob, ve iŋgagabiiz ŋgar todi.
Yoova iŋgagabiiz tamtoghon deŋiadi ve yes samsamiadi paam. Leso iwatag ŋgar todi. Yes to lolodi pa ŋgar to rabuuŋ tamtoghon, ye lolo padi rita maau. Ighur koi padi.
Tovenen ye pale igham yab ŋgiliŋi toman yaam salfa tuntunu to vuzi samia, titaptap tizi ve tiwaghamun ndiran samsamiadi. Ve igham yaghur tuntunu kat inim leso iwaghamun di. Nene atia todi.
Pasa, Yoova itaghon ŋgar deŋia moghon. Tovenen ye lolo pa tamtoghon to tighamgham ŋgar deŋia. Yes to titaghon ŋgar poia, nene pale tineep tomani, ve tighita nagho.

O Yoova, uul ghei lak! Pasa, tamtoghon to lolodi ineep tuŋia ilat tiom ve titaghon ataam tiom, tisob wa. Yes to avodi onoon, eta ineep toman ghei muul maau.
Tamtoghon tisob tighamgham kaarom, ve tisasavia saveeŋ to le anoŋa maau ne pa nditadi. Yamadi tortoraaŋ saveeŋ. Saveeŋ to ivotvot ila avodi, nene poia. Eemoghon ŋgar to ineep ila lolodi, nene ite.
Yoova, ndiran to tisasavia saveeŋ ŋgoreeŋ pa tamtoghon pa tigham lolodi, upoon avodi. Yes tipakur taudi tighaze: “Sei to inim daba payei ve iŋgin ghei? Yei avomai mata. Sa ŋgar to ighaze nisavia, nene pale tamtoghon titaghoni moghon.” O Yoova, ugham di neneeŋadi.
<range>
Tovenen Yoova isaav ighaze: “Yes mbolaaŋa to tirau mbeb eta maau, ve yes to koiadi tiwaghamun di, you nalooŋ taŋiiz todi wa. Yes tikausim pa nepooŋ poia. Tovenen aazne, you pale namundig ve nauul di. You pale nagham mulin di ila koiadi nimadi, ve nauul di tineep pooi.”
Yoova saveeŋ toni, nene onoon moghon. Kaarom eta ineep ila lolo maau. Saveeŋ toni, nene inimale silva to tighuri izala yab pa liim ve ru, leso muun isob ighau pani le iŋgalaaŋ kat. Tovenen iit irau taghur ila saveeŋ mbuaaŋ toni.
Onoon, aazne ndiran samsamia tipapakur di ve tilaagh irau ndug ndug. Ve ival tiina tipapait ŋgar samia. Eemoghon Yoova, yom matam payei, ve uŋgin ghei nineep pooi. Ve upoon ghei pa ndiran tovene irau sawa isob.
<range>

Oyai Yoova, pataŋani tiina tonene ikis ghou sawa mala wa. Ŋeez o uul ghou? Pale lolom imaagh payou itaghoni taghoni gha ila? Vena to uŋgooz matam payou? Ŋeez o matam inim payou muul?
Sawa isob, you naghamgham ŋgar naol pa pataŋani tiou. Mboŋ ve ndag, lolog isami naghaze nataŋ. Pale koiagŋa tilib payou itaghoni taghoni gha ila? Ŋeez o unum uul ghou?
Yoova, yom Maaron tiou. Matam inim payou, ve ughur taliŋam pa suŋuuŋ tiou tonene. Uul ghou ve ugham tapirig ivot muul. Pa vene, pataŋani tonene itatan ghou ve namaat, ve koiagŋa tipakur taudi tighaze tilib payou. Ighaze you natap ve nagham samia, nene pale koiagŋa tighita ve tinidi iza.
<range>
Eemoghon you nanumeer ghom. Pasa, lolom ineep tuŋia ila to tamtoghon tiom ve uluul di. You lolog poia kat. Pasa, you nawatag: Yom pale ugham mulin ghou pa pataŋani tiou tonene. Tovenen you pale nambou mbouŋ ve napait Yoova iza. Pasa, ye igham poian ghou kat.
Yes kankanooŋa to lolodi imaagh pa Maaron, tigham ŋgar ila lolodi tighaze: “Maaron eta ineep maau.” Ndiran tovene, Maaron lolo padi maau kat. Pasa, ŋgar todi isami wa. Tauto tighamgham ŋgar samsamia naol. Eta igham ŋgar poia maau.
Yoova ineep izi sambam, ve mata izizi pa tamtoghon to taan, ve iŋgagabiiz di. Ye ighaze ighita: Todi eta pale ighilaala, ma maau? Ve eta izuaria tau leso iwatag Maaron? Maau.
Tisob tipul ataam toni ve tisami wa. Eta igham ŋgar poia maau. Maau le maau kat.
Tovenen Yoova igham ŋgar naol ighaze: “Yes to tinoknok ghamuuŋ ŋgar samsamia ne, ledi ghilalooŋ, ma maau? Ŋeez o ŋgar todi ivot? Sawa isob, yes titombaan tamtoghon tiou, ve tipasob mbeb todi le isob kat, tinimale yes to tighan aniiŋ popoia le tipasobi. Matadi iŋgal ghou ve tisuŋ payou maau.”
Eemoghon muri, matughezaaŋ tiina kat pale igham di. Pasa, Maaron pale ivool to tamtoghon deŋiadi to titaghon ataam toni.
Yes mbolaaŋa to tirau mbeb eta maau, yam ndiran samsamia aponpoon ataam padi. Tauto ŋgar todi le anoŋa maau. Eemoghon Yoova tau pale inim ledi inadi to yoŋgaaŋ.
Oyai, Maaron to ineep izi ndug Zion iuul yes Israela, ve ipas di tivot pa pataŋani todi, ghoro poia! Ighaze Yoova iuul tamtoghon toni ve tineep poia muul, nene pale tinidi iza. Onoon kat, Yakop papaghu toni pale lolodi poia le poia kat.
Yoova, sei irau ineep toman ghom ila inam patabuaŋ to suŋuuŋ? Ve sei irau ineep izi lolooz tiom patabuaŋ Zion, ve isuŋ payom?
Tamtoghon to le sosor eta maau, ve laghooŋ toni poia moghon. Ye ighamgham ŋgar deŋia, ve isasavia saveeŋ onoon moghon toman lolo.
Ye iwaghamun tamtoghon izadi maau, ve igham ŋgar samia eta pa ndita maau. Ye iŋgal saveeŋ pa toŋvetaz toni maau, ve inin avo padi maau.
Ndiran samsamia to Maaron ipul muri padi, ye paam ipul muri padi. Ve yes to timatughez pa Yoova ve titaghon ŋgar toni, ye ipapait di. Sa saveeŋ to ye imbua, irau lolo imaagh pani maau. Ighaze ipataŋan pani pa itaghoni, nene poia. Eemoghon ye pale itaghon saveeŋ mbuaaŋ toni.
Ve ighaze ndita tigham bun ila toni, sawa to tiyati, nene pale tiyat yaam anoŋa moghon. Ye irau ipoi pa avua izala pogho maau. Ve ighaze tamtoghon tighaze tigholi leso iŋgal saveeŋ pa yes to ledi sosor maau, ye irau iyok padi maau. Tamtoghon to titaghon ŋgar naol tonene, yes pale tiyoon ariaŋa. Mbeb eta irau igham di ruŋadi iza ne maau.
O Maaron, unum sigeu payou ve uŋgin ghou naneep pooi. Pasa, you nanumeer ghom, ve nayooŋ ilat tiom.
You nasaav pa Yoova: “Yom Tiina tiou. Ighaze naneep saguan payom, irau nandeeŋ mbeb poia eta maau.”
Tamtoghon patabuaŋa to Yoova to tinepneep izi taan, yes popoiadi kat. Ighaze naneep toman di, yes tigham lolog poia le poia kat.
Eemoghon ndiran to timbesmbees pa maaron kaaromŋa, pataŋani naol pale tiza todi. You irau nala toman di pa watooŋrau todi maau. Ve avog irau itut maaron todi izadi rita maau.
You naghita Yoova naghaze ye inimale taan poia eez to tipuli payou pa naneep pani. Irau nambool pa mbeb eta maau. Pasa, you naneep ila ye nima.
Mbeb naol to you nagham di ilat tiom, nene popoiadi moghon. Onoon kat, nepooŋ tiou to Yoova igham payou, nene poia kat, inimale naneep ila taan paghuna eez to tipuli payou.
You napait Yoova pa poia toni. Pasa, ye ighamgham pooz payou leso nataghon ataam poia. Mboŋ paam, ŋgar to ye ighuri ila lolog ne, ipatooŋ ataam payou.
Moghon moghon, matag iŋgalŋgal Yoova naghaze ye ineep toman ghou. Ye inepneep ila pa digeg waan ve ipapalot ghou. Tovenen mbeb eta irau igham ghou ruŋag iza ne maau.
Tauto tinig iza, ve lolog poia kat. Irau namatughez maau. Pasa, yom pale uŋgin ghou naneep pooi.
Irau upul murim payou, ve upul ghou namaat ve nazila ndug to mateeŋa ne maau. Pasa, you tamtoghon tiom. Lolog ineep tuŋia ilat tiom, ve nataghon ataam tiom. Irau upul patug imbuuz ila naal lolo ne maau.
Yom upatooŋ ataam to nepooŋ poia payou. Ighaze naneep toman ghom, nene pale lolog poia kat. Ighaze you naneep ila pa nimam waan, nene pale nayamaan poia tiom itaghoni taghoni gha ila.
O Yoova, ulooŋ taŋiiz tiou tonene, ve uul ghou. Upaghazoŋan ghou ila tamtoghon matadi ughaze you ŋgeu deŋiag. Leso tiwatag tighaze you nagham sosor eta maau. You nasuŋ ghom pa avog uli moghon maau. Nasuŋ ghom toman lolog. Tovenen ughur taliŋam pa suŋuuŋ tiou tonene, ve uul ghou.
Yom ughita mbeb tisob, ve uwatag ughaze you nataghon ŋgar deŋia ila matam. Tovenen uvool tiou ve upaghazoŋan ghou ila tamtoghon matadi ughaze you nagham sosor eta maau.
Yom uŋgabiiz poian ghou, ve utoov ghou. Ve unum utiir ghou pa mboŋ paam. Tauto uwatag katin lolog. Yom uŋgabiiz katin ghou, ve ughita ŋgar samia eta ineep ila lolog maau. Pasa, ŋgar tiou iyaryaaŋ naghaze avog igham sosor eta malep.
You nataghon ŋgar to ndiran pida tighamghami ne maau. Pasa, matag kisin saveeŋ tiom. Tovenen ndiran samsamia to tighamgham malmal, you napaghau taug pa ataam todi.
Sawa isob, nataghon ataam tiom moghon. Agheg iyel pani rita maau.
O Maaron, you nawatag: Moghon moghon, yom uloŋlooŋ suŋuuŋ tiou. Tovenen nataŋ roran ghom naghaze uul ghou. Ughur taliŋam payou, ve ulooŋ aliŋag tonene.
Yom lolom ineep tuŋia ila to tamtoghon tiom ve uluul di. Tovenen ugham uraat gharatooŋadi tintina ve uul ghou. Yes to tiyooŋ ilat tiom, nimam waan pale igham mulin di ila koiadi nimadi, ve tineep pooi.
Uŋgin poian ghou inimale uŋgin taum matam. Upoon ghou inimale tatareek ipakud ndinatu.
Pasa, ndiran samsamia tizuaria di tighaze le tiwaghamun ghou. Koiagŋa tiluvut ghou, ve tighaze tirab ghou namaat.
Lolodi isamin tamtoghon maau. Ve tipapait taudi izadi toman aliŋadi tiina.
Yes titaghon ghou tinim tiluvut ghou wa. Ve matadi deŋia payou tighaze tikokor ghou, ve tiza payou nazila taan.
Yes tinimale laion to pitoola, ve ighaze isaas motin mbeb, leso ighani. Yes tinimale laion paghu to iyooŋ ila su lolo ve isasaŋan.
Yoova, umundig urab koiagŋa lak! Uyoon unum sigeu payou, upoon di, ve utatan tapiridi. Ukas di pa buza tiom, ve ugham mulin ghou ila ndiran samsamia tonene nimadi. Leso naneep pooi.
Ndiran tonene tigham ŋgar tighaze mbeb to taan, nene mbeb tau. Upatooŋ nimam padi, ve ugham mulin ghou ila nimadi. Atia to yom ughaze ugham padi, ugham alulu padi sob. Upasobi pataghaaŋ. Leso tiyamaana kat! Ve ugham tovene pa ndinatudi ve iseeŋga ila iza to nditimbudi paam.
Eemoghon you ŋgeu deŋiag. Tovenen you pale naghita naghom. Sawa to namundig, you pale naneep ila naghom, ve nayamaana naghaze: “Aa, mbeb to nazuaria ghou pani, tauto naghami wa!”

O Yoova, you lolog payom kat, ve naghamgham tapirig ilat tiom.
Yoova iponpoon ghou pa koiagŋa inimale raŋ to izala kat. Ve inim ruum ariaŋa pa nayooŋ ila lolo. Sawa isob, ye ighamgham mulin ghou pa pataŋani tiou. Maaron tiou iponpoon ghou pa ndaab inimale yaam tintina, ve you nayoŋyooŋ ila toni. Ye inim sigeu payou, ve ye Volaaŋa tiou ariaŋa. Ve ye inimale didiiŋ ariaŋa to iluvut ghou.
Iit irau tapait Yoova iza! You napoii pa ulaaŋ, ve ye igham mulin ghou ila koiagŋa nimadi.
Liis to mateeŋ, rismoghon tone iliis ghou. Pataŋani naol titatan ghou tinimale dibom tintina to tipol izala poghog.
Ve ravraav ariaŋa to mateeŋ ikaukau ghou, ve rismoghon tone ighereb ghou nazila ndug to mateeŋa. Tovenen naghita liis to mateeŋ ineep ila matag.
Sawa to naneep ila pataŋani tonowen lolo, you napoi Yoova pa ulaaŋ. Nataŋ roran Maaron tiou naghaze inim iuul ghou. Taŋiiz tiou iŋarua, ve ye ighur taliŋa pani. Ye ineep ila rumai toni lolo, ve ilooŋ aliŋag.
Tovenen igham yoŋgyoog itok taan le taan katkatia, ve lolooz tisob pughudi tirur paam. Pasa, ye ate yabyab kat.
Mbuas ivot pa uzu saambu, ve yab yama toman ŋgiliŋi ivot pa avo, ve ighan suvun mbeb naol.
Ghoro sambam paroŋania ikaak, ve ye iyoon izala yaghur tae asosooŋa, ve izi inim.
Ye ineep izala aŋela toni ariaŋa ndimo, ve iroov inim, inimale yaghur to le bage imbaada ve iroov inim.
Ye ipoon tau pa ndoroom, leso inim le ina to yoŋgaaŋ. Yaghur tae asosooŋa ikaui, ve iŋgooz tau ila lolo.
Ye ineep tonowe toman ŋguruba tiina, ve igham ndug milia. Tauto lalaav kiliŋkiliŋia izi, ve ais patu patu toman yab ŋgiliŋi titaptap tizi pa taan.
Yoova ineep izi sambam, ve isaav toman aliŋa tiina kat, inimale lalaav avolutu. Maaron Tiina To Ilib Pa Ndimaronŋa Tisob Ne aliŋa ivot. Ve yab ŋgiliŋi toman ais patu patu titaptap tizi.
Ye igham lalaav iŋgal koia inimale pane natu toni. Tauto matughezaaŋ tiina igham di, ve tiwaghaughau.
Yoova, sawa to upatooŋ mbalmbali tiom padi, yaghur tiina ivot pa uzum, ve iviviir te ila saguan, le magargaar ivot ighazooŋ. Ve taan pughu to ineep izila sila kat ne ivot peria. Mbeb eta ipoona muul maau.
Ghoro Yoova ineep sala, ve izuzuun nima izi inim ikis ghou, ve indae ghou naza pa mazovan bibiliiŋa lolo.
Koiagŋa tapiridi tintina, ve you narau di maau. Yes tighur koi payou kat. Eemoghon Yoova iuul ghou, ve ipas ghou ila nimadi.
Sawa to naneep ila pataŋani lolo, yes tipamundigin malmal payou. Eemoghon Yoova ipoon ghou ve ipalot ghou.
Ye ipas ghou navot pa pataŋani tiou, ve ighur ghou nala naneep izi ndug poia. Pasa, ye lolo payou kat. Tauto igham mulin ghou ve naneep pooi.
You nataghon ŋgar to deŋia ila Yoova mata. Tauto ye lolo payou ve igham poian ghou. Nimag isosor pa mbeb eta maau. Tauto ye igham leg atia poia.
Pasa, moghon moghon, you nataghon ataam to Yoova. Irau nagham ŋgar samia ve napul murig pa Maaron tiou ne maau.
Pasa, matag kisin tutuuŋ toni tisob. Tutuuŋ toni to tineep pataghaaŋ, you napul murig padi maau.
Tauto leg sosor eta ila mata maau. You naŋgin poian taug, tauto nagham mbeb eta isosor maau.
You naghamgham ŋgar deŋia ve ŋgar ŋgalaaŋa moghon ila Yoova mata. Tauto ye lolo payou ve igham leg atia poia.
Yoova, ighaze tamtoghon eta lolo ineep tuŋia ilat tiom ve itaghon ataam tiom, nene pale lolom ineep tuŋia ila toni paam ve uuli irau sawa isob. Tamtoghon to ighaze le sosor eta maau ve ŋgar toni isob popoia moghon, nene pale yom upamuul ŋgar poia pani paam.
Ve ighaze ŋgeu eta ighamgham ŋgar ŋgalaaŋa moghon, nene pale yom paam ugham ŋgar ŋgalaaŋa pani. Eemoghon yes to ledi ŋgar tiina pa ghamuuŋ kaarom ve ŋgar samia, yom lem ataam naol pa uyat ŋgar todi tonowen.
Tamtoghon to titatan taudi, yom ughamgham mulin di pa pataŋani todi. Eemoghon yes to tipapait taudi ve tiveleg ghom, yom utatan di tizi tinim mbeb sorok.
Yoova, Maaron tiou, yom ugham ghazooŋa tiom isul ghou, ve undiir ndoroom ighau payou, leso naneep pooi.
Yom upapalot ghou. Tauto you irau naparab toman koiagŋa le nalib padi. Maaron tiou inepneep toman ghou. Tovenen you irau nayatov ghou le namalaaŋ pa didiiŋ ariaŋa to iluvut koiagŋa ndug todi, ve nalooŋ nala.
Ataam to Maaron, nene poia le poia kat. Ve saveeŋ toni, nene onoon moghon. Irau taghur ila kat. Tamtoghon tisob to tiyooŋ ila toni, ye inim sigeu padi.
Yoova moghon to Maaron tau. Ite paam maau. Ye moghon to iponpoon ghiit inimale yaam tiina.
Ye ipapalot ghou pa tau tapiri, tauto nayoon ariaŋa. Ve ye iŋgin ghou pa laghooŋ tiou, ve ipatooŋ ataam payou.
Ye igham agheg tuŋia ila taan, ve nalaan ariaŋa nanimale mekmek sagsag. Tovenen sawa to nalaagh ila ndug sapsapi, irau agheg kirikia ve natap maau.
Ye ipatooŋ ghou pa ŋgar to ghamuuŋ malmal, ve ipalot nimag. Tauto you irau nandaad pane ariaŋa to tigharaata pa mbaras.
Yoova, yom unum sigeu payou, ve ugham mulin ghou ila koiagŋa nimadi. Ve nimam waan, tauto ipapalot ghou. Yom uluul ghou, tauto izag inim tiina.
Yom ugharaat poian agheg ina. Tauto agheg kirikia maau, ve nayoon tuŋia pa malmal.
You nalaan taghon koiagŋa nala le navot todi. Ve narab di tisob timatmaat. Eta ineep muul maau.
You narab di le tisob titaptap tizi agheg pughu. Eta irau imundig muul pa igham malmal payou ne maau.
Pasa, yom upapalot ghou pa taum tapirim. Tauto nayoon ariaŋa pa malmal. Yom ughur koiagŋa tinim nimag ve nalib padi.
Yom ugham di titoor di, ve tighau tila. Yes to tighur koi payou ne, you napasob di le tisob kat.
Yes tipoi pa ulaaŋ. Eemoghon eta iuul di maau. Taŋiiz todi iŋarua Yoova paam. Eemoghon ye ilooŋ di maau.
You narab mbirisan di, le tinim ghavuur to yaghur iviviira gha ilale. Ve navazag di tinimale tiiŋ to ineep ila ataam.
Sawa to tamtoghon timundig ve tizoor aliŋag, yom uvool tiou, ve ugham mulin ghou ila nimadi. Ve ughur ghou nanim daba pa ndug ndug. Tamtoghon to taan pida to you nawatag di maau, aazne tineep ila sambag, ve timbesmbees payou.
Ighaze tilooŋ aliŋag, nene rikia moghon ve titaghoni. Ndug ndug tinim ve tiput aghedi payou toman matughezaaŋ tiina.
Pasa, tighilaal tighaze tirau mbeb eta maau. Tauto matughezaaŋ tiina igham di, ve tipul ruum todi ariaŋadi to tiyoŋyooŋ ila lolodi, ve tinim tiou.
Onoon kat, Yoova inepneep! Ye iponpoon ghou inimale yaam tiina. Ye Volaaŋa tiou. Tovenen you napakuri ve napait iza.
Ye ivool tiou, ve iyat ŋgar samsamia to koiagŋa tigham payou. Ve ighur ndug tisob tineep ila sambag.
Ye ipas ghou ila koiagŋa nimadi, ve iuul ghou le nalib padi. Ye igham mulin ghou ila yes to tirabrab tamtoghon ne nimadi.
Tovenen Yoova, you pale nalool ve napait izam ila tamtoghon to ndug ndug lolodi, ve nambou pa napait ghom.
Yoova iuluul yes to ye ighur di tinim kinik. Tauto tiliblib pa malmal tintina. Ye tau ighur David pa igham pooz. Tovenen lolo ineep tuŋia ila toni, ve pale ighur poia toni iza to David toman papaghu toni itaghoni taghoni gha ila.

Mbeb to tineep ila sambam paroŋania, tisob tipatooŋ ghiit tighaze Maaron iza tiina. Mbeb to sala we, nene ye nima muri. Tauto tipatooŋ Maaron tapiri toman ŋgar ve poia toni pait.
Ndag to naol, tisavsaav pait. Ve mboŋ to naol, tipatooŋ ghiit pa ŋgar toni.
Yes ledi avodi to tisavsaav maau. Irau talooŋ aliŋadi maau.
Eemoghon aliŋadi ila irau taan isob. Saveeŋ todi ila irau taan dige to naol. Maaron ighur ndag le ina ila sambam paroŋania, leso ineep pani.
Ndag pusukia iza inimale ŋgeu to ivai paghu, ve ipul ruum toni ve ivot toman tini iza. Ve inimale tamtoghon to landooŋ to igharaat tau leso ilaan toman lolo poia.
Ndag iza pa taan dige eez, ve ila ilib pa dige ite. Ve mbeb eta irau iyooŋ pa mata ne maau.
Saveeŋ isob to Yoova igham pait, nene poia kat ve deŋia moghon. Ve ipariaaŋ ghiit ve igham tapiriid ivot muul. Ataam to Yoova ighuri pa tamtoghon toni, ineep tuŋia tovene. Irau itoora muul maau. Ve ipatooŋ yes to ledi ŋgar tiina maau ne, le ŋgar todi ivot.
Tutuuŋ to Yoova ighur di, nene deŋiadi moghon, ve tigham ghiit lolood poia kat. Tutuuŋ to Yoova inim ghazooŋa pait, ve igham ghiit taghilaal.
Ŋgar to tamatughez pa Yoova ve tataghon ŋgar toni, nene poia. Ŋgar tovene iŋgalaaŋ ila ye mata, ve ineep tovene itaghoni taghoni gha ila. Ve gabizooŋ to Yoova, nene deŋia ve onoon moghon.
Tamtoghon tighita yaam gol tighaze nene mbeb tiina, ve lolodi pani. Eemoghon Yoova saveeŋ toni ilib kat pa gol katindi to ŋgalaŋadi ne. Ve bagil suru tovene paam, poia ve poiawaat ila avood. Eemoghon Yoova saveeŋ toni, nene poia kat le ilib pa bagil suru.
Yoova, you mbesooŋa tiom. Saveeŋ tiom ipaghau ghou pa pataŋani naol. Yes to titaghon saveeŋ tiom, nene pale tigham ledi atia tiina.
Sei irau ighilaal sosor toni le isob? Maau. O Yoova, sosor naol to naghilaal di maau ve nagham di, lolom isamin ghou ve upul di.
You mbesooŋa tiom. Sosor to naghilaal di, upaghau ghou padi. Lolog pa ŋgar tovene igham pooz payou malep. Leso nagham sosor tiina eta sob, ve ŋgar tiou deŋia ila matam.
Tovenen you naghaze le saveeŋ to ivot ila avog, ve ŋgar to ineep ila lolog, isob deŋia ila matam, ve igham ghom lolom poia. O Yoova, yom Volaaŋa tiou ve uponpoon ghou unumale yaam tiina.

Sawa to ighaze yom uneep ila pataŋani lolo, Yoova pale ilooŋ suŋuuŋ tiom ve iuul ghom. Maaron to Yakop, ye iza tiina pa tapiri ve poia toni. Ye pale inim sigeu payom ve iŋgin ghom uneep pooi.
Maaron ineep ila rumai toni patabuaŋ izi lolooz Zion. Ye pale iuul ghom ve ipalot ghom.
Pale mata iŋgal watooŋrau tiom tisob. Irau lolo imaagh padi maau. Watooŋrau tiom to yab ighan suvun di, nene tighami lolo poia.
Ve mbeb to yom lolom pani, ye pale igham payom. Ve sa ŋgar to matam iŋgali ughaze ughami, ye pale igham anoŋa ivot.
Muri, sawa to yom ulib pa koiamŋa, yei pale lolomai poia kat ve nilool. Pale nigham pilak tiei, ve nikakayab di tilala tinimnim, ve nipait Maaron toit iza toman tinimai iza. Mbeb tisob to yom ughason Yoova pani, ye pale ilooŋ ghom ve igham payom.
Ghara nawatag: Yoova pale iuul kinik to ye tau ighuri pa uraat. Ye pale ineep izi ndug toni patabuaŋ sambam, ve ilooŋ suŋuuŋ toni, ve ipaloti pa tau tapiri. Leso ilib pa koia tisob.
Ndiran pida tinumeer karis todi to malmal, ve pida tipakur di pa hos todi. Eemoghon yei ninumeer Maaron tiei Yoova. Ye iza tiina pa tapiri ve poia toni.
Tovenen koiamai pale titaptap tizi. Eemoghon yei pale nimundig ve niyoon ariaŋa pa malmal.
O Yoova, ughur taliŋam pa taŋiiz tiei tonene, ve uul kinik tiei. Leso ilib pa koia.

O Yoova, kinik tiei lolo poia kat. Pasa, yom upaloti pa taum tapirim. Yom uuli pa malmal le ilib pa koia. Tauto tini iza kat.
Mbeb to ye lolo pani ve ighason ghom pani, yom uŋguruuta maau. Yom ugham pani wa.
Yom ula uvot toni, ve upakuri pa mbeb popoia naol. Ve ughur moghar ndamooda milmilia izala daba. Moghar tonowen, tigharaata pa gol to poia kat.
Ye ighason ghom pa uŋgin poiani ila sawa to malmal, leso imaat sob, ve ineep pooi itaghoni taghoni gha ila. Ve yom ulooŋ suŋuuŋ toni.
Yom uuli le ilib pa malmal, tauto iza ivot inim tiina. Ve upambooda pa tapirim ve poia tiom. Tauto varu ilaan irau ndug ndug, ve tamtoghon tipaiti tighaze ye iza tiina kat.
Onoon kat, poia tiom pale izaza toni itaghoni taghoni gha ila. Ve yom uneep tomani. Tauto lolo poia le poia kat.
Kinik tiei inumeer Yoova. Tovenen mbeb eta irau ighami itap ne maau. Pasa, Maaron Tiina To Ilib Pa Ndimaronŋa Tisob Ne, lolo ineep tuŋia ila toni, ve iuluuli itaghon saveeŋ mbuaaŋ toni.
O kinik, nimam pale ikis koiamŋa tisob. Yes to tighur koi payom, nimam waan pale isavag di.
Sawa to upatooŋ tapirim ivot ighazooŋ, yom pale uwaghamun di kat inimale yab tiina ighan mbeb. Onoon kat, mbalmbali to Yoova pale iza todi, ve yab toni ighan suvun di.
Ndinatudi paam, yom pale upasob di pa taan. Tovenen muri, paghu todi eta irau ineep muul maau.
Onoon, yes tikaal ataam payom, ve timbua saveeŋ tighaze tiwaghamun ghom. Eemoghon ŋgar todi samia tonowen irau ighur anoŋa maau.
Sawa to tighita ghom undaad pane natu iŋarua di, yes pale timatughez ve tighau tila.
Yoova, umundig ve upatooŋ tapirim ivot ighazooŋ. Leso nimbou ve nipait izam pa tapirim.

Maaron tiou, Maaron tiou, pughu vena to upul murim payou? Pataŋani tiou igham ghou nataŋ tiina. Pughu vena to uul ghou maau, ve uneep saguan payou?
Maaron tiou, ndag to naol ne, nataŋ roran ghom. Eemoghon yom usavia leg saveeŋ eta maau. Ve mboŋ tovene paam. Ateg izi maau. Nanoknok taŋiiz.
Eemoghon Maaron, you nawatag: Yom patabuaŋ. Yom uneep ila inam to ghamuuŋ pooz, ve yes Israela tipapait ghom.
Muuŋ ve inim, nditimbumai tinumeer ghom. Yes tighur ilat tiom, ve yom upas di tivot pa pataŋani todi.
Sawa to titaŋ roran ghom, yom ugham mulin di pa pataŋani todi. Yes tinumeer ghom, ve yom uul di. Tovenen tighur matadi payom sorok maau.
Eemoghon you, tamtoghon tighita ghou nanimale you tamtoghon maau. Matadi izi payou, ve tiveleg ghou tighaze you mbeb sorok nanimale motmoot to taan lolo.
Tamtoghon tisob to tighita ghou, dabadi katia payou, ve tighaze: ‘Aa, ughita wa?” Ve tiŋiŋ payou, ve tipiyaav saveeŋ velegiiŋ naol payou.
Tisavsaav payou tighaze: “Yom ughaze unumeer Yoova? Poia. Ighaze venen, ghoro taneep ve taghita. Ighaze ye lolo payom kat, ye pale iuul ghom, ve igham mulin ghom pa pataŋani tiom.”
Eemoghon Yoova, yom to ughur ghou navot pooi ila tinaŋ apo. Ve sawa to naghunghun tuz, yom ugham payamyam payou pooi.
Sawa to tinaŋ ipoop ghou, tighur ghou nalat nanim lem, leso uŋgin ghou. Tauto sawa tonowen ve inim, you nanumeer ghom naghaze yom Maaron tiou.
Tovenen uneep saguan payou malep. Pasa aazne, pataŋani tiina ighaze ivot payou. Ve leg tamtoghon eta to iuul ghou maau.
Ughita. Koiagŋa katindi tinim tiluvut ghou. Tapiridi tintina tinimale makau nditamoot to Basan to bide tapiridi.
Yes tinimale laion to tikakaak avodi ve livodi imasis iŋarua ghou. Ve lolodi ŋuria tighaze tisaas ghou ve tighan ghou.
Tovenen tapirig isob kat, nanimale ya to ineep ila uur lolo ve tiliŋi ilale. Tuag tisob goloŋia. Tovenen nayamaan taug naghaze irau nagham mbeb eta maau. Ve matughezaaŋ tiina igham ghou, ve lolog imbumbu naghaze paam namaat.
Ŋgarsuag imamaas ve irau natoon ŋazubag maau. Yom upul ghou nagheen izala ghavuur, ve paam namaat.
Koiagŋa katindi tinim tiluvut ghou tinimale ŋgavuun ketooŋ, ve timorau agheg ve nimag.
Ve tuag tisob timareer. Tovenen koiagŋa tiyoon ve timbatut ghou, ve lolodi poia kat. Pasa, nasami wa.
Yes tighaze pa namaat wa. Tauto tighaze tirei nonogiiŋa tiou toman mbeb tiou pida irau di. Tovenen tiŋgozŋgooz, leso tighita sei to pale igham sa mbeb.
Yoova, uneep saguan payou malep. Ulaaŋa tiou, unum rikia ve uul ghou!
Upoon ghou pa buza to mateeŋ. Upaghau ghou pa ŋgavuun samsamia tonene. Pa vene, tiwaghamun ghou.
Ugham mulin ghou ila laion tonene avo, ve upaghau ghou pa makau sagsagŋa tonene ndoŋadi. Aa, ghara naghita naghaze yom ulooŋ ghou!
Tovenen you pale navotia mbeb to ugham payou ne pa nditag. Sawa to tamtoghon tiom tilup di pa suŋuuŋ, you pale nala toman di, ve napait izam.
Yam to amatughez pa Yoova ve ataghon ŋgar toni, apaiti. Yam siŋ to Yakop, apait Yoova iza pa tapiri ve poia toni. Yam Israela asob, aroron ve amatughez pani.
Pasa, yes to timbadbaad pataŋani ve tighur matadi pa Yoova, ye irau ighita pataŋani todi inimale mbeb sorok ne maau. Pale iuul di. Irau iveleg di, ma ipul muri padi ne maau. Tovenen sawa to titaŋ rorani pa ledi ulaaŋ, ye pale ilooŋ taŋiiz todi ve iuul di.
Yoova, ighaze tamtoghon tiom tilup di pa suŋuuŋ tiina, you pale nalool ve napait izam ila matadi, ve napakur ghom pa ŋgar to ugham payou. You pale nataghon saveeŋ mbuaaŋ tiou, ve nagham watooŋrau payom ila yes to timatughez payom ve titaghon ŋgar tiom ne matadi.
Watooŋrau to nagham pa napait Yoova, yes mbolaaŋa pale tighan pida le apodi isuŋ. Ve yes to tizuaria di pa Yoova, pale tipaiti. Ye tau pale igham poian di, ve tineep pooi itaghoni taghoni gha ila.
Tamtoghon irau taan dige to naol ne, pale matadi iŋgal Yoova, ve titoor ŋgar todi imuul ila pani. Ndug naol pale tisob tiput aghedi pani ve tipaiti.
Pasa, Yoova, ye kinik tiina. Ye iŋgin tamtoghon tisob to taan, ve ighamgham pooz padi.
Tovenen mbaliiŋ taudi to taan pale tisob tiput aghedi pani ve tipaiti. Ve ila ila le yes to tigharau tighaze timaat ve tinim ghavuur ne paam, pale tiput aghedi pani ve tipaiti.
Papaghu toit pale timbees pa Yoova. Yes to tivot muri, pale tilooŋ Yoova varu.
Yes to tipoop di muri, tamtoghon pale tisavia ŋgar deŋia to Yoova padi, ve tipaes padi pa ataam to ye igham mulin tamtoghon toni.
Yoova, ye ŋginiiŋ tiou poia. Irau nambool pa mbeb eta maau.
Ye igheghereb ghou nala pa kikiliiŋ popoia to ineep ya naliu dige. Leso naghan, naghun ya luuma, ve ateg izi.
Ye igham tapirig ivot muul, ve ipasaluŋgan ghou le nataghon ataam to deŋia ila mata. Leso ipaghazoŋan iza tiina ivot ighazooŋ.
Yoova, ighaze nalaagh ila ndug sapsapi to mateeŋ, ve ndoroom tiina ikau ghou, nene irau namatughez maau. Pasa, yom uneep toman ghou. You naghita ghom ukis ndaab tiom toman titi to upasaluŋgan sipsip pani, tovenen ateg izi.
You nanim loom payom, ve upakur ghou kat. Yom ugham ghanghaniiŋ tiina payou ila koiagŋa matadi. Ve uliŋ ŋgoreeŋ izala dabag, ve ugham poian ghou kat.
Onoon kat, sawa isob to naneep izi taan, yom lolom ineep tuŋia inim tiou, ve poia tiom izaza tiou itaghon saveeŋ mbuaaŋ tiom. Rumai tiom pale inim inag to nepooŋ le irau sawa tiou isob.
Taan toman mbeb tisob to tineep ila, nene to Yoova. Ndug tisob toman tamtoghon to tineep ila, nene toni moghon.
Pasa, ye to ighur taan ipot izala te pogho. Ve ipariaaŋ taan pughu ineep tuŋia izila te lolo to sila kat we.
Sei irau izala lolooz to Yoova ve isuŋ pani? Ve sei irau ilooŋ ila rumai toni patabuaŋ, ve iyoon ila mata?
Tamtoghon tovene: Ye igham sosor eta maau. Ve ŋgar isob to ineep ila lolo, nene ŋgalaaŋa moghon. Ye ipait maaron kaaromŋa maau, ve iwaat Maaron iza sorok pa ipalot saveeŋ kaarom maau.
Tamtoghon tovene, poia to Yoova pale iza toni. Maaron to Volaaŋa toni ne, pale igham mulini ve ineep pooi, ve ipatooŋa ighaze ye ŋgeu deŋia.
Ndiran tovene tizuaria di pa Maaron. Yes tighaze tila tivot to Maaron to Yakop nagho, ve tisuŋ pani.
O yam ataam, akaak ve tinimim iza. Yam ataam to muuŋ kat tigharaat gham, tinimim iza, ve akaak le akaak kat. Leso soso irau kinik to iza tiina pa tapiri ve poia toni, itaghoni ilooŋ ila.
Laak, kinik to iza tiina pa tapiri ve poia toni, nene sei? Nene Yoova. Ye ariaŋa, ve tapiri tiina. Ve ye iraua kat pa malmal.
O yam ataam, akaak ve tinimim iza. Yam ataam to muuŋ kat tigharaat gham, tinimim iza, ve akaak le akaak kat. Leso soso irau kinik to iza tiina pa tapiri ve poia toni, itaghoni ilooŋ ila.
Laak, kinik to iza tiina pa tapiri ve poia toni, nene sei? Nene Yoova. Ye Maaron ariaŋa, ve iŋgin mbeb tisob. Onoon kat, ye kinik to iza tiina pa tapiri ve poia toni.
O Yoova, naghur taug nalat tiom, ve nasuŋ ghom.
Maaron tiou, you nanumeer ghom. Upul koiagŋa titatan ghou malep. Pa vene, tipakur di tighaze tilib payou, ve tigham ghou mayag.
Tamtoghon tisob to tinaam pa ulaaŋ tiom, yes irau tighur matadi payom sorok ve mayadi ne maau. Eemoghon tamtoghon to tipul muridi payom, yes pale mayadi.
Yoova, upatooŋ ataam tiom payou. Upaghazoŋan ŋgar tiou pani, leso nataghoni kat.
Ugham pooz payou, leso laghooŋ tiou deŋia itaghon saveeŋ tiom. Ve upaghazoŋan ghou pa ŋgar tiom. Pasa, yom Maaron tiou ve Volaaŋa tiou. Mboŋmaagh le ravrav izi, you naghurghur matag payom.
Yoova, muuŋ ve inim, lolom isamin tamtoghon ve uluul di. Ve lolom ineep tuŋia ila to tamtoghon tiom, ve poia tiom izaza todi. Matam iŋgal ŋgar tiom tonanan.
Sosor ve ŋgar to didiaaŋ to you pain ghou ve naghamgham di, matam iŋgal di malep. Yoova, yom poiam, ve lolom ineep tuŋia ila to tamtoghon tiom ve uluul di itaghon saveeŋ mbuaaŋ tiom. Tovenen matam iŋgal ghou ve uul ghou!
Yoova ŋgar toni, nene poia ve deŋia moghon. Tovenen ndiran to tiyel pa ŋgar toni, ye ipasaluŋgan di pa ataam toni.
Ve yes to titatan taudi ve tinumeer Maaron moghon, ye igheghereb di ve ipatooŋ ataam toni padi, leso titaghon ŋgar deŋia.
Yes to matadi kisin saveeŋ mbuaaŋ todi toman Yoova, ve titaghon ataam to ye ighuri pa tamtoghon toni, ye lolo ineep tuŋia ila todi ve iuluul di itaghon saveeŋ mbuaaŋ toni.
O Yoova, you nagham sosor naol. Eemoghon izam tiina pa ŋgar tiom to lolom isasamin yei tamtoghon. Tovenen ureu sosor tiou.
Tamtoghon tisob to timatughez pa Yoova ve tighaze titaghon ŋgar toni, ye pale ipatooŋ di pa ataam. Leso tiwatag sa ataam to yes irau titaghoni.
Ndiran tovene, nepooŋadi pale poia kat. Ve ndinatudi paam, pale tineep pooi izi taan to Yoova igham pa tamtoghon toni.
Yes to timatughez pa Yoova ve titaghon ŋgar toni, tinim ndita kat. Tovenen ye ivovotia ŋgar toni yoŋgaaŋ padi, ve ipatooŋ di pa ataam to yesŋa tilup di tinim ee moghon itaghon saveeŋ mbuaaŋ toni.
Sawa isob, you naghurghur matag pa Yoova naghaze ye pale iuul ghou. Pale ipas agheg pa liis to koiagŋa tighuri payou.
Yoova, you mbesooŋa tiom. Tovenen matam imuul inim payou. Lolom isamin ghou, ve uul ghou pa pataŋani tiou. Pasa, you eŋgengou moghon. Leg itag ite pa iuul ghou pa pataŋani tiou tonene maau.
Lolog ipataŋan kat ve nagham ŋgar naol. Pasa, leg ataam eta maau. Upas ghou navot pa pataŋani tiou tonene.
Ughita pataŋani tiina to ivot payou ve itatan ghou ne, ve uul ghou. Ve ureu sosor tiou tisob tilaledi.
Ughita. Koiagŋa, yes ival. Ve atedi yabyab payou kat. Tighaze le tiwaghamun ghou.
Eemoghon you nanumeer ghom naghaze yom pale ugham mulin ghou ila koiagŋa nimadi, ve uŋgin ghou naneep pooi. You nayooŋ ilat tiom. Tovenen upul di tilib payou malep. Ighaze maau, pale mayag.
Yoova, ŋgar tiou iyaryaaŋ naghaze nataghon ŋgar popoia to deŋia moghon ila matam. Tovenen yom pale upoon ghou pa mbeb samsamia to naol ne. Pasa, you naghur matag pa ulaaŋ tiom.
O Maaron, upas tamtoghon tiom Israel tivot pa pataŋani todi tisob.
O Yoova, you naghaze yom upaghazoŋan ghou ila tamtoghon matadi ughaze you ŋgeu deŋiag. Pasa, laghooŋ tiou, you nataghon ŋgar deŋia moghon. Ve naghur ilat tiom ariaŋa. Lolog ru payom maau.
Yoova, uŋgabiiz ghou, ve utoov ghou. Utiir poian lolog ve ŋgar tiou, ve ughita: You naneep deŋiag ila matam, ma maau?
Moghon moghon, matag iŋgalŋgal ŋgar tiom to lolom ineep tuŋia ila to tamtoghon tiom ve uluul di. Yom utaghon saveeŋ tiom irau sawa isob. Gabuam tonanan ipapalot ghou pa laghooŋ tiou, tauto nataghon ataam tiom.
Yeiŋa ndiran kaaromŋa niluplup ghei maau. Yes to tiparim taudi pa ghurla todi, you nala toman di maau.
You naghur koi pa yes to tighamgham ŋgar samsamia, ve naneep saguan padi. Ighaze ndiran samsamia tilup di, irau naneep toman di maau.
O Yoova, you nataghon ŋgar deŋia moghon. Tauto namen nimag inim ghilalooŋ payou ighaze leg sosor eta maau. Ve nalaagh luvutin artaal to tighamgham watooŋrau payom izala, ve nasuŋ payom.
You pale nambou mbouŋ toman lolog poia ve napait ghom, ve navotia uraat tiom gharatooŋadi to ite kat.
Yoova, you lolog pa rumai tiom kat. Pasa, nene inam to nepooŋ. Yom upatooŋ tapirim ve ŋgurubam toman poia tiom ivotvot tonowe.
Yes to tiyel pa ataam tiom, upasob ghou toman di malep. Ve yes to tirabrab tamtoghon le naghodi siŋ, urab ghou namaat toman di malep.
Ndiran tovene, nimadi igharghaar pa ghamuuŋ ŋgar samsamia naol. Ve ighaze tighol di pa tigham ŋgar samia eta, nene tiyok moghon ve tighami.
Eemoghon laghooŋ tiou, you nataghon ŋgar deŋia moghon. O Yoova, you mbesooŋa tiom. Lolom isamin ghou ve ugham mulin ghou.
You nayoon tuŋia ila taan raapa. Irau natap maau. Tovenen sawa to tamtoghon tiom tilup di pa suŋuuŋ, you pale nala toman di, ve napait ghom pa poia tiom.
Yoova inim ghazooŋa payou, ve ye Volaaŋa tiou. Pale namatughez pa sei? Maau. Pasa, you nanumeer Yoova. Ye inim ruum ariaŋa pa nayooŋ ila lolo. Tauto namatughez pa mbeb eta maau.
Ighaze ndiran samsamia tipamundigin malmal payou, ve koiagŋa tighaze tiwaghamun ghou, nene pale Yoova igham aghedi ilot, ve titap.
Ighaze ndaaba katindi tinim tiluvut ghou pa tigham malmal, irau lolog imbumbu ve namatughez padi maau. Ighaze malmal imundig, ve koiagŋa tiŋarua ghou tinim, you pale nanumeer Maaron ve nayoon ariaŋa.
Mbeb ee moghon to you lolog pani kat. Tauto naghaze naghason Yoova pani. Sawa isob to naneep izi taan, you naghaze le naneep toman Yoova ila rumai toni lolo, ve naghita poia toni. You naghaze naneep ila rumai toni lolo, leso naghasoni pa ipatooŋ tau ve ŋgar toni payou.
Ighaze pataŋani tiina eta ivot payou, ye pale iŋgin ghou naneep pooi ila nima samba. Pale iŋgooz ghou ila rumai toni lolo. Ve ye pale isur ghou nazala raŋ to sala we, leso koiagŋa tigham mbeb eta payou sob.
Onoon, aazne, koiagŋa tinim tiluvut ghou. Eemoghon namatughez maau. Pasa, Yoova pale iuul ghou ve nalib padi. Tovenen tinig iza, ve nalool ve napait iza. Nagham watooŋrau pani ila rumai toni lolo, ve nambou ve narab gita pa napait iza.
Yoova, ighaze nataŋ roran ghom pa ulaaŋ, ulooŋ taŋiiz tiou. Lolom isamin ghou ve uul ghou. Pasa, you mbesooŋa tiom.
Yom usaav payou ughaze: “Unum usuŋ payou, leso napatooŋ taug payom.” Tauto lolog naghaze nalat tiom, ve upatooŋ taum payou.
You mbesooŋa tiom. Uŋgooz matam payou malep. Atem yabyab ve uzurun ghou malep. Maaron, muuŋ ve inim, yom moghon to Volaaŋa tiou. Tovenen upul ghou, ve upul murim payou malep.
Ighaze tamaŋ ve tinaŋ tipul muridi payou, nene pale Yoova tau igham ghou ve iŋgin ghou.
Yoova, upaghazoŋan ghou pa ataam tiom. Umuuŋ payou ve upatooŋ ghou pa ataam deŋia. Pasa, koiagŋa katindi tisasaŋan ghou.
Upul ghou nala nimadi malep! Pasa, yes tiŋgal saveeŋ kaarom naol payou, ve tighamgham saveeŋ matughezaaŋ payou.
Eemoghon you naghur ila naghaze yes irau tiwaghamun ghou maau. You pale naneep matag iyaryaar, ve naghita poia to Yoova.
Tovenen yom to ughur ila to Yoova, you nasaav payom naghaze: “Unumeer Yoova, ve ughur matam pani. Umatughez malep. Lolom ee moghon, uyoon ariaŋa, ve usaŋan pa ulaaŋ toni.”
Yoova, yom uponpoon ghou pa koiagŋa unumale yaam tiina. Tovenen taŋiiz tiou ilat payom. Ughur taliŋam pa suŋuuŋ tiou tonene ve uul ghou lak! Ighaze ulooŋ ghou maau, ve neneeŋam moghon, nene pale nanim yes to timaat ve tizila saambu to yes mateeŋa.
Aazne, you nakaak nimag iza iŋarua rumai tiom lolo to patabuaŋ kat, ve nataŋ roran ghom pa ulaaŋ. Ulooŋ taŋiiz tiou tonene, ve lolom isamin ghou. Pasa, you mbesooŋa tiom.
Sawa to yom ughur atia pa ndiran samsamia, uweu ghou nala toman di malep. Yes to tinoknok ghamuuŋ sosor, nalaleg toman di malep. Ndiran tonowen tisasavia saveeŋ poia pa nditadi tighaze lolodi padi. Eemoghon ŋgar to ineep ila lolodi, nene ite. Tighaze tiwaghamun di.
Yes tikaria ghamuuŋ sosor wa. Tovenen ughur atia padi, ve uŋgal matadi. Leso uyat ŋgar todi samia tonowen. Ugham tovene, ghoro deŋia. Pasa, ŋgar to tighamghami, poia maau.
Uraat tintina to Yoova nima ighamgham di, yes tigham ŋgar pani maau. Tovenen ye pale ireu mbirisan di ve tilaledi kat, tinimale ruum to tireu mbirisani, ve irau tireii muul maau.
You napait Yoova pa poia toni. Pasa, you nataŋ rorani pa iuul ghou, ve ilooŋ taŋiiz tiou.
You naghamgham tapirig ila to Yoova, ve ye inim sigeu payou. You naghur ila toni ariaŋa ila lolog, ve iuluul ghou. Tovenen lolog poia le poia kat, ve napait iza pa poia toni ila mbouŋ.
Yoova tamtoghon toni tighamgham tapiridi ila toni. Ve kinik to Yoova tau ighuri pa uraat toni, ye iuluuli ve iponpoona pa koia inimale didiiŋ ariaŋa.
Yoova, yom usia tamtoghon tiom tinim lem kat. Ugham mulin di pa pataŋani todi, ve ughur poia tiom iza todi. Matam pa sipsip tiom, ve uŋgin poian di. To aazne, ve itaghoni taghoni gha ila.
Yam aŋela ariaŋamim to sambam, apakur Yoova. Apait iza pa tapiri ve poia toni.
Apait Yoova! Pasa, ye iza tiina kat. Ye ipambood tau pa ŋgar toni patabuaŋ. Tovenen aput aghemim pani ve apaiti.
Yoova aliŋa ila irau te dige to naol ne. Maaron to iza tiina ne aliŋa, nene inimale lalaav avolutu. Yoova isaav toman aliŋa tiina izala te pogho.
Yoova aliŋa tapiri tiina. Aliŋa ipatooŋa ighaze ye iza tiina kat.
Yoova aliŋa iŋgalŋgal balagin ai mendepur tintina to Lebanon. Aliŋa iŋgalŋgal mbirisan di.
Yoova aliŋa itok lolooz tintina to Lebanon, le tiyatovtov di tinimale makau ndinatu papaghu to tinidi iza. Ve itok lolooz Ermon, le iyatovtova inimale bapolo sagsagŋa ndinatudi to tinidi iza.
Yoova aliŋa igham ndug milia, ve yab ighan.
Ve itok taan to ndug balim le irur. Igham ndug balim to Kades katkatia ilala inimnim.
Yoova aliŋa igham mekmek sagsagŋa to apodi ne, ruŋadi iza le tipoop pataghaaŋ. Ve igham ai raua tisob kurukia tizi. Tovenen tamtoghon tisob to tilup di pa suŋuuŋ ila rumai toni lolo, tisaav toman aliŋadi tiina tighaze: “Tapait Yoova iza. Pasa, ye tapiri tiina kat!”
Muuŋ, yawaaŋa ivot toman tapiri ve itatab taan. Sawa tonenen, Yoova ineep ila ina to ghamuuŋ pooz ve iŋgini. Aazne paam, ye kinik to ineep ila ina to ghamuuŋ pooz. Pooz toni pale inepneep tovene itaghoni taghoni gha ila.
Yoova ighamgham tapiri pa tamtoghon toni. Pale ighur poia toni izaza todi, ve iŋgin di tineep pooi toman lolodi luuma.

O Yoova, you napait izam. Pasa, sawa to naneep ila pataŋani tiina lolo, yom ugham mulin ghou, ve undae ghou naza muul. Inimale yom upul ghou namaat, tone koiagŋa lolodi poia, ve tipakur di tighaze tilib payou.
O Yoova, Maaron tiou, you nataŋ roran ghom pa ulaaŋ. Ve yom upasob moroghooŋ tiou, ve tinig poia wa.
Rismoghon tone namaat ve nazila ndug to mateeŋa. Eemoghon yom uul ghou, tauto namundig muul, ve aazne naneep pooi.
Yam tamtoghon to Yoova to lolomim ineep tuŋia ila toni ve ataghon ataam toni, apaiti ila mbouŋ tiam. Yoova, ye patabuaŋ. Tapiri ve ŋgar toni, nene ite kat. Tovenen lolomim poia pani, ve apait iza pa poia toni.
Mbalmbali toni ineep mala maau. Ineep ris, ve isob. Eemoghon poia toni, nene izaza toit irau sawa to taneep izi taan. Ighaze tataŋ pa mboŋ, mboŋmaagh, ye pale igham ghiit lolood poia muul.
Sawa to nepooŋ tiou poia moghon, you nasaav naghaze: “Pataŋani eta irau ivot payou ve itok ghou ne maau.”
Pasa, yom ughamgham poian ghou ve upapalot ghou. Tauto napait taug naghaze you pale naneep tuŋia tovene irau sawa isob, nanimale lolooz tintina. Eemoghon sawa to uŋgooz matam payou, matughezaaŋ tiina igham ghou le nasaŋeeŋ.
Sawa tonenen, napoi ghom ve nataŋ roran ghom naghaze lolom isamin ghou ve uul ghou. You nasaav payom naghaze:
“O Yoova, ighaze namaat ve nazila ndug to mateeŋa, nene pale mateeŋ tiou iuul sei? Ughita. Mateeŋa to tizila taan lolo ve tinim ghavuur, todi eta irau ipait ghom? Ma todi eta irau ivotia ŋgar tiom to utataghon saveeŋ mbuaaŋ tiom? Maau.
Tovenen Yoova, ulooŋ suŋuuŋ tiou tonene. Lolom isamin ghou ve uul ghou lak! Pasa, you mbesooŋa tiom.”
Aa ghara upasob taŋiiz tiou! Tovenen you pale tinig iza ve nator. Yom upasob pataŋani tiou, ve ududuum uli to moŋiiŋ izi pa tinig. Yom ugham ghou lolog poia kat, ve naneep ila poia tiom lolo.
Tovenen irau neneeŋag maau. You pale nambou ve napait izam toman lolog. Yoova, yom Maaron tiou. You pale napait ghom pa poia tiom to aazne, ve itaghoni taghoni gha ila.

O Yoova, you nanumeer ghom ve nayooŋ ilat tiom. Upul koiagŋa titatan ghou malep. Pa vene, tigham ghou mayag. Ŋgar tiom deŋia. Tovenen ugham mulin ghou.
Ughur taliŋam pa suŋuuŋ tiou, ve rikia uul ghou! Yom Volaaŋa tiou ariaŋa. Yom uponpoon ghou unumale raŋ to izala kat. Ve unum ruum ariaŋa pa nayooŋ ila lolo. Leso mbeb eta iwaghamun ghou sob, ve naneep pooi.
Onoon kat. Yom Volaaŋa tiou ariaŋa. Yom uponpoon ghou unumale raŋ to izala kat. Ve unum ruum ariaŋa pa nayooŋ ila lolo. Umuuŋ payou ve upatooŋ ataam payou, leso upaghazoŋan izam tiina ivot ighazooŋ.
Ughita liis to koiagŋa tighuri payou, ve upaghau ghou pani. Pasa, yom to unum inag to yoŋgaaŋ.
Yoova, yom Maaron to utataghon saveeŋ mbuaaŋ tiom. Aazne, you naghur taug ilat nimam. Ugham mulin ghou pa pataŋani tonene.
You nanumeer Yoova moghon. Tovenen yes to tighurghur mbeb soroksorok tinim maaron padi ve timbesmbees padi, you naghur koi padi.
You tinig iza ve lolog poia payom. Pasa, lolom ineep tuŋia ila to tamtoghon tiom ve uluul di. Sawa to lolog ipataŋan kat, ve ateg imbumbu, yom ughita pataŋani tiou ve uul ghou.
Yom upul ghou nala koiagŋa nimadi maau. Yom upas ghou navot pa pataŋani tiou, ve ughur ghou naneep pooi ila ndug ghazooŋa.
Yoova, you mbesooŋa tiom. Lolom isamin ghou ve uul ghou lak! Pasa aazne, pataŋani tiina igham ghou le lolog ipataŋan. You nataŋ tiina le matag isarsar, ve tapirig isob kat.
Lolog ipataŋan kat ve nayakyak irau sawa isob. Pataŋani tonene pale iŋgoor sawa tiou inim tuku. Igham ghou nayamaan taug naghaze tapirig isob. You nakoŋkoŋ kat le tuag tisob timareer.
Koiagŋa tisob tigham ŋalalaŋ payou. Ve yes to tineep tigharau ghou ne paam, tipamogheran di payou. Nditag lolodi pa tinim tigharau ghou maau. Ve yes to tighita ghou izi ataam, timatughez ve tilaagh pa ataam dige ite.
Tamtoghon matadi iŋgal ghou muul maau. Tighita ghou nanimale namaat wa. You nanimale uur to ivavaal, ve tipiyaava ilale.
You nalooŋ ival tiina tikakamuun payou. Koiagŋa tilup di, ve tikaal ataam pa tirab ghou namaat. Tovenen pataŋani naol tiluvut ghou, le matughezaaŋ tiina igham ghou.
Eemoghon Yoova, you nanumeer ghom. Tauto nasaav payom naghaze: “Yom moghon to Maaron tiou.”
Sawa to naneep izi taan, sa mbeb ma ŋgar to ighaze ivot payou, you naneep ila nimam. Upas ghou ila koiagŋa nimadi, ve upoon ghou pa yes to tighamgham lilin ghou.
You mbesooŋa tiom. Lolom poia payou, ve ugham poian ghou. Yom lolom ineep tuŋia ila to tamtoghon tiom ve uluul di. Tovenen ugham mulin ghou pa pataŋani tonene.
Yoova, you nataŋ roran ghom pa ulaaŋ. Upul koiagŋa titatan ghou malep. Pa vene, tigham ghou mayag. Utatan ndiran samsamia tonowen tapiridi, leso mayadi. Ve upiyaav di tizila ndug to mateeŋa, leso neneeŋadi.
Upoon avodi. Pasa, yes ndiran to kaarom. Tipapait taudi, ve tiveveleg tamtoghon deŋiadi, ve tipiyaav saveeŋ samsamia naol padi.
O Yoova, poia tiom, nene tiina le tiina kat. Yes to timatughez payom, ve titaghon ataam tiom, yom ughur ledi mbeb popoia naol tisasaŋan di. Yes to tinumeer ghom, ve tiyoŋyooŋ ilat tiom, yom pale ugham poian di ila ival tiina matadi.
Yom uŋgooz di tila digem. Tovenen koiadi to tikalkaal ataam pa tirab di timaat, irau tigham mbeb eta padi maau. Yom uŋgin di tineep pooi ila nimam samba. Tovenen saveeŋ samsamia to koiadi tipipiyaava padi, irau iwaghamun di maau.
You napait Yoova pa poia toni. Pasa, lolo ineep tuŋia inim tiou, ve igham ŋgar poia kat payou. Sawa to koiagŋa tiluvut ghou pa tigham malmal payou, ye iuul ghou.
Papazogi, you namatughez naghaze Yoova indiir ghou naghau pa mata wa. Eemoghon maau. You nataŋ rorani pa iuul ghou, ve ilooŋ taŋiiz tiou, ve igham mulin ghou pa pataŋani tiou.
Yam tamtoghon to Yoova to lolomim ineep tuŋia ila toni ve ataghon ataam toni, aghur lolomim pani kat. Yes to titaghon aliŋa, ye pale iŋgin di tineep pooi. Eemoghon yes to tipapait taudi ve tivelegi, ye pale ighur atia padi, ve iyat katin ŋgar todi tonowen.
Tovenen yam to anumeer Yoova ve aghurghur matamim pani, amatughez malep. Apariaaŋ taumim, ve ayoon ariaŋa!
Tamtoghon to ighaze izoor Maaron aliŋa ve iyel pa ataam toni, ighaze Maaron ireu sosor toni ilale, ye pale tini iza pa poia to Maaron to iza toni.
Onoon kat, tamtoghon to ighaze ŋgar to kaarom eta ineep ila lolo maau, ve Yoova ighita ighaze ye le sosor eta maau, ye pale tini iza pa poia to Maaron to iza toni.
Sawa to naŋgooz sosor tiou, tuag tisob tiyabyab le tapirig isob. Ve nayakyak irau mboŋ ve ndag.
O Yoova, onoon kat, sawa tonenen, nayamaan katin nimam irau mboŋ ve ndag. Tauto igham tapirig isob kat nanimale ya to ndag ighaaz le imaak.
Naneep le maau, ghoro navotia sosor tiou payom. Ŋgar tiou samia, naŋgooza muul maau. Sawa tonenen, you naghaze: “Ŋgar tiou to zoraaŋ Yoova aliŋa, you pale navotia ila toni.” Tovenen navotia sosor tiou payom, ve ureua ilale.
Tovenen tamtoghon tisob to lolodi ineep tuŋia ilat tiom, ve titaghon ataam tiom, ighaze pataŋani eta igham di, yes irau tisuŋ payom. Ighaze pataŋani tiina kat ivot padi inimale yawaaŋa to ivot toman tapiri, yom pale uul di, leso pataŋani itatan di sob.
Maaron, yom unum inag to yoŋgaaŋ. Yom upoon ghou pa pataŋani, ve ugham mulin ghou. Tauto ival tiina to tiluvut ghou ne, timbou ve tipait izam toman aliŋadi tiina.
Ve Yoova isaav payou ighaze: “You pale napaghazoŋan ŋgar tiom, ve napatooŋ ghom pa ataam to naghaze utaghoni. You pale matag payom, ve nauul ghom pa ŋgar poia.
Tovenen ugham ŋgar pooi. Dabam ariaŋa inimale hos ma esele malep. Yes ledi ŋgar maau. Tauto tamtoghon tighurghur ain suruvu toman waar ila avodi, leso tipasaluŋgan di pa laghooŋ, ve titaghon ŋgar todi.”
Ndiran samsamia, pataŋani naol pale igham di. Ve yes to tinumeer Yoova, ye pale lolo ineep tuŋia ila todi, ve tineep ila poia toni lolo.
Yam ndiran to ataghon ŋgar deŋia, lolomim poia, ve tinimim iza pa poia to Yoova. Yam to ŋgar poia ineep ariaŋa ila lolomim, asob lolomim poia pa Yoova ve alool ve apaiti!
Yam to ataghon ŋgar deŋia, lolomim poia pa Yoova, ve alool ve apaiti. Yam to aghamgham ŋgar poia, apait Yoova iza, ghoro deŋia.
Apambar ambam, ve arab gita, ve apakur Yoova. Arab mbeb naol, ve apaiti ila mbouŋ to popoia kat.
Ambou mbouŋ paghu pani, ve arab poian gita. Leso mbouŋ tiam paghuna. Ambou tiina, ve apaiti toman lolomim poia!
Pasa saveeŋ to Yoova, nene onoon ve deŋia moghon. Uraat naol to ighamgham di, nene ipatooŋa ighaze ye itataghon saveeŋ mbuaaŋ toni.
Ye lolo pa ŋgar deŋia ve ŋgar to gharatooŋ pataŋani to tamtoghon le deŋia. Ve lolo ineep tuŋia ila to tamtoghon toni ve iuluul di. Ŋgar tonene, ye ipatooŋa irau taan isob.
Muuŋ, saveeŋ to Yoova moghon, tauto mbeb to sambam paroŋania tisob tivot. Avo isaav, ve ndag, kaiyo, ve pitum tisob tivot ila sambam paroŋania.
Ye igham te ila ilupi ila dige ee moghon. Mazovan to muuŋ kat itatab taan, ye ighur poiani ila ina.
Yam to aneep irau taan, amatughez pa Yoova ve ataghon ŋgar toni. Yam ndug ndug, aroron pani, ve apakuri.
Pasa, ye isaav moghon, ve sambam ve taan tivot titaghon tau aliŋa. Ye isaav ariaŋa, ve mbeb tisob tivot ve tineep tuŋia ila inadi.
Ndug ndug matadi iŋgal ŋgar naol tighaze tigham di. Eemoghon Yoova iponpoon ataam padi. Tauto ŋgar todi tonowen inim mbeb sorok, ve le anoŋa maau.
Eemoghon Yoova, ighaze mata iŋgal ŋgar eta, nene pale ŋgar tonenen ineep tovene irau sawa isob. Sa ŋgar to ighaze lolo ighur pani, nene pale inepneep tovene itaghoni taghoni gha ila.
Yes Israela Maaron todi, nene Yoova. Tauto tinidi iza pa poia toni to izaza todi. Ye tau isia di, ve igham di tinim le kat.
Yoova ineep izi sambam, ve mata izizi pa ival tiina to taan.
Ye ineep ila ina to ghamuuŋ pooz, ve ighita tamtoghon tisob to tineep izi taan.
Ye to ighurghur ŋgar ila tamtoghon eŋaeŋa lolodi. Ve ŋgar naol to tamtoghon tighamgham di, ye iwatag di tisob.
Ighaze kinik eta le ndaaba katindi, irau ndaaba tonenen eŋgendi tilib pa malmal maau. Ndaaba ariaŋadi paam. Irau taudi tapiridi, ve tilib pa koiadi maau.
Ve hos to ndaaba tilaan padi pa malmal, tovene paam. Ighaze tighur matadi padi pa tiuul di ve tilib pa koiadi, nene pale tighur matadi padi sorok. Onoon, hos tapiridi. Eemoghon irau tiuul di maau.
Onoon kat, yes to timatughez pa Yoova ve titaghon ŋgar toni, ye mata padi. Yes to tinumeer Yoova tighaze ye lolo ineep tuŋia ila to tamtoghon toni ve iuluul di, ye iŋgin di tineep pooi.
Ye iuluul di, ve igham mulin di pa pataŋani todi. Leso tineep pooi. Ve ighaze pitool tiina ivot, ye pale iuul di, ve igham adi aniiŋ ve tineep pooi.
Tovenen iit tanumeer Yoova, ve taghur mataad pani. Pasa, ye Ulaaŋa toit, ve inim sigeu pait.
Ye moghon, tauto lolood poia kat, ve tiniid iza. Ye patabuaŋ ve iza tiina. Tauto taghur ila toni ariaŋa.
Yoova, yei nighur matamai payom pa uul ghei. Ughur poia tiom iza tiei itaghon ŋgar tiom to lolom ineep tuŋia ila to tamtoghon tiom ve uluul di.

You pale napait Yoova pa poia toni irau sawa isob. Irau neneeŋag maau. Moghon moghon avog pale ipapaiti.
You lolog poia pa Yoova, ve napaiti pa ŋgar popoia to ye igham payou. Yes to tinumeer Yoova, ve timbadbaad pataŋani, irau tilooŋ aliŋag tonene. Leso lolodi poia paam.
Yam anim itiŋa talup ghiit, ve tapakur Yoova. Itiŋa tapait iza. Pasa, ye iza tiina le tiina kat.
Suŋuuŋ tiou iŋarua Yoova, ve ye ilooŋ ghou. Tauto igham mulin ghou pa mbeb tisob to namatughez padi ne.
Yes to tighur matadi pani pa iuul di, nene pale lolodi poia, ve tinidi iza. Ye pale iuul di. Irau tighur matadi pani sorok ve mayadi ne maau.
Muuŋ, pataŋani tiina igham ghou. Tovenen nataŋ roran Yoova pa ulaaŋ. Ve ye ilooŋ suŋuuŋ tiou, ve igham mulin ghou pa pataŋani tiou tisob.
Yes to timatughez pa Yoova ve titaghon ŋgar toni, aŋela toni inepneep toman di, ve iŋginŋgin di. Ye ighamgham mulin di pa pataŋani todi.
Yoova, ye poia kat. Taumim atoova ve aghita. Yes to tinumeera ve tiyoŋyooŋ ila toni, poia toni izaza todi le lolodi poia kat.
Yam tamtoghon patabuaŋa to Yoova, amatughez pani ve ataghon ŋgar toni. Pasa, yes to tighamgham tovene, irau timbool pa mbeb eta maau.
Laion papaghu, tapiridi tintina. Eemoghon sawa pida, adi aniiŋ maau ve pitool di. Ve yes to tizuaria di pa Yoova, nene irau timbool pa mbeb poia eta maau.
Ndinatug, anim alooŋ saveeŋ tiou tonene. You naghaze napatooŋ gham pa ataam to amatughez pa Yoova ve ataghon ŋgar toni.
Vena, yom ughaze uneep pooi, ve uneep mala izi taan toman lolom poia?
Ighaze tovene, ghoro uŋgin poian avom. Saveeŋ samia, ma kaarom eta ivot ila avom malep.
Ve upul murim pa ŋgar samia, ve ugham ŋgar poia moghon. Uzuaria ghom pa taghoniiŋ ŋgar luuma, ve ukaal ataam pa yamŋa tamtoghon alup gham ve aneep pooi.
Tamtoghon deŋiadi, Yoova mata padi, ve ighurghur taliŋa pa taŋiiz todi.
Eemoghon ndiran samsamia, ye ighurghur koi padi. Pale ipasob di pa taan le tisob kat. Muri pale tamtoghon matadi iŋgal di muul maau.
Sawa to tamtoghon deŋiadi titaŋ roran Yoova pa ulaaŋ, ye iloŋlooŋ di, ve ighamgham mulin di pa pataŋani todi tisob.
Yes to pataŋani igham di le lolodi isami kat, Yoova ineep igharau di. Tamtoghon to ighaze pataŋani itatani le tapiri isob, nene pale Yoova iuuli.
Onoon, tamtoghon deŋiadi, pataŋani naol ivotvot padi. Eemoghon Yoova pale igham mulin di pa pataŋani todi to naol.
Pale iŋgin poian di kat. Irau tuadi eta ipol maau.
Eemoghon yes to tizorzoor Yoova aliŋa, ŋgar todi samsamia pale imuul pa taudi, ve irab di timaat. Yes to tighurghur koi pa tamtoghon deŋiadi, nene pale Yoova ighur atia padi, leso iyat ŋgar todi tonowen.
Yoova ighamgham mulin mbesooŋa toni pa pataŋani todi, leso tineep pooi. Yes to tinumeera ve tiyoŋyooŋ ila toni, ye irau ighur atia padi maau.
O Yoova, uul ghou ve utatan koiagŋa to aazne yeiŋa niwazoran ghei ve tiŋoŋooŋ payou ne. Yes to tighaze tigham malmal payou, uvool tiou ve uparab toman di.
Undud ghom pa mburuguuŋ tiom to malmal, ve ukis sigeu tiom, ve umundig unum uul ghou.
Upas iiz ve ndaab tiom, ve upoon ghou pa yes to tigham lilin ghou. You naghaze nalooŋ ghom usaav payou ughaze: “You Volaaŋa tiom. You pale nauul ghom.”
Yoova, yes to tighaze tirab ghou namaat, utatan tapiridi, ve ugham di mayadi ve tighau tila. Yes to tikaal ataam pa tiwaghamun ghou, ugham ŋgar todi iwaghamgham, ve timuul tila toman mayadi.
Yoova, naghaze aŋela tiom inaan di ve tighau tila, inimale yaghur iviviir ghavuur.
Aŋela tiom igham taghon di, ve tilaan ila ndoroom lolo taghon ataam to kirikirikia, ghoro poia.
Pasa, you nagham sosor eta padi maau. Eemoghon yes tiraar malum tighaze tisavag ghou. Ve titai saambu to izila kat, leso natap nazila.
Yoova, ukarmotin di pa pataŋani tiina eta. Ugham di tiŋgud malum to tiraara payou ne. Ve ugham di titaptap tizila saambu to titaii payou. Leso tigham samia!
Yoova, ighaze ugham tovene, nene pale lolog poia kat payom, ve tinig iza pa ulaaŋ to ugham payou.
You pale napakur izam toman lolog, ve naghaze: “Yoova, sei to inimale yom? Eta maau! Pasa, yes to tapiridi maau, yom ugham mulin di ila yes to tapiridi tintina ne nimadi. Yes mbolaaŋa ve yes to tineep ila pataŋani lolo, yom pale uvool todi, ve ugham mulin di ila yes yubyubŋa nimadi.”
Tamtoghon naol timundig ve tiŋgal saveeŋ kaarom payou tighaze tiwaghamun ghou. Eemoghon saveeŋ ŋgaliiŋ to tinoknok ghasoniiŋ ghou pani, you nakankaan pani.
You nagham ŋgar poia padi. Eemoghon yes tipamuul ŋgar samia payou. Tauto lolog ipataŋan kat.
Eemoghon sawa to yes timorooŋ le tisami, lolog ipataŋan padi, ve nagharaat taug maau. Ve naŋgun taug pa ghaniiŋ aniiŋ, ve naghur di tila suŋuuŋ tiou. Eemoghon suŋuuŋ tiou tonene, yom ugham anoŋa ivot maau. Tauto lolog ipataŋan kat, ve nataŋ padi inimale nditag, ma toŋvetaz tiou kat. Ve nalaagh matag iza maau. Natudtud ve nataŋtaŋ nanimale ŋgeu to lolo ipataŋan pa tiina imaat.
<range>
Eemoghon sawa to pataŋani igham ghou ve naneep sami, yes lolodi poia, ve tilup di pa tiwaghamun ghou. Yes to tighaze tigham malmal payou ne, you nawatag di maau. Nakankaan pa ŋgar todi. Yes tinoknok ŋgaliiŋ saveeŋ payou.
Ve tipiyaav saveeŋ velegiiŋ naol payou. Atedi yabyab payou kat, ve tiŋaaŋ mareer tighaze le tiwaghamun ghou.
Yoova, pughu vena to umbabatut di, ve tighamgham ŋgar tovene payou? Pale ŋeez o uul ghou? Yes tinimale laion to tisasaŋan pa tisaas ghou. Tovenen ugham mulin ghou ila nimadi, leso naneep pooi.
Ighaze uul ghou, sawa to tamtoghon tiom tilup di pa suŋuuŋ, you pale nala toman di, ve napait ghom toman lolog poia. Pale napait varum ila ival tiina tonowen naghodi.
Koiagŋa, muuŋ yeiŋa lupuuŋ tiei ee moghon. Eemoghon aazne, tighur koi payou sorok. Tovenen uul ghou lak! Pa vene, tilib payou ve tipakur di. Yes tighan matadi payou, ve tighaze: “Aa, ŋgeu to iwaghamgham wa!” O Yoova, ŋgar tovene ivot malep!
Yes tisavia saveeŋ luuma eta pa tilup tamtoghon ve tineep pooi ne maau. Tiŋgalŋgal saveeŋ naol pa tamtoghon to orodi maate to tineep izi taan tonene.
Ve aliŋadi izaza sorok, ve tisavsaav ila matag tighaze: “Aa, ghara nighita ghom!”
Yoova, ŋgar todi samsamia to naol ne, yom ughita di wa. Neneeŋam padi malep! Tiina tiou, uneep saguan payou malep.
Maaron, yom Tiina tiou. Umundig ve uvool tiou. Uyoon payou, ve utatan di.
Yoova, Maaron tiou, ŋgar tiom deŋia moghon. Tovenen uyoon payou, ve upaghazoŋan ghou ila tamtoghon matadi ughaze you leg sosor eta maau. Uul ghou. Pa vene, koiagŋa tipakur di pa pataŋani to igham ghou ne.
Ghoro lolodi poia, ve tisaav tighaze: “Aa, isob! Ŋgar to taghaze tagham pani, tauto ivot pani ve isami wa!”
Yoova, yes to tipakur di pa pataŋani to igham ghou ne, ugham di tiwaghamgham, ve tighau tila toman mayadi. Yes to tipapait taudi ve tiveleg ghou, upamayaŋin di le mayadi kat.
Eemoghon yes to tighaze yom uul ghou ve upaghazoŋan ghou ila tamtoghon matadi ughaze you leg sosor eta maau, yes pale lolodi poia ve tinidi iza, ve tilool ve tipait izam. Ve tisavsaav tighaze: “Yoova iza tiina kat! Ighaze mbesooŋa toni ineep pooi, pale ye paam lolo poia.”
Tovenen mboŋmaagh ila le rabrab izi, avog pale ivotia ŋgar deŋia to yom ughamghami, ve napait ghom.

Ŋgar to zoraaŋ Maaron aliŋa to ineep ila ndiran samsamia lolodi, nene isavsaav padi, ve ighamgham pooz padi. Tauto matadi iŋgal Maaron maau, ve timatughez pani maau.
Sosor todi tonowen, ighamun ŋgar todi. Tauto tipapakur taudi, ve matadi iŋgal sorok tighaze Maaron ighita sosor todi maau, ve irau ighur atia padi maau.
Saveeŋ kaarom ve saveeŋ samsamia moghon to ivotvot ila avodi. Ŋgar to iuul ghiit pa taneep pooi, nene tipuli wa. Tauto tigham ŋgar poia eta maau.
