Mboŋmaagh to naol ne, you pale nawaghamun tamtoghon samsamiadi tisob to tineep izi taan tonene. Yes to tighamgham ŋgar samia, you pale nandiir di tighau pa Yoova ndug toni.

O Yoova, taŋiiz tiou ilat tiom. Ulooŋ suŋuuŋ tiou tonene, ve uul ghou.
Uŋgooz matam payou malep. Pasa, you naneep ila pataŋani tiina lolo. Ighaze poiŋ tiou ilat, ghoro ughur taliŋam payou. Ulooŋ suŋuuŋ tiou, ve rikia moghon uul ghou.
Paam namaat tonene. Nepooŋ tiou, nene inimale yab mbuasa to imbuŋ iza, ve imbiriis ilale. Tinig ituntun kat, ve tuag tisob tiyabyab.
You nanimale kikiliiŋ to tamtoghon tivazagi le igorgor. Tovenen lolog pa naghan aniiŋ muul maau.
You nayamaan yabyabuuŋ, ve nayak tiina. Ve nakoŋkoŋ le nakoŋkoŋ kat.
You naghita naghaze eŋgengou kat. You nanimale man to mboŋ to eŋgeni ineep izi ndug balim, ma ineep izi paanu muŋgina to tamtoghon tipuli ve isami.
You irau nagheen maau. Napamaat le ndugizau. You ghora eŋgengou moghon. Nanimale man to eŋgeni ineep izala ruum pogho.
Sawa isob, mboŋmaagh ila le rabrab izi, koiag tipipiyaav saveeŋ velegiiŋ payou ve tiŋiŋiŋ payou. Ve ighaze tighur samia pa tamtoghon eta, nene tiwatwaat sorokin you izag tighaze: Pataŋani to igham ghou, nene pale igham tamtoghon tonenen paam.
Yom atem yabyab payou kat. Tauto upiyaav ghou nala dige nanimale buzbuz. Ve avab inim ag aniiŋ, ve matag suru inim ag ya pa naghun.
<range>
Nepooŋ tiou to taan, nene inimale ndag izila ve yavyaava inim. Tapirig isob wa. Nanimale kikiliiŋ to raua imalai ve igorgor.
Eemoghon Yoova, yom kinik to unepneep ila inam to ghamuuŋ pooz. Muuŋ, aazne, ve itaghoni taghoni gha ila. Tovenen tamtoghon papaghu to muri pale tivot, yes pale tiwatag tighaze izam tiina inepneep tovene, itaghoni taghoni gha ila.
Yom lolom isamin ndug tiom Zion. Tovenen yom pale umundig ve uuli. Pasa, sawa to ughur poia tiom iza toni, tauto ivot wa.
Onoon, tireu mbirisan ndug Zion, ve mbeb tisob timbiriis tilaledi wa. Yaam popoiadi to tirei ruum pani, tipiyaav di tila saguan saguan tinimale mbeb sorok. Eemoghon mbesooŋa tiom lolodi pa ndug tonowen kat. Tauto tighita mbeb tonenen le lolodi isami kat.
Eemoghon muri, Yoova pale igharaat mulin ndug Zion, ve ipatooŋ tau toman tapiri ve poia toni ivot ighazooŋ. Ghoro yes to ndug ndug toman kinik todi todi pale tighilaala tighaze ye iza tiina pa tapiri ve poia toni, ve timatughez pani, ve tineep ila samba.
<range>
Tamtoghon toni to tineep sorok kat, ye irau iyasiil pa taŋiiz todi maau. Pale ilooŋ suŋuuŋ todi, ve iuul di.
Mbeb to Yoova ighami, umbooda ila rau. Leso tamtoghon toni to muri pale tivot, tiwatagi, ve tipait iza. Umbood saveeŋ tovene:
Yoova inepneep izi ndug toni patabuaŋ, ve mata ilala inimnim. Ye ineep izi sambam, ve mata izizi pa taan.
Tovenen yes to tineep ila koiadi nimadi ve tiyakyak, ye iloŋlooŋ taŋiiz todi, ve iuluul di. Ve yes to tisaŋan sawa to koiadi tirab di timaat, ye ipaghau di pa mateeŋ.
Leso muri, yes ndug ndug toman kinik todi todi tinim tilup di pa suŋuuŋ izi Yerusalem, ve tivotia Yoova varu. Yes pale tipait iza izi lolooz toni Zion.
<range>
You nanim olman kat sone. Eemoghon aazne, Yoova igham ghou tapirig isob, ve iŋgoor sawa tiou inim tuku.
Tovenen nasaav pani naghaze: “Maaron tiou, ugham ghou rikia malep. Pasa, nanim olman waat sone! Ve yom, ghoro nepooŋ tiom inepneep tovene itaghoni taghoni gha ila.
Yoova, muuŋ kat, yom ugharaat taan pughu le tuŋia. Ve sambam paroŋania paam, nene nimam muri.
Eemoghon muri, sambam paroŋania ve taan pale tisami ve tilaledi, tinimale uli muŋgina to imarepreep. Tovenen yom pale upiyaav di tilaledi, ve urabolin di pa sambam paroŋania paghu ve taan paghu. Eemoghon yom unepneep tovene. Utortoor gabuam ve ŋgar tiom maau, ve sawa tiom irau isob maau.
<range>
Yei to nimbesmbees payom ne, yom pale uŋgin ndinatumai, ve tineep pooi. Ve papaghu todi to muri pale tivot ne paam, yom pale ugham di tiyoon ariaŋa, ve tineep pooi ila naghom irau sawa isob.”
You nasaav pa taug naghaze you irau napait Yoova pa poia toni. Onoon kat, ila lolog ve ŋgar tiou isob, you pale napait Yoova iza patabuaŋ.
Nasaav muul. You irau napait Yoova pa poia toni. Ŋgar ve mbeb popoiadi naol to ye ighamgham di payou, irau lolog imaagh pa eta maau.
Ye ireu sosor tiou, ve ipasob moroghooŋ tiou tisob.
Ye igham mulin ghou pa mateeŋ. Tauto namaat maau. Ye igham ghou lolog poia kat nanimale tamtoghon to tighuri inim kinik. Pasa, ŋgar to lolo ineep tuŋia ila to tamtoghon toni ve iuluul di, ye ipatooŋa payou paam.
Nepooŋ tiou to taan, ye ighamgham leg mbeb popoiadi naol naol le naraua kat. Ve igham ghou nanim paghu muul, le tapirig ivot inim tiina inimale manbog.
Ŋgar to Yoova ighamghami, nene deŋia moghon. Tovenen tamtoghon tisob to koiadi titatan di, ve tigham samin di, ye iyondyood padi, ve iuluul di pa pataŋani todi.
Muuŋ, Yoova ivotia gabua ve ŋgar toni pa Mose. Ve ipatooŋ uraat tintina toman tapiri ila yes Israela matadi.
Yoova lolo isamin ghiit, ve ighamgham poian ghiit. Irau ate yabyab rikia maau. Poia toni, nene tiina kat. Ye lolo ineep tuŋia inim toit, ve iuluul ghiit irau sawa isob. Ve moghon moghon itaghon saveeŋ toni.
Onoon, sawa pida, ye iŋgal mataad pa sosor toit. Eemoghon igham tovene moghon moghon maau. Ve irau ikis mbalmbali toni le mala ne maau. Ineep ris, ve isob.
Onoon, ighaze tagham ŋgar to iyel pa tutuuŋ toni, Maaron irau iyat sosor toit ve ighur atia pait. Eemoghon ye ighamgham tovene maau.
Yes to timatughez pani, ve titaghon ŋgar toni, Yoova lolo ineep tuŋia ila todi, ve poia toni tiina izaza todi itaghon saveeŋ mbuaaŋ toni. Lolo poia tonowen, tiina kat, inimale soso to taan ve izala pa sambam.
Ve sosor toit to tazorzoor Maaron aliŋa, nene Yoova ipaghau di tila mala kat pait, irau soso to taan dige to ila pa ndag iza, ve ila pa ndag izila.
Yes to timatughez pa Yoova ve titaghon ŋgar toni, ye lolo isamin di inimale nditamaan lolodi isamin ghiit.
Pasa, ye tau to igharaat ghiit. Tauto moghon moghon mata iŋgalŋgal ighaze: Iit tanimale ghavuur to taan moghon.
Nepooŋ to iit tamtoghon to taan, nene mala maau. Taneep ris, ve talaleed tanimale kikiliiŋ. Iit tanimale kananaŋ ruŋgu. Mboŋmaagh, ighaze ndag iza, ghoro ivavaal. Ve rabrab izi, ghoro imalai.
Ve ighaze yaghur iviviira, nene pale itap izi, ve ina ŋginiŋa. Taghita muul maau.
Eemoghon yes to timatughez pa Yoova, ve titaghon ŋgar toni, ye lolo ineep tuŋia ila todi, ve iuluul di. To aazne, ve itaghoni taghoni gha ila. Ve ndinatudi ve nditimbudi paam. Ye ipatooŋ ŋgar deŋia padi ve iseeŋga itaghoni taghoni gha ila. Tovenen yes to matadi kisin saveeŋ to yesŋa Maaron timbua, ve titaghon tutuuŋ toni, ye pale lolo ineep tuŋia ila todi, ve iuul di itaghoni taghoni gha ila.
<range>
Yoova ighur ina to ghamuuŋ pooz ineep tuŋia izi sambam. Ye kinik to ighamgham pooz pa mbeb tisob.
Tovenen yam aŋela to Yoova, yam asob apaiti pa poia toni. Yam aŋela ariaŋamim to aloŋlooŋ Yoova aliŋa ve ataghoni, apakuri.
Yam ndaaba to sambam to ambesmbees pa Maaron ve ataghon ŋgar toni, apait Yoova pa poia toni!
Yam mbeb to sambam ve taan to Yoova igharaat gham, ve aneep ila samba, yam asob apaiti pa poia toni. Ve you paam, pale napait Yoova pa poia toni.
You nasaav pa taug naghaze you irau napait Yoova pa poia toni. O Yoova, Maaron tiou, yom izam tiina kat. Tapirim tiina toman ŋgurubam to izam tiina pani, nene ipambood ghom inimale nonogiiŋa to yes kinik. Muuŋ kat, yom ugharaat sambam paroŋania inim inam to nepooŋ inimale moogh guduuŋ to tamtoghon tiraava leso tineep ila paroŋania.
<range>
Ve upayoon ruum tiom izala ya to ineep izala tata pogho. Yom ugham yaghur tae inim lem karis, leso uyoon izala pogho ve ulaan pani. Tovenen yaghur imbaad ghom, ve ughaughau ila sambam paroŋania.
Yom ugham yaghur inim lem mbaŋooŋa. Ve yab yama, nene inim lem mbesooŋa.
Muuŋ, yom ughur taan iyoon tuŋia izala pughu. Tauto irau induur maau. Inepneep tovene.
Sawa tonenen, ugham te itatab taan toman lolooz tisob.
Ghoro aliŋam iza, ve uyaan te ve ighau. Aliŋam tapiri tiina inimale lalaav avolutu. Tauto te ilooŋ ghom, ve rikia moghon ighau ila ilupi ila dige eez, ve taan peria.
Tovenen te imaak, ve lolooz peria, ve imaak izi izi le ndug rapadi peria paam. Tauto aazne, ya ve te tineep ila inadi inadi to taum ughur di padi.
Ve yom ughur ŋgat pa te ve taan. Leso te itatab taan ve ireu ndug muul sob. Ŋgat tonowen, te irau imalaaŋ pani maau.
Yom ugham ya tivot ila taan saambu to tineep taghon lolooz digedi, ve tireer taghon ndariri tizila pa ŋgoloop.
Ya tonowen tineep, leso mbeb naol naol to su tighun. Esele sagsagŋa paam. Ighaze murun di, nene pale tighun le isooŋ di.
Man tirei rumadi izala ai to tiyoon ila ya digedi ne bogadi, ve tineep ila ve titaŋtaŋ.
Yom uneep ila inam to sala we, ve ugham uman izizi ila lolooz. Uraat tiom tonenen, tauto igham taan ŋgoreeŋa ivot ve mbeb popoia naol titub pooi.
Yom ugham kikiliiŋ itub, leso makau, sipsip ve mbeb pida paam tighan. Ve ughur mbeb naol pa tiuul tamtoghon paam. Leso tivazog di ve tigham uraat padi. Yom ugham aniiŋ anoŋa ivotvot ila taan.
Ve ughur ai vaen, leso tamtoghon tigharaata ve tighun suru, ve igham di lolodi poia. Ve ugham ai oliv padi paam. Leso tigham ŋgoreeŋa, ve timusil tinidi ve naghodi pani, le milmilia. Ve ugham aniiŋ naol naol padi, leso tighan di ve ipalot di.
Yoova, ai tiom mendepur to uvazog di izi Lebanon, yom uŋgin di pooi, ve ugham uman izizi padi. Tauto aazne tiza tinim tintina.
Ai tonowen, man tirei rumadi izala bogadi. Ve man ŋgau, ghoro tighagharaat rumadi ila ai to tinimale yar ne bogadi.
Lolooz mamala dabadi, nene mekmek sagsagŋa inadi to nepooŋ. Ve mbeb pida tinimale namaiva ve uzuuv ma venen, nene tiyoŋyooŋ ilooŋ ila yaam tintina lolodi izala lolooz.
Yom ughur kaiyo inim iŋgat pa sawa to ndaman. Ve ndag, nene iwatag sawa sine to iza, ve sawa sine to izila.
Yom ugham mboŋ izi le ndug ndoroom, leso mbeb sagsagŋa to su tilaagh.
Tovenen laion papaghu tilaghlaagh ve titaŋtaŋ, ve tikalkaal adi mbeb pa tighan. Ve Maaron tau igham padi.
Sawa to ndag iza, ghoro timuul tila pa inadi to ghenooŋ, ve tizi tineep.
Ghoro tamtoghon anadi tivot tila pa tigham uraat. Tighamgham uraat ila ila le rabrab izi.
O Yoova, yom ughur mbeb naol naol. Ve mbeb tisob to yom ugharaat di, tipatooŋ ghom tighaze ŋgar tiom tiina le tiina kat. Taan ivon kat pa mbeb ndiŋndiŋ ndiŋndiŋ to yom ugharaat di.
Ve nagham ŋgar pa te paam. Nene tiina kat. Ve mbeb ndiŋndiŋ ndiŋndiŋ to matadi iyaryaar tineep ila lolo. Pida tintina, ve pida geegeu. Mbeb tonowen, tanin di, pale taraua maau.
Waaŋ tiravraav ila te pogho, ve Leviatan ilaghlaagh ila te lolo. Mbeb tonowen, tiina le tiina kat. Muuŋ kat, yom ugharaata, leso imomogheer ila te.
Mbeb naol tonowen tighurghur matadi payom pa ugham adi aniiŋ. Sawa to pitool di, yom taum upanpan di.
Yes tineep ila nimam. Ighaze ugham aniiŋ padi, yes pale tighami. Ighaze ukaak nimam pa upan di, pale tighan mbeb popoia le apodi isuŋ.
Ve ighaze uŋgooz matam padi, nene pale timatughez, ve tiwaghamgham. Ve ighaze upas avuvudi ighau, nene pale timatmaat le tinim ghavuur muul.
Mbeb naol to tineep izi taan ne, yom uvib Avuvum ila padi, tauto tineep matadi iyaryaar. Ve sawa to timaat, yom ugham papaghu todi tivot izi taan, leso tigham inadi.
Yoova iza tiina pale ineep itaghoni taghoni gha ila. Ve ye lolo poia pa mbeb naol to ye igharaat di.
Ye tapiri tiina kat. Ighaze mata izi pa taan, nene pale taan irur. Ve ighaze itut lolooz eta, nene pale yab ighan lolooz tonenen.
Tovenen sawa to naneep matag iyaryaar, you pale nambou ve napait Yoova. Pale lolog poia pani, ve napaiti ila mbouŋ ila ila le nepooŋ tiou to taan isob.
Yoova igham ghou lolog poia kat. Tovenen sawa to nanepneep ve naghamgham ŋgar pani, naghaze ye ighita ghou, ve lolo poia pa ŋgar tiou.
Eemoghon ndiran samsamiadi to tighamgham sosor ila Yoova mata, poia pa ye ipasob di pa taan ve tilaledi. Ve you, ghoro nasaav pa taug naghaze you irau napait Yoova pa poia toni. Aleluia! Tapait Yoova!
Apait Yoova pa poia toni, ve avotia iza tiina. Asavia ŋgar to ye ighamghami irau ndug ndug, leso tiwatagi.
Ambou pani. Ambou ve apaiti. avotia uraat toni gharatooŋadi to naol ne. Uraat tonowen, ite kat.
Yoova, ye iza patabuaŋ. Apaiti toman lolomim poia. Yes to tizuaria di pani, nene pale lolodi poia kat ve tinidi iza.
Suŋuuŋ tiam iŋarua Yoova. Leso ipalot gham pa tapiri. Azuaria gham pa ala aneep tomani irau sawa isob.
Yam to avot ila to Maaron mbesooŋa toni Abaram, yam siŋ to Yakop to Maaron isia gham anim le, matamim iŋgal mbeb gharatooŋadi ve uraat tintina to Yoova ighamgham di. Uraat toni tonowen ite kat. Ve matamim iŋgal sawa naol to ye iŋgabiiz tamtoghon, ve ighur atia padi.
<range>
Yoova eŋgeni to Maaron toit. Uraat to gabizooŋ tamtoghon ve ghuruuŋ atia padi, nene ye ipatooŋa irau taan isob.
Moghon moghon, mata iŋgalŋgal saveeŋ mbuaaŋ toni, ve itataghoni. Tutuuŋ to Maaron isavia, pale iyaryaaŋ tovene, ve anoŋa ivotvot itaghoni taghoni gha ila.
Muuŋ, ye imbua saveeŋ toman Abaram ighaze yesuru tilup di tinim ee moghon. Ghoro ipariaaŋ saveeŋ mbuaaŋ tonowen ila to Isak le iyaryaaŋ kat.
Muri ghoro, ipariaaŋ saveeŋ tonenen muul ila to Yakop ighaze saveeŋ tonenen pale iyaryaaŋ tovene itaghoni taghoni gha ila. Ve isaav pa Yakop ighaze: “You pale nagham taan Kanaan inim lem. Taan tonanan pale inim yamŋa papaghu tiom lemim kat.”
<range>
Sawa tonenen, yes ival maau. Yes rismoghon. Ve tineep tinim loomba pa taan tonene.
Laghooŋ todi, titaghon ŋgar tovene: Tineep ris izi ndug eez, ghoro timundig muul, ve tila tineep izi ndug ite. Tila tivot ndug to kinik eez ve tineep toman di. Le isob, ghoro tipul di, ve tila tivot to kinik ite, ve tineep toman di.
Laghooŋ todi, nene Maaron tau iŋgini. Ye ipul tamtoghon to ndug eta titatan di, ve tigham samin di ne maau. Ye mata iŋgalŋgal di, tauto iyaan kinik pida ighaze: “Yes to nasia di ve naghur di tinim uraata tiou, ambuul di malep! You naghur di tinim propet tiou. Tovenen awaghamun di malep.”
<range>
Muri ghoro Yoova igham pitool tiina ivot izi taan Kanaan. Sawa tonenen, Yakop yesŋa ndinatu adi aniiŋ maau kat.
Eemoghon Yoova imbaaŋ todi eez imuuŋ padi ila Isip. Nene Yosep to tigholia ila, ve inim mbesooŋa sorok.
Yes Isipa tighuri ilooŋ ila ruum to yabyabuuŋ, ve tikau aghe pa sen, ve tighur ain liliita ila lua.
Yoova itovtoov Yosep tovene, le Yosep ivotia mbeb pida pa yes Isipa, ve saveeŋ toni anoŋa ivot. Tovenen saveeŋ to Yoova isavia pani, nene ipaghazoŋan Yosep ighaze ye igham sosor maau, ve ŋgar toni deŋia.
Ghoro kinik to yes Isipa to iŋgin ndug naol, imbaaŋ ila ighaze tipul Yosep ivot pa ruum to yabyabuuŋ.
Ve ighur Yosep inim daba to yes Isipa, ve ipul ruum toni toman mbeb toni tisob ila ye nima, leso iŋgin di.
Tauto Yosep inim daba pa yes to tighamgham uraat pa kinik. Ye ipatoot yes uraata to tiuluul kinik pa ŋgar, ve ipatooŋ di pa ŋgar poia.
Ataam tonene to yes Israela to siŋ to Yakop tila tivot izi Isip, ve tineep tinim loomba izi taan to Ham.
Yoova ipapalot di, tauto tivot tinim ival, le tapiridi ilib pa koiadi.
Ghoro ye itoor ŋgar to yes Isipa, ve tighur koi pa tamtoghon toni. Tovenen tikaal ataam pa titombaan mbesooŋa toni ve tigham samin di.
Tauto Yoova imbaaŋ mbesooŋa toni ru, Mose ve Aron, leso tiuul yes Israela. Aron tonene, Yoova tau ighuri pa igham uraat toni.
Maaron ighaze ipatooŋ tapiri pa yes Isipa. Tauto ipalot Mose yesuru Aron, ve tigham mbeb gharatooŋadi naol ve uraat tintina ila yes Isipa lolodi. Uraat to ivot izi taan to Ham, nene ite kat.
Yoova igham ndoroom tiina ighamun taan to yes Isipa. Pasa, yes tizoor aliŋa, ve tiŋguruut tamtoghon toni.
Ve itoor ya todi tisob tinim siŋ, le iigh tisob timatmaat.
Ghoro igham ŋgob ndiŋndiŋ ndiŋndiŋ tivot le tineep irau taan isob to yes Isipa. Ruum lolo to kinik tau, nene ivon pa ŋgob paam.
Ve Yoova isaav, ve raaŋ tintina toman suum katindi tivot, le tirau taan to yes Isipa.
Ve sawa to uman ighaze izi, uman izi maau. Yoova igham ais patu patu titaptap tizi le tiwaghamun ndug todi. Ve igham ndug milia, ve lalaav kiliŋkiliŋia irau taan todi isob.
Tauto iwaghamun ai vaen toman ai fik todi, ve iŋgal ai pida tipolpol paam.
Ghoro isaav, ve isis tivot le katindi kat. Tanin di, pale taraua maau.
Ve tighan aniiŋ to yes Isipa tivazog di ne raua toman mbeb pida to titub ila taan todi, le isob kat.
Muri ghoro, Yoova irab ndinatudi aidaba timatmaat irau taan todi isob. Ndinatudi to tipoop di muuŋ, tauto tisob.
Ghoro Yoova igham yes Israela tipul Isip, ve tivot tila. Sawa to timundig, tiyou gol to yes Isipa toman silva todi, ve tila tomani. Ve laghooŋ todi, tiwasiiŋ moghon. Todi eta tapiri isob ve itap ne maau.
Sawa to yes Israela tipul Isip ve tila, yes Isipa lolodi poia kat. Pasa, yes Israela to tinim pughu pa pataŋani to ivotvot padi. Tauto matughezaaŋ tiina igham di.
Ndag, Yoova igham yaghur tae ivot, ve ipoon ndag mata pa yes Israela. Ve mboŋ, ye igham yab ighan, le isul ndug.
Sawa to tighasoni pa adi aniiŋ, ye igham man kayau katindi tivot, ve igham aniiŋ tiina ineep sambam ve izi inim padi. Tovenen tighami ve tighan le apodi isuŋ.
Yoova igham yaam ivavaal le avo ikaak, ve ya goŋia ivot. Ya tonowen ireer tiina izi ndug balim to le ya maau.
Yoova igham mbeb naol tonenen pasa, mata iŋgalŋgal saveeŋ toni patabuaŋ to imbua toman mbesooŋa toni Abaram.
Tovenen Yoova ighereb tamtoghon toni Israel to ye tau isia di ne, ve tipul Isip. Timboumbou ve tilolool toman lolodi poia ve tila.
Muri ghoro, ye igham taan to ndug pida padi. Tovenen ndug tonowen uraat todi anoŋa, inimale ruum, uum, ai, ve mbeb todi pida paam, tauto tisob tinim yes Israela ledi.
Yoova igham tovene padi, leso tikis saveeŋ toni tuŋia, ve matadi kisin tutuuŋ toni ve titaghoni. Aleluia! Tapait Yoova!
Aleluia! Lolood poia pa Yoova, ve tapaiti pa poia toni. Pasa, ye poia kat. Lolo ineep tuŋia ila to tamtoghon toni, ve iuluul di irau sawa isob.
Sei irau isavia uraat tintina to Yoova ighamgham di? Ve sei irau ipaiti pa ŋgar popoia naol to ye ighamgham di, ve ipasob di? Eta maau.
Yes to tighagharaat pataŋani to tamtoghon ve titaghon ŋgar deŋia irau sawa isob, nene pale lolodi poia kat, ve poia to Maaron izaza todi.
O Yoova, sawa to ugham poian tamtoghon tiom, ve ugham mulin di pa pataŋani todi, matam iŋgal ghou, ve uul ghou paam. Maaron, yom taum usia yes Israel tinim lem. Yes tamtoghon tiom. Tovenen naghaze taug naghita di tineep pooi. Leso yeiŋa nilup ghei toman tinimai iza ve nipait ghom.
<range>
Yei nisosor wa. Niyel pa ataam tiom ninimale nditimbumai. Yei nighamgham ŋgar samia. Ŋgar tiei deŋia ila matam maau.
Sawa to nditimbumai tineep izi Isip, yom ugham mbeb gharatooŋadi tintina ivotvot. Eemoghon tighilaal di maau. Sawa naol, yom upatooŋ poia tiom padi itaghon ŋgar tiom to lolom ineep tuŋia ila to tamtoghon tiom ve uluul di. Eemoghon yes tigham ŋgar pa ulaaŋ tiom tonenen maau. Sawa to tila tivot Te Kaviaaŋa, tizoor aliŋam, ve tipul muridi payom.
Eemoghon Yoova, ye iza tiina pa tapiri ve poia toni, ve ighaze igham di tighilaal katin tapiri. Tauto igham mulin di.
Sawa tonenen, ye isaav ariaŋa pa Te Kaviaaŋa, le ivalagi inim ru. Pida ila pa ŋas, pida ila pa waan, ve taan mamaasa ivot. Ghoro ighereb yes Israela, ve tilaagh ila taan mamaasa to ineep sila kat, ve tivool tila pa dige ite.
Tovenen ye igham mulin di ila koiadi nimadi. Ye iyoon padi, ve iuul di. Tauto yes to tighur koi padi irau tiwaghamun di maau.
Sawa tonenen, te itatab koiadi le tisob timatmaat. Eta ineep muul maau.
Maaron igham tovene, tauto yes Israela tighur ila saveeŋ mbuaaŋ toni, ve timbou ve tipaiti.
Eemoghon rikia moghon ve lolodi imaagh pa mbeb gharatooŋadi to ye igham di. Yes tisaŋan Maaron pa ivotia ŋgar toni padi ne maau. Tigham mbeb itaghon taudi ŋgar todi.
Sawa to tinepneep izi ndug balim, luadi itaŋ tighaze le tighan aniiŋ popoia inimale muuŋ tighanghani izi Isip. Tovenen titoov Yoova tapiri izi ndug balim.
Ve Maaron ilooŋ taŋiiz todi, ve igham adi mbeb to tighasoni pani. Eemoghon ye igham moroghooŋ samia ivot le iwaghamun di paam.
Sawa to tinepneep ila inadi to nepooŋ izi ndug balim, tamtoghon todi pida timundig ve tiŋooŋ pa Mose yesuru togha Aron to Yoova mbesooŋa toni patabuaŋ. Tighaze le tigham uraat to Maaron ighuri ila yesuru nimadi, ghoro poia.
Tovenen taan ikaak, ve Datan yesuru Abiram toman siŋ todi tisob titaptap tizila, ve taan avo ila iŋgup muul.
Ghoro yab ivot, ve ighan tamtoghon pida to titaghon di pa ŋgar todi tonowen. Ndiran samsamiadi tonowen, yab yama ighan di le tisob.
Sawa to yes Israela tinepneep izi lolooz Sinai pughu, tigham gol ve tigharaat makau natu tamoot anunu, ve tiput aghedi pani ve tipaiti.
Tovenen Maaron todi to iza tiina pa tapiri ve poia toni, yes tipul muridi pani. Ve tighur mbeb to ighanghan kikiliiŋ ne anunu igham Maaron ina.
Onoon kat, Maaron todi to igham uraat tintina tivot izi Isip, ve igham mulin di, lolodi imaagh pani kat.
Ye igham mbeb gharatooŋadi tintina izi taan to yes Isipa, ve igham uraat tintina izi Te Kaviaaŋa dige paam. Uraat tonowen, tamtoghon tighita di le matughezaaŋ tiina igham di. Eemoghon yes Israel tigham ŋgar pa mbeb tonenen maau.
Tovenen Maaron ighaze iwaghamun di le tisob. Eemoghon mbesooŋa toni Mose to ye tau isia, iyoon ila Maaron mata inim sigeu pa yes Israela. Tauto itatan Maaron mbalmbali toni, ve Maaron iwaghamun tamtoghon toni maau.
Sawa to yes Israela tigharau taan Kanaan, yes tirere pa taan poia to Yoova ighaze igham padi. Pasa, tighur ila saveeŋ mbuaaŋ toni maau.
Yes lolodi pa tilooŋ Yoova aliŋa maau. Tinepneep ilooŋ ila mbeez todi, ve lolodi ŋurŋuria pa Maaron.
Tauto Yoova iit nima iza, ve imbua saveeŋ ariaŋa ighaze ye pale irab di tisob timatmaat izi ndug balim, ve ireu papaghu todi timbiriis tirau ndug ndug.
<range>
Muri ghoro, yes Israela tila tivot lolooz Peor. Sawa tonenen, tila toman yes to timbesmbees pa maaron kaarom Baal. Pasa, aniiŋ to ndiran tonowen tigham pa maaron maate todi tonowen, yes Israela tighani paam.
Ŋgar to tighami, nene ipas Yoova ate, le ate yabyab kat. Tauto igham moroghooŋ samia ivot padi.
Tovenen Pineas imundig ve irab tamtoghon ru to tizoor Maaron aliŋa ne timaat. Ghoro moroghooŋ samia tonowen isob.
Ŋgar toni tonowen, tauto Maaron ighita ighaze ye ŋgeu deŋia. Ve Maaron pale mata iŋgalŋgali tovene itaghoni taghoni gha ila.
Yes Israela tila tivot izi ya Meriba, ve tigham Yoova ate yabyab muul. Sawa tonenen, tigham pataŋani pa Mose paam.
Pasa, yes tizoor katini le tipas ate. Tauto igham ŋgar pooi maau, ve ipiyaav aliŋa isosor.
Sawa to tilooŋ tila taan Kanaan, Yoova isaav ariaŋa padi ighaze tirab yes to tineep tonowe tisob timatmaat. Eemoghon titaghon Yoova aliŋa maau.
Yesŋa Kanaana tiluplup di, ve titaghon ŋgar todi.
Yes timbesmbees pa maaron kaaromŋa todi, ve ŋgar tonowen inim liis padi.
Ve tigham taudi ndinatudi nditamoot ve ndiliva, ve tirab di timaat tinim watooŋrau pa avuvu samsamiadi.
Onoon kat, ndinatudi nditamoot ve ndiliva to ledi sosor eta maau, yes tirab di timatmaat tinim watooŋrau pa maaron kaaromŋa to yes Kanaana. Siŋ todi to imaliŋ, iwaghamun taan todi le isami ila Maaron mata.
Ŋgar to tighami, igham di tisami kat ila Yoova mata. Yes tipul muridi pani tinimale liva to ipul azuwa ve ila ighurghur maat.
Ŋgar to tamtoghon toni Israela tighami, nene igham Yoova ate yabyab kat, ve lolo padi maau le maau kat.
Tauto ipul di tila ndug ndug nimadi. Yes tineep ila koiadi sambadi, ve anadi tiŋgin di.
Koiadi tonowen tighur pataŋani naol padi, ve titatan di pa tapiridi, ve tigham di tinim mbesooŋa todi.
Sawa naol, Yoova ipas yes Israela tivot pa pataŋani todi. Eemoghon tighilaal ulaaŋ toni maau, ve tizorzoor aliŋa, ve titaghon taudi ŋgar todi. Ŋgar todi samia tonowen igham di tiwaghamgham.
Eemoghon Yoova ighita pataŋani todi, ve ilooŋ taŋiiz todi.
Pasa, mata iŋgal saveeŋ to imbua toman nditimbudi, ve lolo ineep tuŋia ila to tamtoghon toni ve iuluul di. Tauto itatan mbalmbali toni, ve igham yes to tikiskis yes Israela ne lolodi isamin di, ve tigham poian di.
<range>
O Yoova, Maaron tiei, ugham mulin ghei ila koiamai nimadi! Ughita. Aazne, nineep irau ndug ndug. Uyou ghei, ve ulup ghei nila taan tiei muul. Leso lolomai poia payom, ve nipait izam patabuaŋ. Ve matamai iŋgal izam ve tapirim tiina irau sawa isob.
Iit tapait Yoova pa poia toni. Ye Maaron to iit Israela. Tapaiti to aazne, ve itaghoni taghoni gha ila! Ve ival tiina pale tisaav tighaze: “Onoon kat.” Aleluia! Tapait Yoova!
Lolomim poia pa Yoova ve apaiti. Pasa, ye poia kat. Lolo ineep tuŋia ila to tamtoghon toni, ve iuluul di irau sawa isob.
Yes to Yoova igham mulin di ila koiadi nimadi, irau tisavia saveeŋ tonene. Pasa, ye iyoon padi ve ipas di tivot pa pataŋani todi, ve igham di tineep pooi.
Muuŋ, koiadi tigham di tila tineep irau ndug ndug. Pida tineep ila pa ndug to ndag iza pani, ve pida tineep ila pa ndug to ndag izila. Pida tineep ila pa rag pughu, ve pida tineep ila pa yavaar pughu. Eemoghon Yoova iyou di timuul pa taudi ndug todi.
Tamtoghon pida, tiwalaghlaagh izi ndug balim to le ya maau. Ve tikalkaal ataam tighaze tila ndug eta, leso tineep tonowe. Eemoghon tindeeŋ ataam eta maau.
Pitool di, ve murun di, le tapiridi isob.
Tovenen tineep sami. Eemoghon sawa to titaŋ roran Yoova pa ulaaŋ, ye iuul di pa pataŋani todi tonowen.
Ve ipatooŋ di pa ataam to deŋia ve tuku. Tauto titaghoni, ve rikia tila tivot ndug poia, ve tineep tonowe.
Tovenen yes irau lolodi poia pa Yoova, ve tipaiti pa poia toni. Pasa, ye lolo ineep tuŋia inim to iit tamtoghon, ve ighamgham uraat gharatooŋadi pa iuul ghiit.
Yes to murun di, ye ighamgham adi ya, leso tighun le isooŋ di. Ve yes to pitool di, ye irau di pa mbeb popoia le tiraua kat.
Tamtoghon pida, yes tineep ila ndoroom tiina lolo, ve rismoghon tone timaat. Yes tineep ila ruum to yabyabuuŋ lolo, ve ravraav toman sen ighan nimadi ve aghedi, le tisami kat.
Pasa, tizorzoor Maaron aliŋa. Maaron Tiina To Ilib Pa Ndimaronŋa Tisob, yes tiveleg saveeŋ toni inimale mbeb sorok.
Tauto ye ighur uraat pataŋani kat iza todi, leso itatan di. Yes irau tilaagh deŋia maau, ve titaptap tizi. Pasa, timbadbaad mbeb pataŋani. Ve ledi tamtoghon eta to irau iuul di ne maau.
Tovenen tineep sami. Eemoghon sawa to titaŋ roran Yoova pa ulaaŋ, ye iuul di pa pataŋani todi tonowen.
Ye ipas di tivot pa ndoroom tiina tonowen lolo, ve igham di tivot tila ghazooŋa. Ve ikuup motin ravraav toman sen pa nimadi ve aghedi.
Tovenen yes irau lolodi poia pa Yoova, ve tipaiti pa poia toni. Pasa, ye lolo ineep tuŋia inim to iit tamtoghon ve iuluul ghiit. Ve ighamgham uraat gharatooŋadi pa iit tamtoghon.
Ataam ariaŋadi to ruum to yabyabuuŋ to tigharaat di pa mbaras, ye irab balagin di. Ve ain ariaŋadi to tipalot ataam, ye iŋgor polpolin di.
Tamtoghon pida, yes tighamgham ŋgar to borouŋa, ve tinoknok zoraaŋ saveeŋ. Yes tighamgham sosor, tovenen timorooŋ, ve yabyabuuŋ tiina igham di.
Lolodi pa tighan aniiŋ eta maau. Sawa to tighita aniiŋ eta, atedi inaunau ve tilulu. Tovenen tineep ila naal avo wa.
Yes tineep sami. Eemoghon sawa to titaŋ roran Yoova pa ulaaŋ, ye iuul di pa pataŋani todi tonowen.
Ye isaav, ve tinidi popoia muul. Muuŋ, tineep ila naal avo. Ve ye igham mulin di pa mateeŋ.
Tovenen yes irau lolodi poia pa Yoova, ve tipaiti pa poia toni. Pasa, ye lolo ineep tuŋia inim to iit tamtoghon ve iuluul ghiit. Ve ighamgham uraat gharatooŋadi pa iuul iit tamtoghon.
Tovenen yes irau tigham watooŋrau pani, ve tipaiti pa poia toni. Ve lolodi poia kat, ve timbou tiina, ve tisavia uraat tintina to ye ighamgham di.
Tamtoghon pida, yes tiza waaŋ, ve tiraav tila ndug mala, leso tiraukol.
Yes tighita katin Yoova tapiri, ve uraat tintina to ye ighamgham di ila te pogho.
Pasa, ye isaav ariaŋa, ve yaghur tiina iza le ipei dibom tintina.
Dibom tonowen indae waaŋ todi iza kat, ve ipuli izi le rismoghon tone indal izila mazovan tiina lolo. Tovenen matughezaaŋ tiina igham di, le tapiridi isob.
Ve tiwataptap tinimale yes to tighun ve tiwaghamgham. Yes to te ve tiwatag ghamuuŋ pooz. Eemoghon tirau mbeb eta maau.
Tovenen tineep sami. Eemoghon sawa to titaŋ roran Yoova pa ulaaŋ, ye iuul di pa pataŋani todi tonowen.
Ye igham yaghur ate izi, ve dibom imaat.
Yes tighita taun izi, le lolodi poia. Ve Yoova igham di tila tilooŋ ndug to tighaze tila pani.
Tovenen yes irau lolodi poia pa Yoova ve tipaiti pa poia toni. Pasa, ye lolo ineep tuŋia inim to iit tamtoghon ve iuluul ghiit. Ve ighamgham uraat gharatooŋadi pa iuul iit tamtoghon.
Tovenen ighaze ival tiina tilup di pa suŋuuŋ, ndiran tonowen pale tila toman di, ve tinidi iza pa Yoova ve tipakuri. Ve sawa to yes daba tilup di, ndiran tonowen pale tineep toman di, ve yesŋa tipait Yoova iza.
Yoova irau igham ya tintina timaak le timamaas kat, tinimale ndug to le ya maau. Ve ya to tivotvot ila taan lolo ne paam, ye irau ipoon di le taan lolo imamaas.
Ighaze ndug eta tinoknok ghamuuŋ ŋgar samia, ye irau iwaghamun taan todi to ŋgoreeŋa tiina, leso isami, ve mbeb eta itub ila muul maau.
Ve ighaze ndug eta le ya maau, ye irau igham ya ivot pani, ve ireer tiina. Taan to lolo mamaasa, ye irau igham ya ivot pani.
Yes to pitool di, ye igham di tila tineep ila taan poia tonowen, ve tighami inim ledi ndug to nepooŋ.
Tovenen yes tivazog aniiŋ ve vaen ila, ve tighita anoŋa katindi tivot.
Yoova ighur poia toni izaza todi, tauto timasa tinim ival. Ve mata pa makau, mekmek, ve sipsip todi paam, le timasa tinim naol.
Ighaze tamtoghon to Maaron koiadi titatan di le tapiridi isob, ve tigham samin di, le tineep sami toman lolodi ipataŋan,
nene pale Yoova iuul di, ve itatan daba to koiadi tonowen. Pale igham di tiwaghamgham, ve tiwalaghlaagh izi ndug balim to le ataam eta maau.
Eemoghon yes to tineep ila pataŋani lolo ve mbolaaŋ igham di, ye ipas di tivot pa pataŋani todi, ve mata padi le timasa tinim ival.
Ŋgar toni tonowen, ndiran deŋiadi tighita, le lolodi poia kat. Ve ndiran samsamiadi tisob ledi saveeŋ eta muul maau. Saveeŋ todi isob.
Tamtoghon to le ŋgar, ye irau igham ŋgar pooi pa mbeb tonene, ve mata iŋgalŋgal ŋgar to Yoova to lolo ineep tuŋia ila to tamtoghon toni ve iuluul di.

Maaron, lolog ru payom maau. Lolog ineep tuŋia ilat tiom, ve naghur ilat tiom ariaŋa. Tovenen nasaav pa taug naghaze: “Umundig ve umbou pa upait Maaron.”
Lolog naghaze ndugitun, ghoro namundig ve nagharaat taug, ve napambar ambam ve narab gita ila ila le ndag pusukia iza.
Tiina tiou, you pale napait ghom pa poia tiom ila tamtoghon to ndug ndug matadi. Pale yeiŋa tamtoghon to ndug naol nilup ghei pa suŋuuŋ, ve nait mbouŋ pa napait ghom.
O Yoova, lolom ineep tuŋia ila to tamtoghon tiom ve uluul di. Ŋgar tiom tonanan, tiina le tiina kat. Izala izala le ikis sambam. Ve ŋgar to taghoniiŋ saveeŋ mbuaaŋ tiom tovene paam. Izala le ikis yaghur tae.
Maaron, ival tiina pale tipait izam izala le izala kat, ilib pa sambam paroŋania. Ve tipakur ghom pa tapirim ve poia tiom irau taan isob!
Maaron, yei tamtoghon tiom. Yom lolom tiei kat. Ulooŋ suŋuuŋ tiou tonene, ve upatooŋ tapirim ve uul ghei. Ugham mulin ghei pa pataŋani tonene.
Muuŋ, Maaron ineep izi ndug toni patabuaŋ, ve isaav ighaze: “You naparab le nalib pa koiagŋa wa. Tauto lolog poia ve navalag taan Sekem ve taan raapa to Sukot, ve nareii irau tamtoghon tiou.
Taan suruvu to Gileat, ve taan to yes Manase paam, nene you tiou. Yes Epraima tinimale hat ariaŋa to ipoon dabag pa malmal. Ve yes Yuda tinimale titi to nakisi inim ghilalooŋ pa pooz tiou.
Taan suruvu to Moap, nene inimale oon tiou to ririwaaŋ. Ve taan suruvu to Edom, nene ndug to napiyaav duduuŋa to agheg pani. Ve yes Pilistia, you naparab toman di le nalib padi. Tauto lolog poia ve aliŋag iza.”
Sei irau igham ghou nalib pa koiagŋa ve nalooŋ nala ndug todi to didiiŋ ariaŋa iluvuti ne? Sei pale imuuŋ payou, ve ighereb ghou nala navot taan suruvu to yes Edoma?
Ite paam maau. Yom moghon. Eemoghon Maaron, aazne yom ughur murim payei, ve unum toman ndaaba tiei muul maau.
Maaron, uul ghei. Leso nilib pa koiamai. Pasa, ulaaŋ to nighamghami ila to tamtoghon, nene anoŋa maau.
Eemoghon ighaze Maaron inim toman ghei, nene pale nilib padi. Ye irau itatan di, le tapiridi isob kat.
O Maaron, sawa isob you napapait ghom. Ulooŋ suŋuuŋ tiou. Neneeŋam malep!
Pasa, ndiran samsamiadi to avodi kaarom, tighur koi payou, ve tiŋgal saveeŋ kaarom naol payou.
Koiagŋa tonowen tipipiyaav saveeŋ samsamia payou, ve tiwaghamun izag sorok.
Muuŋ, you lolog padi, ve nagham ŋgar poia padi. Eemoghon tiyat ŋgar poia to nagham padi ne pa ŋgar samia, ve tiŋgal saveeŋ naol payou. Eemoghon you ŋgeu to suŋuuŋ.
Ŋgar poia to you nagham padi, yes tiyati pa ŋgar samia. You lolog padi. Eemoghon yes tighur koi payou, ve tighaze:
“Taghur tamtoghon samia eta iyoon ila dige pa iŋgal saveeŋ pani. Leso sawa to tipayoonda pa savsaveeŋ, tighita tighaze ye isosor, ve tighur atia pani. Ve nighaze suŋuuŋ toni paam, nene isosor ila Maaron mata.
<range>
Ŋgeu tonowen ineep mala izi taan malep. Tamtoghon ite paam igham ina, ve igham uraat toni, ghoro poia.
Azuwa pale inim naar, ve ndinatu tinim parooŋa.
Pale tireu ndinatu ruum todi tizi, ve tinaan di tighau tila. Leso tiwaghamgham, tiwalaghlaagh, ve tisuŋsuŋ ledi mbeb.
Ighaze ŋgeu tonowen igham bun ila to tamtoghon eta, nene pale tamtoghon tonenen inim ve iyou mbeb toni tisob tinim le. Mbeb to ye ighun wadedeŋa pani, ndiran to ndug ite pale tila ve tiyou di tinim ledi.
Tamtoghon eta igham poian ŋgeu tonowen malep. Ve ndinatu to tinim parooŋa, tamtoghon eta lolo isamin di ve iuul di malep.
Ndinatu timatmaat le tisob, ghoro poia. Leso ŋgeu tonowen le iza muul sob, ve tamtoghon lolodi imaagh pani.
Ŋgar samia to nditimbu, tamtoghon pale tisavia pa Yoova, leso mata iŋgalŋgali. Ve sosor to tina paam, Yoova ireua malep.
Tovenen sosor to ŋgeu tonowen toman siŋ toni, Yoova pale mata iŋgalŋgali irau sawa isob, ve ipasob di pa taan. Leso tamtoghon lolodi imaagh padi kat.
Pasa, ŋgeu tonowen, mata iŋgal ve igham ŋgar poia eta pa tamtoghon maau. Yes mbolaaŋa ve yes to tineep ila pataŋani lolo, ye ighamgham samin di, ve irab di timatmaat.
Ŋgar to avood samia pa tamtoghon, ye lolo pani. Eemoghon saveeŋ toni samia tonowen pale imuul pa tau, ve iwaghamuni. Ŋgar to tasuŋ Maaron leso ighur poia toni iza to tamtoghon, ŋgeu tonowen lolo pani maau. Tovenen poia to Maaron pale ineep saguan pani.
Ŋgar to avood samia pa tamtoghon, ye ipulpuli maau. Nene inimale nonogiiŋa to ye lolo pani kat, ve moghon moghon indududi. Eemoghon saveeŋ toni samia tonowen pale imuul pa tau, ve izila lolo inimale ya, ve itaghon tua to naol ne inimale ŋgoreeŋ, ve iwaghamuni.
Saveeŋ toni samia tonowen, pale imuul pa tau ve ikaui, inimale kawaal to ye ikawaala ila ŋgali, ve inimale puus to ipusi pani irau sawa isob.”
O Yoova, saveeŋ samsamia naol to koiagŋa tiŋgalŋgali payou, upamuula imuul ila pa taudi. Leso uyat ŋgar todi tonowen.
Yoova, yom Maaron tiou. Izam tiina pa poia tiom ve ulaaŋ tiom. Yom lolom ineep tuŋia ila to tamtoghon tiom ve uluul di. Tovenen uyoon payou, ve upas ghou navot pa pataŋani tiou tonene.
Pasa, aazne naneep sami, ve leg ataam eta maau. Tovenen ateg imbumbu, ve lolog isami kat.
You nanimale mbeb yavyaava to ighaze ndag izila, ghoro taghita muul maau. You nanim isis to yaghur iviviira ila.
You naŋgun taug pa ghaniiŋ aniiŋ ris wa. Tovenen nakoŋkoŋ, ve tuag tisob timareer, ve agheg imatmaat.
Ighaze koiagŋa tighita ghou, yes tiveveleg ghou, ve tiŋiŋiŋ payou. Ve luadi katia payou ve tighaze: “Aa, ughita wa?”
Yoova, yom Maaron tiou. Uul ghou lak! Ugham mulin ghou pa pataŋani tiou tonene. Pasa, lolom ineep tuŋia ila to tamtoghon tiom ve uluul di.
Ugham koiagŋa tiwatag nimam. Upatooŋ tapirim padi ve tighita katini pa matadi. Leso tighilaal tighaze yom to Volaaŋa tiou.
Onoon, yes avodi samia payou. Eemoghon yom pale ughur poia tiom iza tiou. Ighaze koiagŋa tipamundigin malmal payou, yom pale utatan di, ve upamuul di tila toman mayadi. Leso ugham mbesooŋa tiom lolo poia ve tini iza.
Tovenen yes to tiŋgal saveeŋ payou ne, ugham di tiwaghamgham, ve tighau tila toman mayadi. Mayaŋiiŋa todi tonowen pale inim ledi nonogiiŋa pa tindudi irau sawa isob.
Eemoghon you pale lolog poia kat pa Yoova, ve aliŋag iza ve napaiti pa poia toni. Sawa to yeiŋa ival tiina nilup ghei pa suŋuuŋ, you pale nait iza.
Pasa, yes to tineep ila pataŋani lolo ve titaŋ rorani pa ulaaŋ, ye iyondyood digedi pa iuul di. Ve yes to koiadi tiŋgal saveeŋ padi ve tighaze tirab di timaat, ye igham mulin di.
Yoova isaav pa Tiina tiou ighaze: “Unum mbolem izi ila pa nimag waan, le irau natatan koiamŋa ve tapiridi isob kat, ve uvazag di ila aghem samba.”
O kinik, aazne yom unepneep izi ndug Zion, ve Yoova igham titi to kinik payom leso ipalot ghom. Tauto tapirim tiina ve pooz tiom ila irau ndug ndug. Yoova isaav payom ighaze: “Utatan koiamŋa to tiluvut ghom, ve ugham di tineep ila sambam.”
Ighaze umundig ula pa malmal, tamtoghon tiom ndiŋndiŋ ndiŋndiŋ pale lolodi ipazaagh di tighaze tilat ve yamŋa ala. Ighaze ndag pusukia iza, ndipain tiom to tiraua kat pa malmal, pale tikeet tilat tineep tirau lolooz patabuaŋa to tiluvut Yerusalem, tinimale waam to mboŋmaagh itatab kikiliiŋ.
Yoova imbua saveeŋ toman ghom, ve ipariaaŋa le iyaryaaŋ kat. Irau itoor ŋgar toni maau. Isaav payom ighaze: “Yom ŋgeu to watooŋrau unumale Melkizedek. Ve yom pale uneep tovene itaghoni taghoni gha ila.”
Maaron ineep ila pa nimam waan ve ipapalot ghom. Sawa to mbalmbali toni ighaze ivot, ye pale ipamundigin malmal ve irab yes kinik tisob.
Pale ighur atia pa ndug ndug, ve irab di tisob timatmaat, le patudi tizi tiwaghengheen izi taan. Tovenen yes pooza to tineep tirau taan, ye pale irab di le tisob.
Ve kinik tiei, ye pale ighun ya to ireer igharau ataam dige, le tapiri ivot muul. Tovenen ye pale ilib pa malmal, ve tini iza.
Aleluia, tapait Yoova! Ighaze ndiran deŋiadi tilup di pa suŋuuŋ, you pale nala toman di, ve napait Yoova toman lolog kat.
Pasa, Yoova ighamgham uraat tintina. Tovenen yes to lolodi pa uraat toni kat, tighamgham ŋgar pa uraat toni irau sawa isob tighaze le tiwatag katini.
Uraat toni ipatooŋa ighaze ye tapiri tiina ve poia kat. Tauto tamtoghon titandag pani. Ŋgar toni deŋia pale inepneep tovene itaghoni taghoni gha ila.
Ye ipamundigin ŋgar toit, leso mataad kisin uraat toni to gharatooŋadi ne. Ye lolo isasamin tamtoghon toni, ve ighamgham poian di.
Yes to timatughez pani, ve titaghon ŋgar toni, ye ighamgham adi aniiŋ. Ve saveeŋ to yesŋa tamtoghon toni timbua pa tilup di tinim ee moghon, ye mata iŋgalŋgali ve itaghoni irau sawa isob.
Muuŋ, ye igham uraat tintina ila tamtoghon toni matadi, leso ipatooŋ tapiri padi. Sawa tonenen, ye igham taan to ndug ndug inim ledi pa tineep ila.
Uraat naol to ye igham di, nene tipatooŋa tighaze ye itataghon saveeŋ mbuaaŋ toni, ve ŋgar toni deŋia moghon. Tovenen tutuuŋ tisob to ye ighur di, iit irau taghur ila, ve tataghon katin di.
Tutuuŋ tonowen pale tiyaryaaŋ tovene itaghoni taghoni gha ila. Yoova ighur tutuuŋ tonowen itaghon saveeŋ mbuaaŋ toni ve ŋgar deŋia.
Muuŋ, ye ipas tamtoghon toni tivot pa pataŋani todi. Ve sawa to yesŋa timbua saveeŋ pa tilup di tinim ee moghon, avo iyaryaaŋ padi ighaze titaghon saveeŋ mbuaaŋ todi tonowen ŋgara irau sawa isob. Ye tapiri tiina, ve iza patabuaŋ kat. Tauto tamatughez pani, ve tataghon ŋgar toni.
Ŋgar to tamatughez pa Yoova ve tataghon ŋgar toni, nene inim pughu pa ŋgar poia. Yes to titaghon saveeŋ toni, tiwatag ataam to tigham nepooŋ poia. Tovenen iit tapaiti irau sawa isob!
Aleluia, tapait Yoova! Ŋgeu to ighaze imatughez pa Yoova ve itaghon ŋgar toni, ve tutuuŋ to Yoova ighami lolo poia kat, nene pale tini iza, ve poia to Maaron iza toni.
Ve papaghu toni pale tinim ndiran to izadi tintina. Tovenen yes to tineep deŋiadi ila Maaron mata, tamtoghon to taan tonene pale titandag pa papaghu todi, ve poia to Maaron iza todi.
Ndiran deŋiadi, ruum todi ivon kat pa mbaliiŋ ve mbeb popoia katindi. Ve ŋgar todi deŋia pale ineep ariaŋa itaghoni taghoni gha ila.
Ighaze ŋgeu deŋia eta ineep ndoroom tiina lolo, nene pale ghazooŋa to Maaron isuli. Tamtoghon tovene lolo isasamin tamtoghon, ve ighamgham poian di, ve ipatooŋ ŋgar deŋia padi.
Ŋgeu to ighaze mata reiŋ mbeb, ve iyokia mbeb toni pa iuul tamtoghon, ve itaghon ŋgar deŋia moghon pa uraat toni, nene pale ineep pooi.
Tamtoghon to itaghon ŋgar deŋia, tovaaŋ eta irau ighami itap ne maau. Ve tamtoghon pale matadi kisini pa ŋgar poia toni tonowen itaghoni taghoni gha ila.
Ighaze ilooŋ mbeb samia eta varu, ye irau imatughez maau. Pasa, inumeer Yoova, ve ghurla toni iyaryaaŋ kat.
Tovenen matughezaaŋ irau ighami maau. Iyoon ariaŋa, le ighita Maaron itatan koia.
Ye mata iŋgalŋgal yes mbolaaŋa, ve ireirei mbeb padi. Ŋgar toni deŋia pale ineep ariaŋa tovene itaghoni taghoni gha ila. Tovenen iza pale inim tiina, ve tamtoghon titandag pani.
Ndiran samsamiadi tighita ŋgar to ivotvot pani, le atedi yabyab, ve tiŋaaŋ mareer pani. Eemoghon irau tigham ŋgar eta pani ne maau. Pale pataŋani ivot padi ve tilaledi. Tovenen mbeb popoia to lolodi padi, nene irau tigham di maau.
Aleluia, tapait Yoova! Yam mbesooŋa to Yoova, apakuri, ve apait iza.
Apait Yoova pa poia toni to aazne, ve itaghoni taghoni gha ila!
Yam to aneep ila pa ndag iza, ve ila pa yam to aneep ila pa ndag izila, apait Yoova iza!
Yoova ineep sala kat, ve ndug tisob tineep ila samba. Iza ve tapiri ilib pa mbeb tisob to sambam.
Sei to irau Maaron tiei Yoova? Eta maau. Ye inepneep ila ina to ghamuuŋ pooz to ineep sala kat.
Tovenen mata izila le izila kat to sila we, ghoro ighita mbeb to sambam paroŋania ve taan.
Eemoghon yes to ledi izadi maau, ve yes mbolaaŋa to moghon moghon tilala ndug to piyavooŋ buzbuz, ve tikalkaal adi aniiŋ, ye lolo imaagh padi maau. Ye ipapakur di ve iuluul di, leso tineep pooi toman tinidi iza. Tovenen yes irau tineep toman yes daba to tighamgham pooz pa tamtoghon.
<range>
Ve yes ndiliva to upadi, ye ighamgham ledi inadi popoia to nepooŋ, ve ighamgham ledi ndinatudi. Tovenen tineep toman ndinatudi tonowen, ve lolodi poia kat. Aleluia, tapait Yoova!
Muuŋ, Israela tipul Isip ve tila. Yakop papaghu toni tipul tamtoghon to aliŋadi ite, ve tivot.
Sawa tonenen, yes Yuda tinim Yoova ina patabuaŋ to nepooŋ. Ve yes Israela, tineep ila ye nima, ve iŋgin di.
Sawa to Te Kaviaaŋa ighita Yoova tamtoghon toni tinim, ye imatughez ve ighau. Ve ya Yordan ighita di, le ipamuula ilooŋ ila ve ipot inimale ya naliu.
Ve lolooz tovene paam. Yoŋgyoog itok, le tiyatov di tinimale mekmek. Ve ndug mbuŋa mbuŋa tiyatov di tinimale sipsip ndinatu.
O te, sa mbeb ivot payom to ughau? Ve ya Yordan, pughu vena to upamuula ulooŋ ula ve upot unumale ya naliu?
Ve yam lolooz ve ndug mbuŋa mbuŋa, ayatov gham pasa?
O taan, upatum ghom! Pasa, mala maau pale Yoova inim. Paam Maaron to Yakop inim, ve ipatooŋ tapiri payom.
Ye to igham ya ivot ila yaam, ve izi ipot inimale ya naliu. Onoon kat, ye igham ya ivot ila yaam ariaŋa, ve ireer izi.
O Yoova, yei lolomai pa tamtoghon tipait izamai malep. Tipait yom izam pa tapirim ve poia tiom, ghoro poia. Pasa, lolom ineep tuŋia ila to tamtoghon tiom ve uluul di, ve utaghon saveeŋ mbuaaŋ tiom irau sawa isob. Tovenen upatooŋ tapirim, ve uul ghei.
Pa vene, ndug ndug tiveleg ghom, ve tisaav payei tighaze: “Aa, Maaron tiam ineep sine?”
Eemoghon yei niwatag: Maaron tiei, ye ineep izi sambam. Ve sa ŋgar to ye ighaze ighami, nene ighami moghon.
Ndug ndug tighagharaat maaron todi pa silva ve gol. Maaron kaaromŋa tonowen, tamtoghon tigharaat di pa nimadi.
Yes ledi avodi. Eemoghon tisavsaav maau. Ve ledi matadi. Eemoghon tighita ndug maau.
Yes ledi taliŋadi. Eemoghon tilooŋ saveeŋ maau. Ve ledi uzudi. Eemoghon tiyaaz mbeb eta vuzi maau.
Yes ledi aghedi. Eemoghon irau tilaagh maau. Ve ledi nimadi. Eemoghon irau tikis mbeb eta ve tiyamaana ne maau. Onoon kat, saveeŋ ma taŋiiz eta ivot pa avodi maau.
Tamtoghon to tighagharaat maaron kaaromŋa tovene ve tinumeer di, yes tisob tinimale maaron todi tonowen. Tirau mbeb eta maau.
Yam ival tiina to Israel, anumeer Yoova. Pasa, ye to Volaaŋa tiam, ve inim sigeu payam.
Ve yam to watooŋrau to avot ila to Aron ne paam, anumeer Yoova! Pasa, ye to Volaaŋa tiam, ve inim sigeu payam.
Tovenen yam to amatughez pa Yoova ve ataghon ŋgar toni, yam asob anumeera. Pasa, ye to Volaaŋa tiam, ve inim sigeu payam.
Yoova mata iŋgalŋgal ghei. Ve ye pale ighur poia toni iza tiei. Pale ighur poia toni iza to yes to watooŋrau to tivot ila to Aron. Ve ighur poia toni iza to ival tiina to Israel paam.
Tovenen yes to timatughez pani ve titaghon ŋgar toni, ye pale ighur poia toni iza to yes tisob. Yes to ledi izadi maau, ve yes to izadi tintina ne paam.
Yoova pale igham gham toman papaghu tiam amasa anim naol.
Yoova to ighur sambam ve taan. Ye pale ighur poia toni iza tiam.
Sambam, nene Yoova ndug toni. Ve taan, nene ye igham pa iit tamtoghon pa taneep ila.
Yes to timaat ve tizila ndug to mateeŋa, eta iyou oroor maau. Neneeŋadi moghon. Irau tipait Yoova muul maau.
Eemoghon iit to taneep mataad iyaryaar, ghoro lolood poia pa Yoova, ve tapaiti pa poia toni. To aazne, ve itaghoni taghoni gha ila. Aleluia, tapait Yoova!
You lolog pa Yoova kat pasa, ye ilooŋ taŋiiz tiou. You nataŋ rorani pa ulaaŋ, ve ye ighur taliŋa payou, ve iuul ghou. Tovenen sawa to naneep izi taan, suŋuuŋ tiou pale iŋarua irau sawa isob.
<range>
Liis to mateeŋ, rismoghon tone igham ghou. Ravraav to mateeŋ ikau ghou, ve ighaze ighereb ghou nazila ndug to mateeŋa. Tovenen igham lolog ipataŋan, ve matughezaaŋ tiina igham ghou.
Tauto nataŋ roran Yoova naghaze: “O Yoova, paam namaat. Uul ghou lak!”
Yoova lolo isasamin ghiit, ve ighamgham poian ghiit. Ŋgar toni, nene deŋia moghon.
Yes to irau tiuul taudi maau, Yoova tau iŋgin di, ve iuluul di. Inimale you. Sawa to pataŋani itatan ghou le tapirig isob, ye inim ve igham mulin ghou.
Tauto aazne, ateg izi ve lolog poia muul. Pasa, Yoova igham poian ghou kat.
Onoon kat, ye igham mulin ghou pa mateeŋ, ve ipasob taŋiiz tiou. Ve ye to ikiskis ghou. Tauto natap maau, ve aazne naneep matag iyaryaar. Ve laghooŋ tiou, nazuaria ghou naghaze le nataghon ŋgar to deŋia moghon ila Yoova mata.
<range>
Muuŋ, you nasaav pa taug naghaze: “Pataŋani tiina igham ghou le naneep sami.” Eemoghon nakis ghurla tiou tuŋia.
Pataŋani tonowen igham ghou le nakaal ataam. Tovenen napiyaav saveeŋ sorok naghaze: “Tamtoghon tisob, avodi kaarom moghon. Irau nanumeer eta maau.”
Pale nagham sa pa Yoova, leso nayat ŋgar popoia naol to ye igham payou ne?
You pale nagham rubruub vaen, ve naliŋi izala watooŋrau tiou pogho pa napaiti, ve nasuŋ pani toman lolog poia. Pasa, ye igham mulin ghou pa pataŋani tiou.
Tovenen sawa to Yoova tamtoghon toni tilup di pa suŋuuŋ, you pale nataghon saveeŋ to nambua tomani, ve nagham uraata ila matadi.
Yes to lolodi ineep tuŋia ila to Yoova ve titaghon ataam toni, ye lolo padi kat. Tovenen ye irau ighita mateeŋ to todi eta inimale mbeb sorok ne maau.
O Yoova, you mbesooŋa tiom. Nambesmbees payom inimale muuŋ tinaŋ imbesmbees payom. Muuŋ, nepooŋ tiou inimale tikau ghou pa ravraav ve sen. Eemoghon yom upoola payou, tauto aazne naneep pooi.
Tovenen you pale nagham watooŋrau payom, ve nasuŋ payom toman lolog poia, ve napait ghom.
Sawa to Yoova tamtoghon toni tizala Yerusalem, ve tilup di pa suŋuuŋ ilooŋ ila sirsiir to rumai toni lolo, you pale nataghon saveeŋ mbuaaŋ tiou tonene, ve nagham uraata ila matadi. Aleluia, tapait Yoova!
<range>
Yam tamtoghon to ndug ndug, apait Yoova! Yam to aneep irau taan, asob andae iza ve apakuri.
Pasa, poia toni, nene tiina le tiina kat. Ye lolo ineep tuŋia ila to tamtoghon toni, ve iuluul di irau sawa isob. Ve ŋgar to taghoniiŋ saveeŋ mbuaaŋ toni paam, inepneep tovene, itaghoni taghoni gha ila. Aleluia, tapait Yoova!
Lolomim poia pa Yoova ve apaiti! Pasa, ye poia kat. Lolo ineep tuŋia ila to tamtoghon toni ve iuluul di.
Yam ival tiina to Israel, alup avomim ve asaav aghaze: “Ye lolo pa tamtoghon toni ve iuluul di.”
Ve yam to watooŋrau to avot ila to Aron ne paam, asaav aghaze: “Ye lolo pa tamtoghon toni ve iuluul di.”
Tovenen yam to amatughez pa Yoova ve ataghon ŋgar toni, asob asaav aghaze: “Ye lolo pa tamtoghon toni ve iuluul di.”
Muuŋ, you naneep ila pataŋani tiina lolo ve leg ataam maau. Tovenen nataŋ roran Yoova pa ulaaŋ. Ve ye ilooŋ aliŋag, ve ipas ghou navot pa pataŋani tiou. Tauto aazne, naneep ila ndug ghazooŋa.
Ighaze Yoova ineep digeg, you irau namatughez maau. Pasa, tamtoghon pale tigham sa payou?
Yoova ivool tiou, ve iuluul ghou. Ye pale itatan koiagŋa ila matag, ve nalib padi.
Iit tanumeer tamtoghon to taan malep. Tanumeer Yoova ve tayooŋ ila toni, ghoro poia.
Yes daba to tighamgham pooz ne paam, tanumeer di malep. Tanumeer Yoova ve tayooŋ ila toni, ghoro poia.
Muuŋ, ndug ndug tinim tiluvut ghou tighaze tigham malmal payou. Eemoghon Yoova ipalot ghou, tauto napasob di.
Tiŋarua ghou tinim, ve tiluvut ghou, le leg ataam eta pa naghau maau. Eemoghon Yoova, tauto napasob di.
Yes timorau ghou tinimale ŋguruub. Eemoghon Yoova ipalot ghou, tauto napasob di le tapiridi isob. Yes tinimale yab to ighan reg ve iyaryaar, ve rikia moghon imaat.
Yes tipamundigin malmal payou, ve rismoghon tone titatan ghou. Eemoghon Yoova iuul ghou, tauto tiwaghamun ghou maau.
Pasa, ye Volaaŋa tiou ariaŋa. You naghamgham tapirig ila toni, ve ye inim sigeu payou. Tauto nambou mbouŋ pa napait iza.
Alooŋ. Ndiran deŋiadi tinepneep ila mbeez todi todi, ve timboboob ve tipapait Yoova iza toman lolodi poia. Pasa, ye ilib pa koiadi wa. Tisavsaav tighaze: “Yoova nima waan, nene pataŋani.
Nima iparab ariaŋa kat. Ye igharaat tau pa malmal, ve iparab le ilib pa koia!”
You pale namaat sone. Pale naneep matag iyaryaar. Leso navotia uraat tintina to Yoova ighamgham di.
Onoon, ye ilos katin ghou. Eemoghon ipul ghou namaat maau.
Tovenen akaak ataam to ndiran deŋiadi payou. Leso nataghoni nalooŋ nala, ve napait Yoova pa ŋgar to ye igham payou.
Nene ataam to Yoova. Yes to tineep deŋiadi ila ye mata, ghoro titaghoni tilooŋ tila.
Yoova, yom ulooŋ suŋuuŋ tiou, ve ugham mulin ghou pa pataŋani tiou. Tovenen lolog poia payom, ve napait ghom.
Yaam to yes to reiŋ ruum matadi velegini ve tipiyaava ilale, tauto inim pughu pa ruum ve ipaloti. Leso ruum iyoon ariaŋa izala pogho.
Maaron tau igham mbeb tonene ivot. Ve yei nighita inimale mbeb gharatooŋa eez ila matamai.
Ndag to aazne, Yoova ighuri. Tovenen tiniid iza ve lolood poia pani.
O Yoova, lolom isamin ghei, ve ugham mulin ghei! Uul ghei, leso mbeb tisob tivot pooi payei.
Ŋgeu tonene inim pa Yoova iza. Tovenen poia to Yoova pale iza toni. Yei to nineep ila Yoova rumai toni lolo, nighasoni nighaze ighur poia toni iza tiam.
Yoova, ye Maaron tau! Ye igham poian ghiit, ve ghazooŋa toni isul ghiit. Akis napatolo mbila ve ala aluvut artaal ve apaiti.
Yom Maaron tiou. You lolog poia payom, ve napait ghom pa poia tiom. Onoon kat, yom to Maaron tiou. Tovenen you pale nait izam.
Lolomim poia pa Yoova, ve apaiti pa poia toni. Pasa, ye poia kat. Ye lolo ineep tuŋia ila to tamtoghon toni ve iuluul di.
Yes to tighamgham sosor maau, ve laghooŋ todi deŋia moghon itaghon saveeŋ to Yoova, nene pale poia toni izaza todi ve tinidi iza.
Yes to matadi kisin ataam to Maaron ighuri pa tamtoghon toni ve titaghoni, ve tighur lolodi kat pa Maaron, ve tizuaria di leso tiwatagi kat, ve tighamgham sosor maau, ve laghooŋ todi, titaghon ataam to Maaron, nene pale poia to Maaron iza todi ve lolodi poia kat.
<range>
Yoova, yom ughaze nitaghon tutuuŋ tiom eŋaeŋa ŋgara le nitaghoni kat.
Tutuuŋ tiom to tineep pataghaaŋ, ŋgar tiou iyaryaaŋ naghaze le nataghon katin di.
Pasa, ighaze matag iŋgal tutuuŋ tiom tisob, nene irau mayag ila ival tiina matadi maau.
Ataam tiom to gabizooŋ mbeb, nene deŋia moghon. Ighaze upatooŋ ghou pani, nene pale lolog poia payom, ve napait ghom toman lolog ŋgalaaŋa.
Tutuuŋ tiom naol to tineep pataghaaŋ, you pale matag kisin di, ve nataghon di irau sawa isob. Tovenen upul murim payou malep.
Ighaze pain paghu eta lolo pa laghooŋ toni iŋgalaaŋ ila matam, pale igham sa? Ye irau mata iŋgal aliŋam ve itaghoni.
You naghur lolog payom kat, ve nazuaria ghou naghaze le nawatag katin ghom. Tovenen upul ghou nayel pa tutuuŋ tiom malep.
You naghita aliŋam naghaze nene mbeb tau. Tovenen naghur poiani ineep ila lolog. Leso ipalot ghou, ve nagham sosor payom sob.
O Yoova, you napait ghom pa poia tiom. Upaghazoŋan ghou pa tutuuŋ tiom naol to tineep pataghaaŋ.
Tutuuŋ tiom naol to yom uvotia di, you pale nasavia di le tisob.
Ataam to yom ughuri payei, sawa to nataghoni, nene igham lolog poia kat, nanimale yes to tipakur di pa mbaliiŋ to taan.
Matag itaghon tutuuŋ tiom eŋaeŋa ŋgara naghaze le naghazooŋ padi. Ve matag iŋgalŋgal ataam tiom irau sawa isob.
Tutuuŋ tiom naol to tineep pataghaaŋ, tigham lolog poia le poia kat. Irau lolog imaagh pa aliŋam maau.
O Yoova, you mbesooŋa tiom. Upatooŋ poia tiom payou. Leso naneep pooi, ve nataghon aliŋam irau sawa isob.
Upaghazoŋan ŋgar tiou, leso naghilaal ŋgar popoia naol to tineep ila saveeŋ tiom lolo.
Taan tonene, nene ndug tiou kat maau. You naneep nanim loom pani moghon. Tovenen ugham ghou naghazooŋ pa tutuuŋ tiom naol ŋgara.
Moghon moghon, you lolog naghaze le upatooŋ ghou pa ataam tiom to gabizooŋ mbeb, ghoro poia!
Yes to tipapait taudi ve tiveleg ghom, yom uyaan di, ve mbalmbali tiom izaza todi. Pasa, tiyel pa tutuuŋ tiom.
Ve you, ghoro matag kisin ataam to yom ughuri payei, ve nataghoni irau sawa isob. Tovenen saveeŋ velegiiŋ ve mayaŋiiŋa to tipiyaav di payou ne, yom upaghau di payou.
Yes daba to tighamgham pooz ne paam, tilup di, ve tikalkaal ataam tighaze tiwaghamun ghou. Eemoghon you mbesooŋa tiom. Pale matag itaghon tutuuŋ tiom naol to tineep pataghaaŋ, ve nagham ŋgar padi pooi.
Ataam to yom ughuri payei, nene igham lolog poia le poia kat. Ve ipasaluŋgan ghou, leso nawatag sa ŋgar to pale nataghoni.
You tapirig isob, ve rismoghon tone namaat ve nagheen ila ghavuur. Upamundigin ghou, ve ugham tapirig ivot muul itaghon saveeŋ tiom.
Ŋgar naol to naghamgham di ne, you navotia di payom. Tauto ulooŋ suŋuuŋ tiou, ve uul ghou. Upaghazoŋan ghou pa tutuuŋ tiom naol to tineep pataghaaŋ.
Tutuuŋ naol to yom ughur di, upatooŋ ghou pa ataam to nataghon di. Ve you pale matag itaghon uraat tiom gharatooŋadi, ve nagham ŋgar padi pooi.
You lolog ipataŋan le tapirig isob. Upalot ghou itaghon saveeŋ mbuaaŋ tiom.
Uul ghou pa naneep saguan pa ŋgar kaarom. Saveeŋ tiom, nene inim ataam pa poia tiom iza tiou.
You lolog ighur naghaze you pale nataghon ataam to saveeŋ onoon. Ve matag iŋgalŋgal ataam tiom to gabizooŋ mbeb.
O Yoova, ataam to yom ughuri payei, you nakisi ineep tuŋia ila lolog. Tovenen upul ghou malep! Pa vene, mayag.
Yom upatooŋ ghou pa mbeb katindi. Tauto tinig iza pa nataghon ataam to tutuuŋ tiom.
O Yoova, tutuuŋ tiom naol to tineep pataghaaŋ, upatooŋ ghou pa ataam to nataghon di. Leso matag kisin di, ve nataghon di ila ila le sawa tiou isob.
Upaghazoŋan ghou pa saveeŋ tiom ŋgara. Leso matag kisini, ve nataghoni toman lolog irau sawa isob.
Umuuŋ ve upatooŋ ataam payou, leso nataghon tutuuŋ tiom. Pasa, ataam tonenen to igham lolog poia le poia kat.
Upamundigin lolog, leso nataghon ataam to yom ughuri payei, ve nagham ŋgar pa ndouŋ leg mbaliiŋ to taan sob.
Upaghau matag pa mbeb soroksorok to taan to anoŋadi maau ne, ve upalot ghou pa nataghon ataam tiom. Leso naneep matag iyaryaar.
You mbesooŋa tiom. Tovenen matam iŋgal saveeŋ mbuaaŋ tiom, ve ugham anoŋa ivot payou. Saveeŋ tiom tonenen iŋarua tamtoghon tisob to timatughez payom ve titaghon ŋgar tiom.
Saveeŋ samia to koiagŋa tipiyaava payou, nene igham ghou namatughez. Pasa, ighaze tamtoghon tighur ila saveeŋ todi tonowen, nene pale mayag. Tovenen utatan saveeŋ todi, leso tamtoghon tighur ila sob. Pasa, ataam tiom to gabizooŋ tamtoghon, nene deŋia moghon.
O Yoova, you naghaze nataghon tutuuŋ tisob to yom ughur di. Tovenen utaghon ŋgar tiom deŋia, ve ugham ghou naneep matag iyaryaar.
O Yoova, you nawatag: Yom lolom ineep tuŋia ila to tamtoghon tiom ve uluul di. Upatooŋ ŋgar tonanan payou paam, ghoro poia. Tovenen ugham mulin ghou pa pataŋani tiou itaghon saveeŋ mbuaaŋ tiom.
Leso you irau napamuul saveeŋ velegiiŋ to tipiyaava payou. Pasa, you naghur ila saveeŋ tiom.
You naghur matag pa gabizooŋ tiom. Tovenen uul ghou lak! Leso avog ivotia gabuam to avom onoon ve utaghon saveeŋ tiom irau sawa isob.
You pale nataghon saveeŋ tiom irau sawa isob. To aazne, ve itaghoni taghoni gha ila.
Tutuuŋ to yom ughur di, you nazuaria ghou pa nataghon di. Tovenen mbeb eta irau ipoon ataam payou maau.
Ataam to yom ughuri payei, you pale navotia ila yes kinik matadi paam. Pasa, you namatughez, ma mayag pa tamtoghon eta maau.
Tutuuŋ tiom to naol ne, tigham lolog poia le poia kat. Tauto lolog padi kat.
You lolog pa tutuuŋ tiom to naol ne ve napatab padi. Tovenen nakaak nimag, ve napait ghom pa tutuuŋ tiom. Tutuuŋ tiom naol to tineep pataghaaŋ, matag itaghon di naghaze nagham ŋgar padi pooi.
You mbesooŋa tiom. Matam iŋgal saveeŋ to umbua toman ghou. Pasa, saveeŋ tiom tonowen ipapalot ghou pa naghur matag payom, ve nasaŋan ulaaŋ tiom.
Ighaze pataŋani igham ghou, nene pale saveeŋ tiom iuul ghou ve naneep pooi. Ŋgar tonene, to irab ateg le ateg izi.
Yes to tipapait taudi ve tiveleg ghom, moghon moghon tiveveleg ghou paam. Eemoghon you napul murig pa saveeŋ tiom maau.
O Yoova, matag iŋgalŋgal sawa naol to muuŋ uŋgabiiz tamtoghon ve ughur atia padi. Tauto ipalot ghou, ve igham ateg izi.
Ighaze naghita ndiran samsamiadi tipul muridi pa saveeŋ tiom, nene igham ghou ateg yabyab kat.
Taan tonene, you naneep pani nanim loom moghon, ve natoor mbouŋ katindi pa tutuuŋ tiom naol to tineep pataghaaŋ.
Yoova, matag iŋgalŋgal ghom pa mboŋ paam, ve nataghon saveeŋ tiom.
You gabuag tovene: Tutuuŋ to yom ughur di, matag kisin di ve nataghon di irau sawa isob.
Yoova, you naghita ghom unumale mbeb tau. You naneep ilat tiom. Unumale taan poia eez to tipuli payou pa naneep pani. You nambua saveeŋ payom naghaze you pale nataghon aliŋam.
Taŋiiz tiou iŋarua ghom toman lolog: Lolom isamin ghou, ve ughur poia tiom iza tiou itaghon saveeŋ mbuaaŋ tiom.
You naŋgabiiz laghooŋ tiou naghaze nene deŋia maau. Tauto natoor ŋgar tiou, ve naghaze nataghon ataam to yom ughuri payei.
Ve irau nasaŋan maau. Pale rikia moghon ve nataghon tutuuŋ tiom.
Ndiran samsamia tighur liis naol pa tighaze tiliis ghou. Eemoghon irau lolog imaagh pa tutuuŋ tiom maau.
You namundig pa mboŋ anoŋa, ve napait ghom. Pasa, ataam tiom to gabizooŋ mbeb, nene deŋia moghon.
Yes to timatughez payom ve titaghon ŋgar tiom, you lolog padi, ve nagham di tinim nditag.
O Yoova, yom lolom ineep tuŋia ila to tamtoghon tiom ve uluul di. Ŋgar tiom tonanan, yom upatooŋa irau taan isob. Upaghazoŋan ghou pa tutuuŋ tiom naol to tineep pataghaaŋ, leso nawatag di kat.
O Yoova, you mbesooŋa tiom. Yom ughamgham poian ghou kat itaghon saveeŋ mbuaaŋ tiom.
You naghur ila naghaze tutuuŋ tiom to naol ne, nene popoiadi moghon. Tovenen upatooŋ ghou pa ŋgar poia ve ataam to naŋgabiiz poian mbeb.
Muuŋ, you nayel pa ataam tiom. Eemoghon yom ulos ghou ve upasaluŋgan ghou, tauto aazne, matag kisin aliŋam ve nataghoni.
Yom poiam kat. Ve ŋgar to ughamgham di ne paam, popoiadi moghon. Upaghazoŋan ghou pa tutuuŋ tiom naol to tineep pataghaaŋ.
Yes to tipapait taudi ve tiveleg ghom, tiŋgal saveeŋ kaarom payou, ve tiwaghamun izag. Eemoghon matag kisin tutuuŋ to yom ughur di, ve nataghon di toman lolog.
Ndiran tonowen ledi ghilalooŋ rita maau. Eemoghon you, saveeŋ tiom igham lolog poia le poia kat.
Pataŋani to muuŋ igham ghou, nene poia. Pasa, ipasaluŋgan ghou, ve ipamundigin ŋgar tiou pa tutuuŋ tiom naol to tineep pataghaaŋ.
Saveeŋ to ivot ila avom, you naghita inimale mbeb tau. Ilib pa yaam silva ve gol ndiŋndiŋ ndiŋndiŋ.
Taum nimam igharaat ghou, to navot. Tovenen upaghazoŋan ghou pa tutuuŋ tiom to naol ne, leso nagham ŋgar padi pooi.
Yes to timatughez payom ve titaghon ŋgar tiom, ighaze tighita ghou, nene pale lolodi poia. Pasa, you naghur ila saveeŋ mbuaaŋ tiom, ve naghur matag naghaze naghita anoŋa ivot.
O Yoova, you nawatag: Ataam tiom to gabizooŋ tamtoghon, nene deŋia moghon. Ve yom utaghon saveeŋ mbuaaŋ tiom irau sawa isob. Tauto ulos ghou pa upasaluŋgan ghou.
Yom lolom ineep tuŋia ila to tamtoghon tiom ve uluul di. Upatooŋ ŋgar tovene payou paam itaghon saveeŋ to yom umbua toman ghou. Leso urab ateg, ve upalot ghou. Pasa, you mbesooŋa tiom.
Lolom isamin ghou, ve uul ghou naneep pooi. Pasa, saveeŋ tiom, tauto igham lolog poia le poia kat.
Yes to tipait taudi ve tiveleg ghom, tinoknok ŋgaliiŋ saveeŋ kaarom payou. Utatan di, ve ugham di mayadi. Eemoghon you matag itaghon tutuuŋ to yom ughur di naghaze nagham ŋgar padi pooi.
Yes to timatughez payom ve titaghon ŋgar tiom, ghoro tinim tiou ve yeiŋa nilup ghei. Pasa, ndiran tovene tiwatag ataam to yom ughuri pa tamtoghon tiom.
You naghaze ŋgar to ineep ila lolog ne, eta isosor malep, ve nataghon katin tutuuŋ tiom naol to tineep pataghaaŋ. Leso mayag sob.
O Yoova, you nakaria saŋaniiŋ pa ulaaŋ tiom, le tapirig isob kat. Eemoghon you naghur ila naghaze aliŋam pale ighur anoŋa.
You naghur matag naghaze naghita saveeŋ mbuaaŋ tiom anoŋa ivot. Eemoghon nasaŋan le maau. Pale ŋeez o uul ghou ve ateg izi?
You nasami, ve tamtoghon lolodi imaagh payou wa. Tighita ghou nanimale buzbuz. Eemoghon tutuuŋ tiom naol to tineep pataghaaŋ, lolog imaagh padi maau.
You mbesooŋa tiom. Pughu vena to yom umbabatut koiagŋa, ve tighamgham pataŋani payou? Pale ŋeez o uŋgabiiz di, ve ughur atia padi?
Ughita. Yes to tipapait taudi ve tiveleg ghom, titai saambu payou tighaze natap nazila. Ndiran tonowen titaghon saveeŋ tiom maau.
Tutuuŋ tiom tisob, popoiadi moghon. Tovenen yei irau ninumeer di pa tipasaluŋgan ghei. Aazne, tamtoghon tighur pataŋani payou sorok. Tovenen uul ghou lak!
Pasa, mala maau pale tipasob nepooŋ tiou to taan. Eemoghon tutuuŋ to yom ughur di, you napul murig padi maau.
Yom lolom ineep tuŋia ila to tamtoghon tiom ve uluul di. Tovenen uŋgin ghou naneep pooi. Leso matag kisin ataam to yom ughuri payei, ve nataghoni irau sawa isob. Ataam tonenen, taum avom isavia.
O Yoova, saveeŋ tiom pale iyaryaaŋ izi sambam, ve inepneep tovene itaghoni taghoni gha ila.
Tamtoghon tipopoop, ve papaghu todi tivotvot itaghoni taghoni gha ila. Ve gabuam to avom onoon ve utataghon saveeŋ tiom ne paam. Inepneep tovene itaghoni taghoni gha ila. Yom to ughur taan ineep tuŋia ila ina. Irau induur maau.
Muuŋ ve inim aazne, mbeb tisob tineep tuŋia ila inadi inadi itaghon saveeŋ to yom usavia. Ve mbeb tisob tinim mbesooŋa tiom.
Saveeŋ tiom igham lolog poia le poia kat. Inimale maau, tone pataŋani tiou igham ghou nalaleg.
Tutuuŋ to yom ughur di, you irau lolog imaagh pa eta maau. Maau le maau kat. Pasa, saveeŋ tiom, tauto igham ghou avuvug ila, ve naneep matag iyaryaar.
You nanim lem wa. Tovenen ugham mulin ghou lak! Pasa, you nazuaria ghou naghaze le nataghon katin tutuuŋ tisob to yom ughur di.
Aazne, ndiran samsamiadi tighamgham lilin ghou tighaze tirab ghou namaat. Eemoghon matag iŋgalŋgal ataam to yom ughuri payei.
You naghita mbeb eta to ivot kat ne maau. Mbeb to naol ne, tisob timuul moghon. Eemoghon tutuuŋ tiom, ghoro iraua kat. Nene pughu tiina, ve poia le poia kat.
You lolog pa saveeŋ tiom kat! Tovenen sawa to naol ne, mboŋmaagh ila le rabrab izi, matag itaghoni ve naghamgham ŋgar pani.
Tutuuŋ tiom ineep ila ŋgar tiou irau sawa isob. Tauto ŋgar tiou ilib pa koiagŋa ŋgar todi.
Ŋgar tiou ilib pa yes ŋgara to tipatoot ghou ne paam. Pasa, matag itaghon ataam to yom ughuri payei, ve naghamgham ŋgar pani.
Ve ŋgar tiou ilib pa ndolmana ŋgar todi paam. Pasa, tutuuŋ to yom ughur di, matag kisin di, ve nataghon di irau sawa isob.
You napaghau taug pa ataam samsamia to naol ne, leso nataghon aliŋam.
You napul murig pa tutuuŋ tiom deŋiadi maau. Pasa, yom taum to upatooŋ ghou pa tutuuŋ tonenen.
Bagil suru, nene poia pa taghuni. Eemoghon saveeŋ tiom, nene poia le poia kat. Ilib pa bagil suru.
Tutuuŋ to yom ughur di, nene tiuul ghou pa naghilaal ŋgar poia. Tauto naghur koi pa ŋgar kaarom to naol ne. Pa vene, tiweu ghou ve napul ataam tiom.
Saveeŋ tiom, nene inimale lam to isul ataam ve nalaagh. Ve inim ghazooŋa payou, leso nalaagh taghon ataam tiom.
Gabizooŋ tiom, nene deŋia moghon. Tauto nambua saveeŋ toman ghom, ve napariaaŋa le iyaryaaŋ kat naghaze you pale nataghon ataam tiom to gabizooŋ mbeb.
O Yoova, pataŋani tiina kat igham ghou le naneep sami. Uul ghou naneep pooi muul itaghon saveeŋ mbuaaŋ tiom.
You lolog poia payom, ve napait ghom pa poia tiom. Naghaze paitooŋ tiou tonene inim watooŋrau poia ila matam. Upatooŋ ghou pa ataam tiom to gabizooŋ mbeb.
Moghon moghon you nanepneep ila naal avo. Eemoghon lolog imaagh pa saveeŋ tiom maau.
Onoon, ndiran samsamia tighur liis payou. Eemoghon tutuuŋ to yom ughur di, you nayel padi maau.
Ataam to yom ughuri payei, nene mbeb poia to yom ugham payou. You pale nakiskisi tovene itaghoni taghoni gha ila. Pasa, igham ghou lolog poia le poia kat.
Tutuuŋ tiom to tineep pataghaaŋ, ŋgar tiou iyaryaaŋ naghaze you pale nataghon di le irau sawa tiou isob.
Yes to timbees payom toman lolodi ee moghon maau, ve ŋgar todi ru, you lolog padi maau. Eemoghon saveeŋ tiom, you lolog pani kat.
Yom unum inag to yoŋgaaŋ, ve unum sigeu payou. Tovenen naghur ila saveeŋ tiom, ve naghur matag naghaze naghita anoŋa ivot.
Yam ndiran to ghamuuŋ ŋgar samia, aghau payou! Pasa, you naghaze nataghon tutuuŋ to Maaron tiou.
O Yoova, upalot ghou itaghon saveeŋ mbuaaŋ tiom. Leso nayoon ariaŋa ve naneep pooi. Ighaze naghur matag payom sorok, nene pale mayag.
Ukis ghou tuŋia. Leso naneep pooi, ve matag kisin tutuuŋ tiom to tineep pataghaaŋ, ve nataghon di irau sawa isob.
Tamtoghon tisob to tiyel pa tutuuŋ tiom, yom upul murim padi. Ŋgar todi kaarom, nene ipatooŋ di ighaze yes tipul ataam tiom wa.
Ndiran samsamia to tineep izi taan, yom ughita di tinimale buzbuz, ve upiyaav di tilaledi. Tauto lolog pa ataam to yom ughuri pa tamtoghon tiom.
You nagham ŋgar payom, le matughezaaŋ tiina igham ghou ve tinig irur. Ve ŋgar tiom to uŋgabiiz tamtoghon ve ughur atia padi, nene paam igham ghou namatughez.
You nagham ŋgar popoia ve ŋgar deŋia moghon. Tovenen upul ghou nala koiagŋa nimadi malep.
You mbesooŋa tiom. Tovenen uyoon payou ve uul ghou. Leso naneep pooi. Yes to tipapait taudi ve tiveleg ghom, upul di tigham samin ghou malep.
You naghur matag pa ulaaŋ tiom, ve nakaria saŋaniiŋ wa. Pale ŋeez o uul ghou itaghon saveeŋ mbuaaŋ tiom?
Yom lolom ineep tuŋia ila to tamtoghon tiom ve uluul di. Upatooŋ ŋgar tovene payou paam. Pasa, you mbesooŋa tiom. Ve upatoot ghou pa tutuuŋ tiom to tineep pataghaaŋ.
You mbesooŋa tiom. Tovenen upaghazoŋan ghou, leso naghilaal ŋgar poia, ve nawatag katin ataam to yom ughuri payei.
O Yoova, aazne tamtoghon tizorzoor saveeŋ tiom. Umundig ve ugham ŋgar eta padi lak!
Onoon kat, you lolog pa tutuuŋ tiom to naol ne ilib pa gol. Gol to ŋgalaaŋa ve poia kat ne paam, naghita naghaze tutuuŋ tiom ilib pani.
Tovenen tutuuŋ to yom ughur di, tauto tipasaluŋgan ghou pa laghooŋ tiou. Ve naghur koi pa ataam naol to tiweu ghou pa napul murig payom.
Ataam to yom ughuri payei, nene poia le poia kat. Tovenen matag kisini ve nataghoni irau sawa isob.
Ighaze tipaghazoŋan saveeŋ tiom pughu pa tamtoghon, nene inim ghazooŋa padi. Ve yes to ŋgar todi tiina maau, saveeŋ tiom igham ŋgar todi ivot, leso tighilaal ŋgar poia.
You lolog pa tutuuŋ tiom kat, nanimale tamtoghon to muruni le isami kat.
Matam inim payou, ve ugham poian ghou. Pasa, yes to lolodi ineep tiom ve tipapait izam, yom ughamgham tovene padi.
Upasaluŋgan ghou, leso laghooŋ tiou deŋia itaghon saveeŋ tiom. Ve upul ŋgar samia eta ilib payou malep.
Yes to tighamgham pataŋani payou pa titatan ghou, ugham mulin ghou ila nimadi. Leso nataghon tutuuŋ to yom ughur di.
O Yoova, you mbesooŋa tiom. Naghaze lolom poia payou, ve ugham poian ghou. Ve upatoot ghou pa tutuuŋ tiom to tineep pataghaaŋ.
You nataŋ, ve matag suru irereer izi inimale ya. Pasa, tamtoghon titaghon saveeŋ tiom iraua sone.
Yoova, yom deŋiam kat. Ve gabizooŋ tiom paam, nene deŋia moghon.
Ataam to yom ughuri payei, nene deŋia moghon. Tovenen yei irau ninumeera pa ipasaluŋgan ghei.
Ŋgar tiou iyaryaaŋ kat naghaze tamtoghon tisob titaghon aliŋam. Eemoghon koiagŋa lolodi imaagh pani. Tauto tigham ghou ateg yabyab kat.
You mbesooŋa tiom. Lolog pa saveeŋ tiom, ve nanumeera kat. Pasa, natoova le naghita naghaze nene onoon.
Onoon, you ŋgeu sorok, ve tamtoghon matadi izi payou. Eemoghon tutuuŋ to yom ughur di, lolog imaagh padi maau.
Ŋgar tiom deŋia pale inepneep tovene itaghoni taghoni gha ila. Ve saveeŋ tiom, nene onoon moghon. Tovenen irau naghur ila, ve nanumeera kat.
Onoon, pataŋani naol titatan ghou, ve tigham ghou lolog ipataŋan kat. Eemoghon tutuuŋ tiom, nene igham lolog poia le poia kat.
Ataam to yom ughuri payei, nene deŋia moghon, ve inepneep tovene irau sawa isob. Upaghazoŋan ghou pani, leso naneep pooi.
O Yoova, you nataŋ roran ghom toman lolog. Ulooŋ suŋuuŋ tiou, ve uul ghou. Leso matag kisin tutuuŋ tiom to tineep pataghaaŋ, ve nataghon di.
Taŋiiz tiou iŋarua ghom. Upas ghou navot pa pataŋani tiou tonene. Leso matag kisin ataam to yom ughuri payei, ve nataghoni irau sawa isob.
You naghur ila saveeŋ mbuaaŋ tiom, ve naghur matag naghaze naghita anoŋa ivot. Tovenen ndag iza sone, ve you namundig nataŋ roran ghom pa ulaaŋ.
Ve mboŋ to naol ne paam, you napamaat. Leso matag itaghon saveeŋ tiom, ve nagham ŋgar pani pooi.
O Yoova, lolom ineep tuŋia ila to tamtoghon tiom ve uluul di. Ve gabizooŋ tiom, nene deŋia moghon. Tovenen ulooŋ suŋuuŋ tiou tonene, ve uul ghou naneep pooi.
Aazne, ndiran samsamia tinim tigharau ghou tighaze tiwaghamun ghou. Ŋgar todi ineep saguan kat pa saveeŋ tiom.
Eemoghon Yoova, yom uneep digeg. Ve tutuuŋ tiom to naol ne, nene irau nanumeer di pa tipasaluŋgan ghou.
To muuŋ ve inim, you naghilaal naghaze ataam to yom ughuri pa tamtoghon tiom, yom ughaze ineep tovene itaghoni taghoni gha ila.
Yoova, lolog imaagh pa saveeŋ tiom maau. Tovenen ughita pataŋani tiou tonene, ve upaghau ghou pani.
Aazne, tamtoghon tipayoon ghou sorok pa savsaveeŋ. Tovenen uyoon payou, ve uul ghou naneep pooi itaghon saveeŋ mbuaaŋ tiom.
Ndiran samsamia, yom uluul di maau. Pasa, tutuuŋ tiom to tineep pataghaaŋ, yes tigham ŋgar pa titaghon di maau.
O Yoova, yes to tinepneep ila pataŋani lolo, yom lolom isamin di kat. Tovenen uul ghou naneep pooi itaghon ŋgar tiom deŋia.
Pasa, koiagŋa to tigham pataŋani payou ne, yes ival kat. Eemoghon ataam to yom ughuri payei, you nayel pani maau.
You naghita yes to tipul muridi payom, le irau lolog maau kat. Pasa, yes titaghon tutuuŋ tiom maau.
O Yoova, ughita. Tutuuŋ to yom ughur di, you lolog padi kat. Uul ghou naneep pooi. Pasa, lolom ineep tuŋia ila to tamtoghon tiom ve uluul di.
Saveeŋ tiom pughu tovene: Yom avom onoon, ve utaghon saveeŋ mbuaaŋ tiom irau sawa isob. Ve tutuuŋ tiom to naol, nene deŋiadi moghon, ve tinepneep tovene itaghoni taghoni gha ila.
Yes daba to taan tighurghur pataŋani payou sorok. Eemoghon you namatughez padi maau. Saveeŋ tiom moghon to namatughez pani.
Saveeŋ tiom igham lolog poia kat, nanimale tamtoghon to ilaagh ila le indeeŋ le mbeb poia eez.
Ŋgar kaarom to naol, you lolog padi maau kat, ve naghur koi padi. Eemoghon saveeŋ tiom, ghoro lolog pani kat.
Ndag to naol ne, napait ghom pa liim ve ru. Pasa, gabizooŋ tiom, nene deŋia moghon.
Yes to lolodi pa saveeŋ tiom kat, nene pale tineep poia kat. Ve mbeb eta irau igham di titap ne maau.
O Yoova, you nataghon tutuuŋ tiom to naol ne, ve naghur matag pa ulaaŋ tiom.
ataam to yom ughuri payei, you lolog pani kat. Tauto matag kisini, ve nataghoni irau sawa isob.
You nataghon ataam tonenen toman tutuuŋ tisob to yom ughur di. Pasa, sa ŋgar to you naghamghami, yom ughita.
O Yoova, ulooŋ taŋiiz tiou tonene. Ugham ghou naghilaal ŋgar poia itaghon saveeŋ tiom.
Ughur taliŋam pa suŋuuŋ tiou, ve upas ghou navot pa pataŋani tiou itaghon saveeŋ mbuaaŋ tiom.
Yom upatoot ghou pa tutuuŋ tiom to tineep pataghaaŋ. Tovenen avog ipait ghom kat.
You pale nambou mbouŋ to iŋarua saveeŋ tiom. Pasa, tutuuŋ tiom to naol, nene deŋiadi moghon.
Nimam isaŋan pa ulaaŋ ghou. Pasa, ŋgar tiou iyaryaaŋ naghaze nataghon tutuuŋ to yom ughur di.
O Yoova, you nakausim pa ulaaŋ tiom. Ve saveeŋ tiom, to igham lolog poia le poia kat.
Upul ghou naneep matag iyaryaar, leso napait ghom. Tutuuŋ tiom pale iuul ghou naneep pooi.
You mbesooŋa tiom. Eemoghon aazne nayel pa ataam tiom ve nawalaghlaagh nanimale sipsip to ighau ila le ilale. Tovenen ukaal ghou, ve ugham ghou namuul nanim. Pasa, you lolog imaagh pa tutuuŋ tiom maau.
You naneep ila pataŋani lolo, ve nataŋ roran Yoova pa ulaaŋ, ve ye ilooŋ suŋuuŋ tiou.
O Yoova, yes to avodi kaarom, ve yamadi tortoraaŋ saveeŋ, upaghau ghou padi.
Yam to yamamim booga, nene vena? Yam aghaze awatag sa ŋgar to pale Yoova igham payam, ve atia to pale iŋarua gham?
Poia. Alooŋ kat. Ye pale ivaneg gham pa pane natu toni to matadi kat. Ve yab ŋgiliŋi to kaviaaŋa kat pale ighan gham. Atia tiam, tau tonene!
Oyai, yes to aazne naneep nanim loom ila lolodi ne, ledi ŋgar maau tinimale yes kankanooŋa to ndug Mesek ve Kedar.
Ndiran to ndug tonene, lolodi pa ŋgar luuma maau kat. Ve you nakaria nepooŋ toman di, le isooŋ ghou wa.
You lolog pa ŋgar luuma, ve naghaze yeiŋa nilup ghei ninim ee moghon. Eemoghon yes lolodi ipapazaagh di pa ghamuuŋ malmal irau sawa isob.
Matag izala pa lolooz naghaze naghita: Ulaaŋ pale inim tiou vena?
Yoova moghon to pale nagham ulaaŋ ila toni. Ye to ighur sambam ve taan.
Ye pale mata payom. Irau ipul ghom aghem kirikia ve utap maau. Ŋginiiŋ tiom ipamaat irau sawa isob.
Onoon kat, ŋginiiŋ to iit Israela, ighaze mata ighengheen, nene irau igheen maau. Ipamaat irau sawa isob.
Yoova mata payom ve iŋgin ghom, leso uneep pooi. Ye ineep ila digem, ve inim yavyaav payom pa ipoon ghom pa ndag.
Tovenen ighaze ndag, ndag irau ighaaz katin ghom maau. Ve mboŋ, kaiyo irau iwaghamun ghom maau.
Yoova pale mata payom, ve ipoon ghom pa mbeb samsamia to naol. Ye tau pale iŋgin ghom uneep pooi.
Ye pale mata pa laghooŋ tiom ve nepooŋ tiom. Tovenen sawa to upul ruum ve uvot ula, le sawa to ulooŋ umuul unum, ye pale ineep toman ghom, ve iŋgin ghom uneep pooi. To aazne, ve itaghoni taghoni gha ila.
Sawa to tisaav payou tighaze: “Umundig ve itiŋa tazala pa Yoova rumai toni!” saveeŋ todi tonowen igham lolog poia kat.
Ve aazne, ninim nilooŋ nila Yerusalem lolo, ve niyoon nigharau ataam to didiiŋ ariaŋa to iluvut Yerusalem.
Yerusalem, ndug paghuna. Tigharaata le ivot kat. Mbeb tisob tineep deŋia moghon.
Iit tamtoghon to Yoova tanimnim sualen pa suŋuuŋ. Rumai to yes Israela tisob tizazala pa Yerusalem pa suŋuuŋ, ve tipait Yoova iza pa poia toni, titaghon tutuuŋ to ye tau ighuri padi.
Pasa, kinik tiei to tivot ila to David ne, inadi to ghamuuŋ pooz ineep to sualen. Ve tighagharaat saveeŋ to tamtoghon paam izi sualen.
Suŋuuŋ tiam iŋarua Yoova, ve aghasoni pa igham tamtoghon to Yerusalem tineep pooi toman lolodi luuma! Asuŋ pani aghaze: “Yes to lolodi pa Yerusalem, upaghau pataŋani padi. Leso timatughez sob, ve tineep poia moghon.
Ve yes to tineep ila didiiŋ ariaŋa to Yerusalem lolo, ugham di tineep pooi toman lolodi luuma. Ve kinik yesŋa uraata to tineep ila ruum toni ne paam. Upoon di pa pataŋani to naol. Leso timatughez sob, ve tineep poia moghon.”
You matag iŋgal toŋvetaz tiou ve nditag. Tauto nasaav pa ndug tiina Yerusalem naghaze: “Maaron pale igham ghom uneep pooi toman lolom luuma.”
Ve nagham ŋgar pa Maaron toit Yoova rumai toni paam. Tauto suŋuuŋ tiou iŋarua naghaze ye tau pale igham mbeb tisob tivot poia moghon payom.
O Yoova, yom uneep ila inam to ghamuuŋ pooz izi sambam. Tovenen naghur matag payom, ve nanumeer ghom.
Yoova, yom Maaron tiei. Ninumeer ghom pa mbeb to naol ne, ninimale mbesooŋa nditamoot ve ndiliva to tinumeer daba todi. Tovenen yei pale nighur matamai payom pa ulaaŋ, le irau lolom isamin ghei ve uul ghei.
O Yoova, yei mbesooŋa tiom. Lolom isamin ghei, ve uul ghei lak! Ughita. Aazne, koiamai matadi izi payei, ve tinoknok velegiiŋ ghei le isooŋ ghei! Ndiran tonowen, nepooŋadi poia kat. Timbool pa mbeb eta maau. Tauto timatughez payom maau, ve tinumeer taudi tighaze yes tiraua kat. Ugham ŋgar eta padi lak!
<range>
“Inimale Yoova ivool toit maau, tone tagham samia.” Yam ival tiina to Israel irau asaav tovene:
“Sawa to koiaad tipamundigin malmal pait, inimale Yoova ivool toit maau, tone tipasob ghiit. Pasa, atedi yabyab pait kat.
<range>
Pataŋani tonowen, nene inimale yawaaŋa ivot toman tapiri, ve izugua ghiit tala, ve mbeluuta ililiit ghiit. Ve nene inimale lulu ilooŋ, ve iweu ghiit tala ve taghun te.”
<range>
Eemoghon Yoova ipul ghiit tala koiaad nimadi ve tiwaghamun ghiit maau. Tovenen tapaiti pa poia toni!
Sawa tonenen, iit tanimale man to liis ighami. Eemoghon Yoova ipas ghiit tavot pa liis tonowen, ve taghau.
Yoova to ighur sambam ve taan. Ye moghon to Ulaaŋa toit.
Yes to tinumeer Yoova, tiyoon ariaŋa tinimale lolooz Zion. Lolooz tonowen, ighaze mbeb eta itoki, irau irur maau. Iyoon tuŋia tovene itaghoni taghoni gha ila.
Lolooz katindi tiluvut Yerusalem. Yoova tovene paam. Ye inimale didiiŋ ariaŋa to iluvut tamtoghon toni. To aazne, ve itaghoni taghoni gha ila.
Taan to Maaron igham pa tamtoghon toni deŋiadi, ye irau ipul ndiran samsamia tigham pooz pani moghon moghon ne maau. Pale itatan di. Pa vene, tiweu ndiran deŋiadi ve tigham sosor paam.
O Yoova, tamtoghon popoia to ŋgar deŋia ineep tuŋia ila lolodi, ugham poian di.
Eemoghon yes to tipul muridi pa ataam tiom, ve titaghon ataam to deŋia maau, undiir di toman ndiran samsamia tisob tighau tila. O Yoova, ugham yes Israela tineep pooi toman lolodi luuma!
Muuŋ, ndug Zion isami kat. Ve sawa to Yoova iuul ghiit ve taneep poia muul, nene igham lolood poia kat. Eemoghon taghur ila kat maau. Taghaze pa taghita vibiiŋ moghon.
Sawa tonenen, tiniid iza, ve taŋiŋ kat. Lolood poia ve talool. Ŋgar to Yoova igham pait, ndug ndug tighita, ve tisaav tighaze: “Wai, Yoova igham uraat tintina pa yes Israela!”
Nene onoon. Yoova igham uraat tintina kat pait. Tauto lolood poia kat.
Eemoghon Yoova, aazne nisami muul. Tovenen nighason ghom nighaze uul ghei, leso nineep poia muul, inimale uman itap ve igham ya maakadi to Negev tireer muul.
Yes to titaŋtaŋ, ve tivazog aniiŋ, muri pale tilup aniiŋ todi anoŋa, ve tilool toman lolodi poia.
Onoon kat, yes to titaŋtaŋ, ve timbaad aniiŋ uvedi tila pa vazogiiŋ, muri pale timbaad aniiŋ anoŋa, ve tilool toman lolodi poia, ve timuul tila pa paanu.
Yes to reiŋ ruum, ighaze Yoova ineep toman di pa uraat todi maau, nene pale tirab taudi sorok. Ve yes to tipamaat, ve tiŋgin ndug pa mboŋ ne paam. Ighaze Yoova iŋgin ndug todi tonowen maau, nene pale tipamaat sorok.
Ighaze moghon moghon, ugham ŋgar naol ughaze: “Pale ag aniiŋ ma leg mbeb iraua, ma maau?” Ve upamundigin uraat pa mboŋmaagh kat, ve ukiskisi ila ila le mboŋ anoŋa, nene urab taum sorok. Pasa, poia toni, tauto igham uraat toit ighurghur anoŋa ivotvot. Tovenen yes to Maaron lolo ineep todi, lolodi imbumbu maau, ve tigheen pooi pa mboŋ.
Ndipain to tapoop di, Yoova ighaze igham poian ghiit, tauto igham di pait itaghon tau poia toni.
Ighaze pain paghu eta azuwa ipoop ndinatu nditamoot pida, ndinatu tonowen pale tiyoon pani tinimale pane ndinatu to yes ndaaba.
Tovenen tamtoghon to le ndinatu nditamoot katindi, nene pale tini iza pa poia to Yoova to iza toni. Ve muri, ighaze yesŋa koia tiwazoran di pa savsaveeŋ izi maran, nene koia irau titatani ve tipamayaŋini maau. Pasa, ndinatu tonowen pale tiyoon pani, ve tiuuli pa savsaveeŋ.
Yes to timatughez pa Yoova ve titaghon ataam toni, poia to Yoova pale iza todi ve tinidi iza.
Ighaze ugham tovene, nene pale poia to Yoova iza tiom, ve uneep poia toman tinim iza. Uraat to ughami pa nimam, pale ughita anoŋa, ve am aniiŋ ve lem mbeb katindi.
Ve azuwam to iŋgin ruum tiom, pale ipoop ndinatum katindi, inimale ai vaen to anoŋa ivot katindi. Tovenen sawa to yamŋa ndinatum alup gham pa ghanghaniiŋ, yes pale tineep luvutin ghom, tinimale ai oliv matasupu to titub luvutin pughu.
Tovenen tamtoghon to ighaze imatughez pa Yoova ve itaghon ŋgar toni, poia to Yoova pale iza toni tovene.
Yoova inepneep izi ndug Zion. Ye pale ighur poia toni iza tiom. Ve sawa isob to uneep izi taan, yom pale ughita Yerusalem ineep pooi.
Ve yom pale uneep mala izi taan, le ughita nditimbum. Yoova pale igham yes Israela tineep pooi toman lolodi luuma. Onoon.
“Sawa to pain ghou ve inim, koiagŋa tighurghur pataŋani naol payou.” Yam ival tiina to Israel, yam eŋaeŋa asob asaav tovene:
“Onoon kat. Sawa to pain ghou ve inim, koiagŋa tighurghur pataŋani naol payou. Eemoghon titatan ghou maau.
Yes tiloslos ghou le ndimog imburmburtaaŋ. Tiwaghamun ghou le ndimog inimale taan to tigheli pa vazogiiŋ aniiŋ.”
Eemoghon Yoova ŋgar toni, nene deŋia moghon. Tauto igham mulin ghou ila ndiran samsamia tonowen nimadi, ve nanim mbesooŋa sorok padi muul maau.
Tamtoghon tisob to tighurghur koi pa ndug Zion, Yoova pale ipamuul di tila toman mayadi.
